T02D2628:1b-1: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha ya te
T02D2628:1b-2: dzo r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya aarha
T02D2628:1b-3: te sa myaksam buddh'a ya kalpa n'a ma t'i ka
T02D2628:1b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D2628:1b-6: [dd] rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs
T02D2628:1b-7: su spyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya
T02D2628:1b-9: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2628:1b-10: nyes pa'i skyon bral yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs //
T02D2628:1b-11: bde legs ji snyed thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02D2628:1b-12: sku gsum mchog gi bdag nyid rnam snang mdzad //
T02D2628:1b-13: gnas gsum 'dren pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2628:1b-14: sku gsum gtsug tor bdag nyid rgyud chen las //
T02D2628:1b-15: rdo rje rtse mo'i kalpa'i rgyud 'di nyid //
T02D2628:1b-16: rab tu zab cing rgya che rtogs dka' ba'i //
T02D2628:1b-17: mdo yi don 'di mdo tsam dgrol bar bya //
T02D2628:1b-18: de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
T02D2628:1b-19: na zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di'i brjod par
T02D2628:1b-20: bya ba dang 'brel pa ni gang zhig yin /
T02D2628:1b-21: de bzhin du dgos pa dang /
T02D2628:1b-22: dgos pa'i dgos pa ni ci zhig yin zhe na /
T02D2628:2a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @2a * //
T02D2628:2a-1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi
T02D2628:2a-2: brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa ngan song thams cad
T02D2628:2a-3: yongs su sbyong ba sku gsum gyi gtsug tor gyi
T02D2628:2a-4: rgyud chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni rgyun yin
T02D2628:2a-5: la / 'di'i 'di skad bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2628:2a-6: kun rig rnam par snang mdzad sku gsum gyi rgyud
T02D2628:2a-7: kyi bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2628:2a-8: ston par byed pa yin te /
T02D2628:2a-9: de yang dga' nas rjes su yi rang ngo bas
T02D2628:2a-10: gdul bya rnams 'dod pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2628:2a-12: de la yang rgyud kyi don dbang po rab mgo smos pas go ba dang /
T02D2628:2a-13: dbang po 'bring tshig dang don rnam par phye bas
T02D2628:2a-14: go ba rnams la ni rgyud kyi mtshan bcom ldan
T02D2628:2a-15: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
T02D2628:2a-16: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs
T02D2628:2a-17: su spyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa
T02D2628:2a-18: sku gsum gyi gtsug tor gyi rgyud chen po zhes
T02D2628:2a-19: bya bas kyang dbu zhabs kyi don rtogs par 'gyur
T02D2628:2a-20: la / dbang po 'bring tshig dang don rnam par
T02D2628:2a-21: phye bas go ba rnams la ni de nyid kyi
T02D2628:2a-22: don rnam par phye bas go ba yin te /
T02D2628:2a-23: de nyid kyi don yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2628:2a-24: bcom pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T02D2628:2b-0: shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis @2b gtan spangs pas phung po'i bdud la sogs pa bzhi bcom pa'o //
T02D2628:2b-1: ldan pa ni legs pa'i yon tan drug dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das te /
T02D2628:2b-3: nyon mongs shes rab kyis thub ste //
T02D2628:2b-4: de'i phyir shes rab 'joms zhes bya //
T02D2628:2b-5: dbang phyug la sogs drug ldan pas //
T02D2628:2b-6: bcom ldan 'das zhes rab tu brjod //
T02D2628:2b-8: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa lnga rdzogs shing
T02D2628:2b-9: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa stong pa
T02D2628:2b-10: nyid kyi chos nyid du sangs rgyas pa la ni
T02D2628:2b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D2628:2b-12: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:2b-14: gsang ba chen po tshogs mtho ba //
T02D2628:2b-16: snga ma ji ltar gshegs pa bzhin //
T02D2628:2b-17: mngon par byang chub rnam lnga yis //
T02D2628:2b-18: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
T02D2628:2b-19: rdzogs sangs rgyas las sangs rgyas brjod //
T02D2628:2b-21: de yang sku gsum gyi bdag nyid de bdag gi
T02D2628:2b-22: don phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag nyid du bstan to
T02D2628:2b-23: // de la gnyen po phun sum tshogs pa ni gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya ste /
T02D2628:2b-24: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dam /
T02D2628:2b-25: sh'akya thub pa'i thugs ka nas nang sems kyi dkyil
T02D2628:2b-26: 'khor chen po'i 'od zer gyis ngan song thams cad
T02D2628:2b-27: sbyangs pas na gzi brjid kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o
T02D2628:2b-28: // brtag pa zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi dkyil
T02D2628:2b-29: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'gro ba'i don du sna
T02D2628:2b-30: tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du snang bar brtag pa'o //
T02D2628:2b-32: rnam par mi rtog chos dag las //
T02D2628:2b-33: sems can don du yongs su rtog / rtog pas brtag pa las byung ba //
T02D2628:2b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2628:2b-36: de bas na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid de rtog
T02D2628:2b-37: pa'i lha rnams kun kyang sarba bita kyi lha rnams
T02D2628:2b-38: su gyur nas mos pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin
T02D2628:2b-39: du sems can gyi don gyi dbang gis snang ngo
T02D2628:2b-40: // de'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa dang rigs
T02D2628:2b-41: kyi lha rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcu gnyis
T02D2628:2b-42: bsdus pa'i don du yongs su brtag pa de'o //
T02D2628:2b-43: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2628:2b-44: ngan song thams cad yongs su spyong ba zhes bya
T02D2628:2b-45: ste / de yang rgyu sbyangs pa dang /
T02D2628:3a-0: rkyen sbyangs pa gsum gyis 'bras bu ngan @3a * //
T02D2628:3a-2: thams cad ni khams gsum ka'o //
T02D2628:3a-3: yongs su sbyong ba ni nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor te phyag rgya dang /
T02D2628:3a-4: snying po ste bcu gcig pa'o //
T02D2628:3a-5: sngags dang rig pa sbyong ba'i phyir na sbyong ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:3a-6: sbyong ba'i thabs ji lta bu zhig gis sbyong snyam pa la /
T02D2628:3a-7: bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan la bzhugs te /
T02D2628:3a-8: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong bzhes
T02D2628:3a-9: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te
T02D2628:3a-10: / ngan song gi rgyud las rnam par grol ba
T02D2628:3a-11: zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
T02D2628:3a-12: po'i 'od zer sdud pa'i phreng ba mang po nyid
T02D2628:3a-13: kyis dpral ba'i mdzod spu nas byung bas stong gsum
T02D2628:3a-14: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D2628:3a-15: khyab par byas nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o
T02D2628:3a-16: / // de la sbyong ba rnam pa gsum gyi
T02D2628:3a-17: sgo nas mtshon par byed pa'i phyir na sku gsum
T02D2628:3a-18: gyi gtsug tor gyi rgyud chen po zhes bya ba
T02D2628:3a-19: / // gsungs te / de la nyon mongs pa
T02D2628:3a-20: lnga'i 'bras bu mtshams med pa lnga byas pa dag
T02D2628:3a-21: mnar med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ba de las bskyab
T02D2628:3a-22: pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad sku'i rang bzhin longs
T02D2628:3a-23: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i dkyil 'khor du rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D2628:3a-25: de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi rang bzhin sprul pa'i
T02D2628:3a-26: sku'i dkyil 'khor du de dag gi rkyen du gyur
T02D2628:3a-27: pa'i sgrib pa lnga po de dag rnam par sbyong
T02D2628:3a-28: ba'i phyi ma'i rgyud grub par mdzad pa dang /
T02D2628:3a-29: de dag gi rgyur gyur pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga'i
T02D2628:3a-30: rang bzhin can sbyong ba'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:3a-31: pa'i thugs kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:3a-32: phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud du grub par mdzad
T02D2628:3a-33: pas na sku gsum gyi gtsug tor gyi rgyud chen
T02D2628:3a-34: po zhes bya'o // de la nyon mongs pa'i 'bras
T02D2628:3a-35: bu mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen por ltung ba
T02D2628:3a-36: de las bskyab pa ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2628:3a-37: po zhes bya'o // dgos pa'o // rgyu dang rkyen
T02D2628:3a-38: sbyangs nas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2628:3a-39: bde ba phun sum tshogs pa grub bar mdzad pa
T02D2628:3a-40: ni sku gnyis nye bar mtshon pa'i sgo nas phyi
T02D2628:3a-41: ma dang phyi ma'i rgyud kyis byed de dgos pa'i
T02D2628:3a-42: po zhes bya'o // dgos pa'o // yang dgos pa'o
T02D2628:3a-43: // de'i yang de'i don la snyegs pa ni 'di
T02D2628:3a-44: po zhes bya'o // dgos pa'o // yang dgos pa'o
T02D2628:3a-45: // yin te / ye shes shin tu rnam par
T02D2628:3b-0: @3b dag pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa dang shes
T02D2628:3b-1: bya'i sgrib pa thams cad ni spangs pa nam mkha'
T02D2628:3b-2: bzhin du spros pa'i bag chags kyi tha snyad thams
T02D2628:3b-3: cad ni bsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis gsal ba chos
T02D2628:3b-5: de ltar yin mod kyang yongs su dag pa dang
T02D2628:3b-6: ma dag pa'i sems can gdul ba'i don du sngon
T02D2628:3b-7: gyi smon lam gyi shugs kyis sku'i bkod pa dang
T02D2628:3b-9: ye shes rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor don dam pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-10: kun rdzob kyi yul 'di grub par mdzad nas ngan
T02D2628:3b-11: song gi sdug bsngal rnams gnyen po ye shes dang
T02D2628:3b-12: / thabs kyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo
T02D2628:3b-13: nas phan 'dogs par mdzad pa la ni bcom ldan
T02D2628:3b-14: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
T02D2628:3b-15: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i
T02D2628:3b-16: brtag pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
T02D2628:3b-17: zhes bya ba sku gsum gyi btsug [*gtsug] tor gyi
T02D2628:3b-18: / rgyud chen po'o // de yan chad kyis ni
T02D2628:3b-19: rgyud kyi mtshan blo 'bring don rnams par phye bas
T02D2628:3b-20: go ba dang dgos 'brel bstan nas /
T02D2628:3b-21: da ni dbang po tha ma tshig dang yi ge
T02D2628:3b-22: lhur blangs pas go ba'i dbang du byas nas bshad
T02D2628:3b-23: de / de la mdo sde 'di la yang bsdus te bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:3b-24: bsdus par bstan pa la yang sku gsung thugs kyis
T02D2628:3b-25: bstan pa'i dang po la don rnam pa gsum ste
T02D2628:3b-26: / dang por gleng gzhi bstan pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-27: gleng bslang ba bstan pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-29: gleng gzhi la yang phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ste /
T02D2628:3b-30: dus phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-31: ston pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-32: gnas phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2628:3b-33: 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang bzhir bstan to //
T02D2628:3b-34: de la ci'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed bas thog mar gleng gzhi smos she na /
T02D2628:3b-35: de ni rgyu gnyis kyi phyir smos te /
T02D2628:3b-36: rgyu gnyis ni yang dag par sdud par byed pa
T02D2628:3b-37: bdag la yid ches par byed pa bskyed pa'i phyir
T02D2628:3b-38: yang thog mar gleng gzhi smos la /
T02D2628:3b-39: yid brtan du rung bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2628:3b-40: kyis gsungs par bstan pas de la gus pa bskyed
T02D2628:3b-41: pa'i phyir yang dag par sdud par byed pas thog
T02D2628:3b-43: gleng bslang ba la yang gnyis te /
T02D2628:3b-44: ston pas gleng bslang ba dang /
T02D2628:4a-0: gzhung rgyas par bstan pa la yang bsdus pa'i @4a * //
T02D2628:4a-2: de yang gsum du shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:4a-5: phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i rgyud do //
T02D2628:4a-6: de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2628:4a-7: tshangs pa chen po padma'i gdan la bzhugs te zhes bya ba yan chad kyis gleng gzhi bstan te /
T02D2628:4a-8: de la yang bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D2628:4a-9: sgrub par byed pa gnyis kyis bstan /
T02D2628:4a-10: bsgrub par bya ba ni sdud pa pos bdag nyid tshad mar bya ba ste /
T02D2628:4a-11: de yang yul dang dus dang rang gi ngo bo'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
T02D2628:4a-12: de ni mnor [*ma nor] bar sdud pa po phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2628:4a-13: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
T02D2628:4a-14: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2628:4a-15: te zhes bya ba nas gang de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:4a-16: rnams kyis gdul bar mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma
T02D2628:4a-17: yin no zhes bya ba yan chad kyis ni ston
T02D2628:4a-19: de la yang ston pa'i che ba nyid bstan pa'i zhar la gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa dang /
T02D2628:4a-20: de la ngo mtshar skyes pa ngo mtshar gyi rgyu
T02D2628:4a-21: bcu the tshom bsal ba dang gsum gyis bstan to
T02D2628:4a-22: // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
T02D2628:4a-23: gyis rang gi stan las langs te zhes bya ba
T02D2628:4a-24: nas bla na ma mchis pa'i yang dag par rdzogs
T02D2628:4a-25: pa'i byang chub thob par bgyi ba'i slad du bshad
T02D2628:4a-26: par gsol zhes bya ba yan chad 'khor gyis gleng
T02D2628:4a-27: // bslang bstan to // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin dang zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2628:4a-28: dzny'a na sa ma ye h'um zhes bya bas 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa bstan /
T02D2628:4a-29: snyoms par zhugs nas yang zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2628:4a-30: aom sha aom bh'a zhes bya ba yan chad kyis sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02D2628:4a-32: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin bstan /
T02D2628:4a-33: lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams
T02D2628:4a-34: cad yongs su sbyong ba gzi brjid kyi rgyal po'i
T02D2628:4a-35: snying po 'di rigs kyi bu 'am zhes bya ba
T02D2628:4a-36: nas bde ba thams cad myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2628:4a-37: bya ba yan chad kyis phan yon bstan /
T02D2628:4a-38: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2628:4a-39: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02D2628:4a-40: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan /
T02D2628:4a-41: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams
T02D2628:4a-42: cad la thugs brtse ba'i slad du phyi'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:4b-0: 'di gsungs so zhes bya @4b ba nas de'i gtor
T02D2628:4b-1: ma ji ltar mthun par bya zhes bya ba yan
T02D2628:4b-2: chad kyis slob dpon gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho
T02D2628:4b-4: de nas sngags pa bla med byang chub kyi //
T02D2628:4b-5: bla med gnas su slob ma smin par bya //
T02D2628:4b-8: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas par bstan /
T02D2628:4b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2628:4b-10: bran bzhin las kun byed par 'gyur //
T02D2628:4b-11: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis las kyi sgrub pa bstan /
T02D2628:4b-12: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
T02D2628:4b-13: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to zhes
T02D2628:4b-14: bya ba nas / bde gshegs rgyal ba nyid kyis gsungs //
T02D2628:4b-15: zhes bya ba yan chad kyis shi ba la phan gdags pa'i ched du dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:4b-16: lha'i gzugs su brtags pa dang /
T02D2628:4b-19: sngags kyis phan gdags pa dang /
T02D2628:4b-20: sbyin sreg gis phan gdags pa dang /
T02D2628:4b-21: ro bsregs pas phan gdags pa dang /
T02D2628:4b-22: mi 'grub pa'i skyon yon bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:4b-23: de nas brgya byin la sogs lha //
T02D2628:4b-24: zhes bya ba nas bsti stang du byas te phyag
T02D2628:4b-25: btsal nas de bzhin du song ngo zhes bya ba
T02D2628:4b-26: yan chad kyis / dri ma med pa'i skye gnas dang /
T02D2628:4b-29: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2628:4b-30: lha rnams ya mtshan du gyur te zhes bya ba
T02D2628:4b-31: nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gdon mi za
T02D2628:4b-32: bar sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub pa'i snod du gyur
T02D2628:4b-33: pa la sogs so zhes bya ba yan chad kyis
T02D2628:4b-35: bcom ldan 'das brtag pa'i rgyal po 'dis sems can
T02D2628:4b-36: gyi don bgyid pa gang lags pa'i skyes bu dam
T02D2628:4b-37: pa zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
T02D2628:4b-38: gis zhu ba bzhin du bskyang bar bgyi'o zhes bya
T02D2628:4b-39: ba yan chad kyis 'chad ba'i skyes bu ji ltar
T02D2628:4b-40: blta ba dang / 'khor gyi dam bca' ba bstan to //
T02D2628:4b-41: lha'i dbang po khyod kyis ji ltar smras pa de
T02D2628:4b-42: bzhin te zhes bya ba nas bag yod par byos
T02D2628:4b-43: la spyod cig ces pa yan chad kyis rtsa ba'i
T02D2628:4b-45: de yan chad kyis ni rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi don bsdus ba'i bshad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2628:4b-47: // / da ni 'di nas rgyud phyi ma'i don ston te /
T02D2628:4b-48: de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
T02D2628:4b-49: dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba
T02D2628:5a-1: gtso bo la phyag 'tshal nas zhes bya ba'i bar
T02D2628:5a-2: gyis ni rgyud kyi 'chad pa po'i mtshan nyid bstan
T02D2628:5a-3: to // de nas sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
T02D2628:5a-4: dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
T02D2628:5a-5: la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba nas bi
T02D2628:5a-6: na sha ni h'um phat ces bya pa yan chad

T02D2628:14b-26: / 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyis bcings pa thams cad ni bcom zhing sbyangs te /
T02D2628:14b-27: slar 'dus pa las brgya byin dang tshangs pa la
T02D2628:14b-28: sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i 'khor rnams kyi nyon mongs
T02D2628:14b-29: pa thams cad sbyangs nas bka'i snod du rung ba'am
T02D2628:14b-30: / dam tshig can du byin gyis brlabs so //
T02D2628:14b-31: de nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2628:14b-32: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang zhing yongs su
T02D2628:14b-35: aom badzra aa dhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma ye
T02D2628:14b-36: h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba bkod nas dam
T02D2628:14b-37: tshig can du byin gyis brlabs so //
T02D2628:14b-38: de ni dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2628:14b-39: da ni sbyor ba dang po ting nge 'dzin ston te /
T02D2628:15a-0: gdon mi za bar mi choms pa'i rdo rjes byin @15a * //
T02D2628:15a-1: gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2628:15a-2: gdon mi za bar zhes bya ba ni rang gi sems so sor rig ba ste /
T02D2628:15a-3: phyi'i yul du gyur pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten rdul
T02D2628:15a-4: phra rab 'dus pa las grub pa ni phyogs cha
T02D2628:15a-5: drug gi chas gzhigs na rdul phra rab tsam du
T02D2628:15a-6: yang ma grub pa stong pa chen po'i dang du
T02D2628:15a-7: bsgoms la / de la nang 'dzin pa'i sems la brtags na ni sems cir yang ma grub ste /
T02D2628:15a-8: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i yi ge aa'i dngos por gnas par bsgom mo //
T02D2628:15a-9: de nas aa de las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D2628:15a-10: yon tan rnams 'dir gzugs brnyan gyi rnam ba'i tshul
T02D2628:15a-11: gyis // aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i
T02D2628:15a-12: li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam aa: rab tu
T02D2628:15a-13: zhugs te shel dang zla ba lta bu'o //
T02D2628:15a-15: dag pa chen po'i snying pa dag / nam mkha' bzhin du dri ma med //
T02D2628:15a-16: gnas ngan len pa kun las grol //
T02D2628:15a-17: rnam rtog sel ba'i mchog yin no //
T02D2628:15a-18: nyon mongs dri ma kun dag cing //
T02D2628:15a-19: zla ba bzhin du snga ma'i steng //
T02D2628:15a-21: de la ni gdon mi za bar zhes brjod do //
T02D2628:15a-22: de nas rang gi gsang sngags zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:15a-23: la gnas pa bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan
T02D2628:15a-24: thams cad skar ma'i rnam pa lta bus gzugs brnyan
T02D2628:15a-25: la sogs pa'i tshul gyis yi ge ka la sogs
T02D2628:15a-26: pa rab tu zhugs te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D2628:15a-27: par gyur te / nyam thag rnams la rjes brtse bas //
T02D2628:15a-28: sems can yongs su 'dzin pas ni //
T02D2628:15a-29: dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs pa ste //
T02D2628:15a-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni ;
T02D2628:15a-32: / byang chub sems ni gnyis pa'o //
T02D2628:15a-34: de la ni mi choms pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:15a-35: de nas de lta bu'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2628:15a-36: steng du dbus su h'um tha ma na tshur aom
T02D2628:15a-38: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ni /
T02D2628:15a-39: shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe sv'a h'a //
T02D2628:15a-40: zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba de rnams kyang mar me'i phreng ba bskor ba ltar g-yo ba dang /
T02D2628:15a-41: ldem pa dang 'od dang zer du bcas pa rnams dang /
T02D2628:15a-42: rnam par shes pa mi gnas na yang gnas par gnas bzhin du bsgom mo //
T02D2628:15a-43: de las 'od zer spro ba dang /
T02D2628:15a-44: bsdu bas rdo rje rtse lnga bar bsgom ste /
T02D2628:15b-1: byang chub bskal pa grangs med gsum //
T02D2628:15b-2: bsdus pa dag ni chos nyid da /
T02D2628:15b-3: dam chos mchog gi grangs med pa'i //
T02D2628:15b-4: spyad pa spyod pa'i mchog yin no //
T02D2628:15b-5: sa dang sa min legs rtogs shing //
T02D2628:15b-6: zag med ye shes dag pa'o //
T02D2628:15b-7: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2628:15b-8: rdo rje chos can gyis brtags pa //
T02D2628:15b-9: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2628:15b-10: de la ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:15b-11: byin gyis brlabs nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2628:15b-12: de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor
T02D2628:15b-13: bas ye shes lnga la sogs pa spros pa thams
T02D2628:15b-14: cad dang bral ba'i ye shes thams cad dang /
T02D2628:15b-15: lha thams cad kyi sku rdo rje dbyings dang /
T02D2628:15b-16: gsung dang thugs thams cad kyi rdo rje dbyings thams
T02D2628:15b-17: cad snying gar bsdus te gcig tu brtan par bya'o
T02D2628:15b-19: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku yang yin //
T02D2628:15b-20: skyon med snang ba med pa ste //
T02D2628:15b-21: bcos min ma skyes dag pa dang //
T02D2628:15b-22: dngos med la sogs rnam spangs pa //
T02D2628:15b-23: rdzas med chos kyi sku nyid ni //
T02D2628:15b-24: 'di ni mi chod mi shig pa'o //
T02D2628:15b-25: rdo rje bdag nyid legs 'byung pa'i //
T02D2628:15b-26: rdo rje sku ni bla med pa'o //
T02D2628:15b-28: ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyal po
T02D2628:15b-29: zhes bya ba kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2628:15b-30: skur phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
T02D2628:15b-31: lus dang de bzhin sbyong ba dang //
T02D2628:15b-32: sbyong dang de bzhin rtogs pa dang //
T02D2628:15b-33: mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga //
T02D2628:15b-34: sangs rgyas kun bdag bzang po'o //
T02D2628:15b-36: sku mdog ni dung ltar dkar ba /
T02D2628:15b-37: me tog kun da ltar snum la 'dril ba /
T02D2628:15b-38: zla ba ltar 'od dang ldan pa zhal bzhi pa la dbu mthon mthing lcang lor 'khyil ba //
T02D2628:15b-39: rdo rje mtshan pa'i seng ge'i gdan padma kha dog
T02D2628:15b-40: sna tshogs pa'i dbus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2628:15b-41: steng na rdo rje skyil krung du bzhugs pa /
T02D2628:15b-42: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2628:15b-43: ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan par bsgoms te de ltar 'di nyid las //
T02D2628:15b-44: dbus kyi phyogs su kun rig ni /
T02D2628:15b-45: dung dang kun da zla 'dra la //
T02D2628:15b-46: zhal bzhi ba la rdo rje yis //
T02D2628:15b-47: seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa dang //
T02D2628:15b-48: ting 'dzin phyag rgya ldan pa dang //
T02D2628:15b-49: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bri //
T02D2628:16a-0: de nas nam mkha' las byung pa'i rin po che'i dbang @16a * //
T02D2628:16a-2: spyan ras gzigs kyi chos kyi ye shes bskyed pa dang /
T02D2628:16a-3: cho 'phrul bzhis kyang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2628:16a-4: snying gar rdo rje bsgoms pa dang /
T02D2628:16a-5: dbral bar rin po che bsgom pa dang /
T02D2628:16a-7: spyi bor rgya gram bsgom pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa dang ;
T02D2628:16a-10: mchod pa'i cho 'phrul lo zhes slob dpon la la dag bzhed do //
T02D2628:16a-11: bdag gis ni rigs par ma mthong ste /
T02D2628:16a-12: sems ma bzhis gnas bzhir byin gyis brlab par 'dod do //
T02D2628:16a-13: ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2628:16a-14: sngags kyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas pa //
T02D2628:16a-15: de ltar bdag kyang sangs rgyas so //
T02D2628:16a-17: rig pa chen mo zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngags kyi mthus bcom pa ste /
T02D2628:16a-18: da ltar sho dha ne'i sngags kyi phreng ba ye
T02D2628:16a-19: shes kyi 'od zer dang bcas pa'i 'phro 'du las
T02D2628:16a-20: sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi rgyud kyi
T02D2628:16a-21: 'ching ba 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug thams cad
T02D2628:16a-22: rnam par chad nas skye bo lha dang mi phun
T02D2628:16a-24: dmyal ba yi dags byol song gi ngan song thams
T02D2628:16a-25: cad rnam par sbyangs nas tsha grang la sogs pa'i
T02D2628:16a-26: sdug bsngal mi bzad ba rnams rab tu zhi ste
T02D2628:16a-27: / skye bo rnams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:16a-28: de ltar bskyed pa de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2628:16a-29: 'khor bsgoms pa'i dbus su h'um gi mtha' ma na
T02D2628:16a-30: tshur sho dha ne'i sngags kyi phreng ba snga ma
T02D2628:16a-32: gzhan yang 'og nas 'byung ba'i sngags rnams las skad cig mas sam /
T02D2628:16a-33: spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bskyed la /
T02D2628:16a-34: lha de dag gi thugs kar yang sho dha ne'i sngags la sogs pa bkod la /
T02D2628:16a-35: de dag kyang g-yo ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2628:16a-36: de nas sngags de dag las 'od zer 'phros pas dkyil 'khor gyi lha gsal /
T02D2628:16a-37: de nas bdag nyid kyi khong pa'i nang gsal bar 'gyur /
T02D2628:16a-38: de nas thugs dpal be'u dang /
T02D2628:16a-40: ba spu'i bu gnas ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros
T02D2628:16a-41: pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
T02D2628:16a-42: khams steng 'og min gyi gnas man chad nas /
T02D2628:16a-43: 'og dmyal ba tsha grangs yan chad du khyab pas
T02D2628:16b-0: 'od @16b zer de las sngags ngan song gsum gzhom
T02D2628:16b-1: pa'i sngags rgyud phyi ma nas 'byung bas sems can
T02D2628:16b-2: rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings ba
T02D2628:16b-3: bkrol zhing bcad nas sku gsung thugs kyi sngags kyis
T02D2628:16b-5: slar 'dus pas sems can thams cad bdag nyid kyi nye 'khor du bkug go //
T02D2628:16b-6: bkug nas gong gi byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags kyis
T02D2628:16b-7: gnas nyi shu ru snod du rung bar byin gyis
T02D2628:16b-8: brlabs so // de nas khams gsum gyi sems can
T02D2628:16b-9: de dag nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste
T02D2628:16b-10: brlabs so // gnas so // de nas yang ye
T02D2628:16b-11: shes kyi 'od zer gong ma ltar 'phros pas ye
T02D2628:16b-12: shes kyi 'od zer dang sku gsung thugs spyan drangs
T02D2628:16b-13: te bstims pas dbang bskur ba'i nus pa dang ldan
T02D2628:16b-14: brlabs so // gnas so // par byas so // bdag nyid kyang de'i byin gyis brlabs so //
T02D2628:16b-15: de nas rig pa'i dbang dang /
T02D2628:16b-21: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa bskur bas
T02D2628:16b-22: sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa thams cad rnam
T02D2628:16b-23: par bcad do zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:16b-24: de nas phyir byung ste nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de /
T02D2628:16b-25: kye ma sangs rgyas kye sangs rgyas //
T02D2628:16b-26: zhes bya ba'i bstod pas kyang bstod do //
T02D2628:16b-27: de nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor la bdag gis kyang mchod cing bstod de /
T02D2628:16b-28: zhib tu mchog sdebs las shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:16b-29: des ni sbyor ba dang po dang nang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D2628:16b-30: da ni dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston te /
T02D2628:16b-31: de ltar bdag bskyed nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bstan to //
T02D2628:16b-32: de yang dang po stong pa'i don shes par bya ba dang /
T02D2628:16b-33: 'byung ba rim gyis bskyed nas bhr'um las gzhal yas
T02D2628:16b-34: khang slob dpon gyis las kyi rim ba las 'byung
T02D2628:16b-36: de'i nang du seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa bsams
T02D2628:16b-37: te gdan gyi steng du sems dpa'i skyil krung la
T02D2628:16b-38: sogs mngon par byang chub pa bstan pas gnas pa'am
T02D2628:16b-39: / thabs dang shes rab zhu ba'i tshul gyis bskyed pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:16b-40: dbang bskur ba yang byas nas /
T02D2628:17a-0: bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs gnas lha rnams gdon par @17a * //
T02D2628:17a-2: / de yang thugs ka nas zla ba'i dbus su /
T02D2628:17a-3: aom sho dha ne sho dha ya sarba aa b'a ya sarba stve bhya:/
T02D2628:17a-4: h'um zhes pa'i sngags de rnams dbus nas shar phyogs
T02D2628:17a-5: su rim pas sngags kyi phreng ba'i tshul du bskor
T02D2628:17a-6: te / phyogs bzhir bkod pa bsgom mo //
T02D2628:17a-8: sems can gyi rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang /
T02D2628:17a-9: 'bras bu sdug bsngal bkrol zhing bcad nas slar 'dus
T02D2628:17a-10: ba las sngags kyi phreng ba'i yig 'bru rnams la
T02D2628:17a-11: thim pa las 'od du zhu ba las rin po
T02D2628:17a-12: che sngon po zur gsum pa cig tu gyur to
T02D2628:17a-13: // de las spro ba dang bsdu ba las rigs
T02D2628:17a-14: lnga'i sku gsung thugs thams cad 'dus nas rin po
T02D2628:17a-15: che la thim bas brtan par byas so //
T02D2628:17a-16: de las sku phra mo mang bo spro ba dang
T02D2628:17a-17: bsdu bas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro
T02D2628:17a-18: ba'i don byas nas slar 'dus ba rin po che
T02D2628:17a-19: la thim bas bcom ldan 'das rin chen tog mnyam
T02D2628:17a-20: pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi ngo bo'i skur gyur
T02D2628:17a-21: te / bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas bton
T02D2628:17a-22: nas bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas ba las nam
T02D2628:17a-23: mkha' las byung ba'i rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis
T02D2628:17a-24: te / dbang bskur ro // de nas rdo rje
T02D2628:17a-25: sems dpa' la sogs pas kyang byin gyis gnas bzhir
T02D2628:17a-26: te / dbang bskur ro // brlab po // dam
T02D2628:17a-27: tshig gi phyag rgya lag tu byin nas ming rin
T02D2628:17a-28: chen tog ces lan gsum bos te dbang bskur nas
T02D2628:17a-29: te / dbang bskur ro // brlab po // / rang gi las la gzhag ste /
T02D2628:17a-30: lho phyogs su re'u mig la sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2628:17a-31: de bzhin du thams cad 'og nas 'byung ba la yang shes par bya'o ;
T02D2628:17a-32: / de yang kun tu bzang po byang chub sems la gnas pa dang /
T02D2628:17a-33: de dag gi 'phro 'du las dam tshig gi phyag rgyar gyur pa dang /
T02D2628:17a-34: de la sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings su bsdu ba dang /
T02D2628:17a-35: de nas so so'i skur gyur te dkyil 'khor du dgod pa dang /
T02D2628:17a-36: de la dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:17a-38: ming gdags shing las bcol ba ni gong ltar ro //
T02D2628:17a-39: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni h'um
T02D2628:17a-40: phat ces pas spro ba dang bsdu ba las rdo
T02D2628:17a-42: de'i sku 'phro 'du las ni sh'akya thub pa'i skur gyur to //
T02D2628:17a-43: de la yang byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur
T02D2628:17b-0: ba dang ming btags nas @17b nub kyi rdo rje
T02D2628:17b-1: padmas mtshan pa'i steng du dgod do //
T02D2628:17b-2: yang aom badzra trat ces ba'i sngags kyi yi ge
T02D2628:17b-3: las 'phro ba dang 'du ba las rdo rje rgya
T02D2628:17b-4: gram du gyur / de'i 'phro 'du las brtan par gyur to //
T02D2628:17b-5: de'i 'phro 'du las me tog cher rgyas kyi skur gyur te /
T02D2628:17b-9: phyag rgya sbyin pa la sogs pa byas nas byang
T02D2628:17b-10: phyogs kyi rdo rje rgya gram gyis mtshan pa'i padma
T02D2628:17b-11: dang zla ba'i steng na bzhugs so //
T02D2628:17b-12: de nas yang thugs ka'i h'um las spros shing 'dus
T02D2628:17b-13: pa la rdo rje de'i spro bsdu brtan par gyur
T02D2628:17b-14: / de'i 'phro 'dus ngan song sbyong ba'i skur bskyed /
T02D2628:17b-15: de spro ba dang bsdu bas 'gro ba'i don byas /
T02D2628:17b-19: dam tshig byin nas ming btags te rdo rjes mtshan
T02D2628:17b-20: ba'i padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D2628:17b-22: sangs rgyas bzhi po de yang rin chen 'byung ldan la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo dang //
T02D2628:17b-23: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa'i ngo
T02D2628:17b-24: bo las byung ba thams cad seng ge'i gdan rin
T02D2628:17b-25: po che la sogs pa rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan
T02D2628:17b-27: sngags de rnams ni bskyed ba'i rkyen yang yin la de dag thugs kar dgod pa yang yin la /
T02D2628:17b-28: sku'i tsa ka li dgod pa yang yin no //
T02D2628:17b-29: bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags 'dis ni sku de dag gi skyed pa yang byed la /
T02D2628:17b-30: phyi ma nas lha mo dang bskal bzang nas 'gro
T02D2628:17b-31: ba rigs drug pa bskyed pa la sogs pa bya'o
T02D2628:17b-32: zhes 'byung / yang na sngags ring po 'di dang h'um gis ni gtso bo'i sku bskyed la /
T02D2628:17b-33: sho dha ne'i sngags kyis ni shar phyogs kyi ngan
T02D2628:17b-34: song sbyong ba bskyed do zhes 'byung ste nyes pa
T02D2628:17b-35: med do // gzhan yang snying po dang nye ba'i
T02D2628:17b-36: snying po zhes 'byung ba ni snying po ni sku
T02D2628:17b-37: med do // bskyed pa'o // nye ba'i snying po ni thugs kar dgod pa'o //
T02D2628:17b-38: da ni ye shes kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:17b-39: de yang bskyed pa'i snying po ni sarba bti bcu gnyis kyis bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:17b-40: sarba bti ces pa ni thams cad rig pa zhes zer to /
T02D2628:17b-41: de nyid ye shes nyid yin pas ye shes kyi sems dpa' bcu drug bskyed do //
T02D2628:17b-42: de yang bskyed pa'i thabs ni badzra sa tva zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags bcu drug dang /
T02D2628:18a-2: de la sgra yig bcu gnyis sangs rgyas kyi sa bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2628:18a-3: de yang dpal rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud
T02D2628:18a-4: las de bzhin gshegs bas sa bcu gnyis gsungs te
T02D2628:18a-7: bdud rtsi'i 'od ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D2628:18a-9: nam mkha'i 'od ni gsum pa ste //
T02D2628:18a-10: nam mkha' ji bzhin so sor gnas //
T02D2628:18a-11: rdo rje 'di ni zhi ba ste //
T02D2628:18a-12: sa de nyid ni yid dga' ba'o //
T02D2628:18a-13: bsam pa nang gi brtan sbyor bas //
T02D2628:18a-14: rdo rje zhes ni yongs su btags //
T02D2628:18a-15: lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya //
T02D2628:18a-16: dbang bskur ba la rab tu gnas //
T02D2628:18a-18: padma bzhin du rab tu skye //
T02D2628:18a-19: rang bzhin dag pa chos nyid phyir //
T02D2628:18a-20: dri ma med pa yongs su bzung //
T02D2628:18a-21: bdun pa las kyi 'od ces pa //
T02D2628:18a-22: sangs rgyas phrin las byed par 'dod //
T02D2628:18a-23: brgyad pa dpe med bya ba ni //
T02D2628:18a-24: de la dpe ni yod ma yin //
T02D2628:18a-25: dpe ldan zhes pa dgu pa ste //
T02D2628:18a-26: thams cad dpe ni so sor 'bigs //
T02D2628:18a-27: bcu pa shes rab 'od ces pa //
T02D2628:18a-28: sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med //
T02D2628:18a-29: bcu gcig thams cad mkhyen pa nyid //
T02D2628:18a-30: sa chen rab tu 'od gsal ba //
T02D2628:18a-31: bcu gnyis so so rang rig pa //
T02D2628:18a-32: rnal 'byor ye shes rab tu rdzogs //
T02D2628:18a-34: de yang aa la sogs pas bskyed pa'o //
T02D2628:18a-35: badzra satva zhes pa sngags bcu drug dang /
T02D2628:18a-37: stong pa bcu drug ni tha dad pa ma yin te ye shes bcu drug go //
T02D2628:18a-38: ye shes de'i rang bzhin sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02D2628:18a-39: de la sgra yig bcu gnyis dang /
T02D2628:18a-41: aom badzra satva zhes pa'i sngags bcu drug dang /
T02D2628:18a-42: rtsa ba'i snying po 'bru re ba las ye shes kyi sems dpa' bskyed do //
T02D2628:18a-43: de yang ye shes las bskyed pa dang /
T02D2628:18a-44: pha rol tu phyin pa las bskyed pa'o //
T02D2628:18a-45: ye shes kyi cha las skyes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:18a-46: pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byams pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:18a-47: de la ye shes sems dpa' rnams ni sgra yig la sogs pa las skyes pa'o //
T02D2628:18a-48: de la yang sgra yig ni /
T02D2628:18a-49: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ae aee aoo aoo aam aa: zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags dang /
T02D2628:18b-0: aom sarba bti sarba a'a ba ra @18b na bi
T02D2628:18b-1: sho dha ya ha na h'um phat ces pa la
T02D2628:18b-2: sogs pa dkyus na yod pa rnams so //
T02D2628:18b-3: de yang bcom ldan 'das kun rig rnam par snang
T02D2628:18b-4: mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2628:18b-5: su sgra yig dang po aa de'i mtha' man tshur
T02D2628:18b-6: aom badzra satva h'um zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng bas
T02D2628:18b-7: bskor ba'o // de'i phyi rim na tshur aom sarba
T02D2628:18b-8: bti sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha ya
T02D2628:18b-9: ha na h'um phat ces pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba'i
T02D2628:18b-11: de rnams kyang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D2628:18b-12: dang g-yo 'gul la sogs pa ni snga ma bzhin
T02D2628:18b-13: du phyi ma rnams kyang de ltar ro //
T02D2628:18b-14: de nas sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba de rnams
T02D2628:18b-15: las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros shing 'dus pa
T02D2628:18b-16: las rim pa bzhin du aa la thim /
T02D2628:18b-17: aa 'od du zhu ste h'um du gyur to //
T02D2628:18b-18: h'um 'phros shing 'dus pa las rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur to //
T02D2628:18b-19: de'i bum pa la yang yi ge h'um gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2628:18b-20: de la ye shes kyi 'od 'phros pas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D2628:18b-21: rdo rje dang rin po che dang /
T02D2628:18b-23: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa rnams kyi sku gsung
T02D2628:18b-24: thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa thams cad bsdus
T02D2628:18b-25: nas slar rdo rje la thim pa las shin tu
T02D2628:18b-26: brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'am mi g-yo bar gyur to
T02D2628:18b-27: // de nas yang rdo rje las de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:18b-28: pa'i sku phra mo mang po 'phros pas gdul bya'i
T02D2628:18b-29: snod ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad
T02D2628:18b-30: pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar 'dus te rdo
T02D2628:18b-31: rje la thim pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i sku
T02D2628:18b-32: phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
T02D2628:18b-33: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka na bzhugs so //
T02D2628:18b-34: yang de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags snga ma bzhin du bkod de /
T02D2628:18b-35: sngags de brjod de bskul ba'i tshul gyis thugs ka nas bton te /
T02D2628:18b-36: phyogs bcur 'phros pa'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lhums nas bltams pa dang /
T02D2628:18b-37: gzhon nu rol rtsed mdzad pa la sogs pa /
T02D2628:18b-38: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2628:18b-39: bdag gis mdun na bka' sngod [*sdod?] pa'i tshul du
T02D2628:18b-40: gnas pa las gnas bzhir rang gi phyag rgyar byin
T02D2628:18b-43: lag tu rdo rje byin pa dang /
T02D2628:18b-44: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes ming gi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:18b-45: rang gi las la bkod de 'khor lo chen po
T02D2628:19a-0: rtsibs bcu drug shar phyogs kyi rtsibs dang po @19a
T02D2628:19a-1: *// la gdan sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2628:19a-3: de bzhin du 'og ma rnams kyang shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:19a-4: dza:dang ho:la sogs pa sngags kyi yi ge 'bru re re ba dang /
T02D2628:19a-5: aa la sogs pa bcu gcig dang //
T02D2628:19a-7: aom badzra r'a dz'a zhes bya ba dang ;
T02D2628:19a-8: aom sarba bti h'um zhes bya ba las sngags kyi
T02D2628:19a-9: 'od 'phros pa las sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas
T02D2628:19a-10: nas slar zla ba la 'khod de dam tshig gi
T02D2628:19a-12: de dag yang 'phro pa dang 'du ba las sku
T02D2628:19a-13: gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dbyings thams cad zhugs pas
T02D2628:19a-15: yang de las so so'i skur gyur te /
T02D2628:19a-16: de'i thugs kar yang mtshan gyi sngags kyi dbus su
T02D2628:19a-17: rang bzhin dza dang ho la sogs pa sngags kyi
T02D2628:19a-19: rigs kyi yi ge bkod pa las sngags brjod pas
