T02D2628:19a-21: pa byas nas slar byon pa las phyir 'khor lo'i
T02D2628:19a-22: rtsibs gnyis la sogs pa kun bzhag la /
T02D2628:19a-23: de la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:19a-26: lag tu dam tshig sbyin pa la sogs kun la shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:19a-27: sgra yig gang dang gang las sems dpa' gang dang
T02D2628:19a-28: gang bskyed pa ni aa las rdo rje sems dpa'o
T02D2628:19a-29: // a'a las rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D2628:19a-30: ai las rdo rje chags pa'o //
T02D2628:19a-31: a'i las rdo rje legs pa'o //
T02D2628:19a-32: au las rdo rje rin chen no //
T02D2628:19a-33: a'u las rdo rje gzi brjid do //
T02D2628:19a-34: ae las rdo rje rgyal mtshan no //
T02D2628:19a-35: aee las rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
T02D2628:19a-36: ao las rdo rje chos so //
T02D2628:19a-37: aoo las rdo rje rnon po'o //
T02D2628:19a-39: aa: las rdo rje smra ba'o //
T02D2628:19a-40: au las rdo rje las so //
T02D2628:19a-41: a'u las rdo rje bsrung ba'o //
T02D2628:19a-42: ae las rdo rje gnod sbyin no //
T02D2628:19a-43: ae las rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2628:19a-44: rin po che'i rigs dang las kyi rigs ni bskyed pa'i yi ge 'dra ste /
T02D2628:19a-45: yo ga la rigs bzhir 'dod de /
T02D2628:19a-47: las dang byed pa gnyis gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2628:19a-48: la la dag ni 'di bcu gnyis las zla ba bskyed la /
T02D2628:19a-49: a'a li bcu gnyis las sems dpa' bcu drug bskyed la /
T02D2628:19a-50: rtsa ba'i rig sngags ni dkyil 'khor du dgod la /
T02D2628:19a-51: yi ge 'bru re la ni de dag gi snying gar zla ba'i steng du bsam mo zhes so //
T02D2628:19a-52: la la dag ni a'a li stong pa bcu drug
T02D2628:19b-0: @19b gi rang bzhin bas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D2628:19b-1: / yi ge 'bru re ba ni rang rang gi mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs pa bskyed la /
T02D2628:19b-2: rtsa ba'i sngags badzra satva la sogs pas ni skur gyur la /
T02D2628:19b-3: bti bcu gnyis kyis ni lha de dag gi thugs
T02D2628:19b-4: kar zla ba'i steng na gnas nas ngan song la
T02D2628:19b-5: sogs pa sbyong ngo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2628:19b-6: stong ba bcu drug dang sems dpa' dang /
T02D2628:19b-7: dbyangs yig tu sbyar ba ni 'og nas 'byung bas 'dir ma bris te /
T02D2628:19b-9: mangs pas skrag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2628:19b-10: bti ni rig pa yin la rig pa ni ye shes te /
T02D2628:19b-11: ye shes las bskyed pa ni sems dpa' bcu drug go //
T02D2628:19b-12: de yis rgyu'i sgo nas 'bras bu yang de bzhin te /
T02D2628:19b-13: sems dpa' bskyed pa'i sngags la yang bti rig pa zhes gdags so //
T02D2628:19b-14: 'o na bskal bzang nas 'gro ba rigs drug yan
T02D2628:19b-15: chad kun ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las
T02D2628:19b-16: skye na zhe'o / de yang bden te thugs ye
T02D2628:19b-17: shes las skyes pa yang 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi dbang
T02D2628:19b-18: du bya ste thams cad 'byung du 'dra na yang
T02D2628:19b-20: sngags kyi ye shes las skyes pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang /
T02D2628:19b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sems dpa'o //
T02D2628:19b-22: 'on kyang bti bcu gnyis ni sngags kyi sems dpar nges so //
T02D2628:19b-23: sngags kyi sems dpa' de dag la gnas bzhir byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2628:19b-24: ye shes chen po lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2628:19b-25: da ni yum bzhi bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:19b-26: de yang rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'i zla
T02D2628:19b-27: ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge ya ra la wa
T02D2628:19b-28: bzhi bkod pa'i mtha' man tshur satva badzri /
T02D2628:19b-32: zhes sngags kyi phreng ba bkod pa'i 'phro 'du las dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje dang /
T02D2628:19b-35: rgya gram dang bzhir gyur to //
T02D2628:19b-36: de'i 'phro 'du las yum bzhi'i sku bskyed de /
T02D2628:19b-40: sgrol ma bzhir gyur te thugs ka na gnas so //
T02D2628:19b-41: yang de dag gi so so'i thugs kar rang rang
T02D2628:19b-42: gi sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba bkod nas sngags
T02D2628:19b-43: brjod de bskul ba'i tshul gyis phyi rol du 'phros
T02D2628:19b-44: te / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas slar 'dus pa nyid la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:20a-0: dam tshig gi phyag rgya lag @20a * //
T02D2628:20a-2: ming gi dbang bskur nas las la bzhag ste nang gi re'u mig gi gra bzhir bzhugs so //
T02D2628:20a-3: kha cig na re yum bzhi po 'di dag ni
T02D2628:20a-4: rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las kyang sku'i phyag rgya
T02D2628:20a-5: ma byung ste / dam tshig gi phyag rgyar ram /
T02D2628:20a-6: rang gi rigs kyi mtshan mar te //
T02D2628:20a-8: sangs rgyas spyan dang m'a ma k'i //
T02D2628:20a-9: de bzhin gos dkar sgrol ma rnams //
T02D2628:20a-10: rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma bzhin //
T02D2628:20a-11: grva yi phyogs ni kun du bri //
T02D2628:20a-13: nang gi lha mo rnams ni yi ge sha las ni sgeg mo ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-14: yi ge sha las ni phreng ba ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-15: yi ges yis ni dbyangs mkhan ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-16: yi ge ha yis ni gar mkhan ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-17: yi ge kasha yis ni spos me ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-18: yi ge ra yis ni me tog ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-19: yi ge la yis ni mar me ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-20: yi ge wa yis ni dri chab ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-21: yi ge tsa yis ni lcags kyu ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-22: yi ge tsha yis ni zhags pa ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-23: yi ge dza yis ni lcags sgrog ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-24: yi ge dzha yis ni dril bu ma'o //
T02D2628:20a-25: ngan song sbyong ba'i sngags ring las ni byams pa nas /
T02D2628:20a-26: 'gro ba rigs drug yan chad bskyed par bya ste rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags dbus so //
T02D2628:20a-27: de rnams las ji lta bar dbyibs dang kha dog bskyed par bya ste rdul tshon du'o //
T02D2628:20a-28: des ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02D2628:20a-29: da ni phan yon bstan to //
T02D2628:20a-31: gson po la ji ltar byas na phan yon che ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-32: tsha'i dus byas pa la ji ltar byas na phan yon che ba bstan te /
T02D2628:20a-33: lha'i dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:20a-34: phyi ma dkyus na gsal bsam bris so //
T02D2628:20a-35: dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad ni sa gnyan dral ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-36: bud med rgan mo dang nyal ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-37: min bzhin du sman za ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-38: khong steng na nyal ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-39: gdon 'byung po yod pa'i sa phyogs su gcig pur 'gro ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-40: nad pas sman pa'i ngag mi nyan pa dang /
T02D2628:20a-42: mi thub pa la sogs pa dgrar len pa ni dus ma yin bar 'chi ba'o //
T02D2628:20a-43: dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang 'brel pa ni /
T02D2628:20a-44: chu chen po brgal ba dang /
T02D2628:20a-47: dug 'thung ba rnams ni 'chi ba dang 'brel pa'o //
T02D2628:20b-0: @20b rmi lam gyi rnam pa ni sum cu rtsa gcig ste /
T02D2628:20b-4: sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-5: yi dags gyis mthu 'phrogs pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-9: sa gzhi mi gtsang bas gang ba dang //
T02D2628:20b-12: gzhan gyis mgor phog pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-15: mi gtsang bas lus byugs pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-16: khyim la me shor ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-17: mi gtsang ba'i sbubs su lhung ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-18: mi bsngags pa'i zhal lces 'debs pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-19: sgra mi snyan pa grags pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-22: mgo la me shor ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-23: rgyal po'i chad pas go rar bcug pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-24: bdog pa gzhan gyis phrogs pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-25: gcan gzan mchu can gyis sha za ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-29: mya ngan gyi nang na 'dug pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-30: bdud kyi zhags pas bzung ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-32: phongs pa'i mi rnams shi ba dang /
T02D2628:20b-35: da ni sems can tshe'i dus byas pa ngan song du skyes na /
T02D2628:20b-36: dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur na thar pa'i thabs ston te /
T02D2628:20b-37: skyes pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
T02D2628:20b-38: shi ba'i lus la gnas nyi shu ru gong gi
T02D2628:20b-39: sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs nas dbang bskur na yon
T02D2628:20b-40: tan 'di rnams thob par 'gyur ro zhes te /
T02D2628:20b-42: da ni rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan te /
T02D2628:20b-43: de la yang zhus pa dang /
T02D2628:20b-45: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po zhes bya ba
T02D2628:20b-46: nas bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gyis zhus
T02D2628:20b-47: pa ston te / dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:20b-48: de nas zhus pa'i lan gsungs te /
T02D2628:20b-49: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:20b-50: de nas zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i rjes thogs la bya'o //
T02D2628:20b-51: bcom ldan 'das ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das so //
T02D2628:20b-52: sh'akya ni de'i rigs su skyes shing sku gsung thugs bsrung ba gsum dang ldan pas thub pas te /
T02D2628:20b-53: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi phyir ro //
T02D2628:21a-0: @21a * // ji ltar song ba de bzhin gshegs pas na /
T02D2628:21a-3: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba ni ye shes ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T02D2628:21a-4: de las byung ba'i ye shes chen po lnga la ni rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:21a-5: de bas ni de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi
T02D2628:21a-6: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin med pa de
T02D2628:21a-7: la ni chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:21a-8: 'di ni blo la gnas pa gsungs so //
T02D2628:21a-9: sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub sems //
T02D2628:21a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2628:21a-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba
T02D2628:21a-12: dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad kyi
T02D2628:21a-13: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi bdag po bde bar
T02D2628:21a-14: gshegs pa lnga rnams gcig tu gyur pa /
T02D2628:21a-15: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rtag pa dang /
T02D2628:21a-16: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa
T02D2628:21a-17: me long lta bu'i ye shes mi 'khrugs pa dang
T02D2628:21a-18: / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid rnam par dag
T02D2628:21a-19: pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rin chen 'byung
T02D2628:21a-20: / ba dang ; yid kyi rnam par shes pa
T02D2628:21a-21: rnams par dag pa so sor kun rtog pa'i ye
T02D2628:21a-22: shes 'od dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2628:21a-23: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa
T02D2628:21a-24: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes don yod grub
T02D2628:21a-25: pa rnams so // 'o na bde bar gshegs pa ni mtha' yas pa'i grangs yod na /
T02D2628:21a-26: 'di lnga la kun zhes bya ba mi 'gal lam zhe na /
T02D2628:21a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de'i rigs kyang mtha' yas pa ste /
T02D2628:21a-29: de dag kyang bsdu na rigs ldar 'dus te /
T02D2628:21a-30: de la rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D2628:21a-31: mtha' yas rigs rnams thams cad kyang //
T02D2628:21a-32: rigs ni rnam pa brgyar bshad pa //
T02D2628:21a-33: de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje dang //
T02D2628:21a-34: padma rin chen las kyi rigs //
T02D2628:21a-35: mdor bsdus na ni rnam pa lnga //
T02D2628:21a-37: de yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2628:21a-38: ye shes lnga kho na dbang gis bsdus na rgyal ba yang rigs lnga kho na'o //
T02D2628:21a-39: de ltar sangs rgyas ma lus pa de dag gi byang chub sems ni gang zhe na /
T02D2628:21a-40: de ni sbyong ba'i rgyud 'di las rgyu'i ye shes byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang /
T02D2628:21a-41: 'bras bu gsum ste lnga yin pas /
T02D2628:21a-42: de ni gzhan gyi byang chub las mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir na bla na med pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:21b-0: de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems de su'i yul yin @21b zhe na /
T02D2628:21b-1: rtog gyur pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2628:21b-2: bla zhes bya ba ni mdun du'am sngon du zhes thal ba la bsnyag par bya'o //
T02D2628:21b-3: de yang rgyud 'di'i sngon du ni rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D2628:21b-4: de kho na nyid bsdus pa byung ba las byang
T02D2628:21b-5: chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub pas rtogs par
T02D2628:21b-7: gang rtogs par gyur na byang chub kyi sems lnga'o //
T02D2628:21b-8: gang gis rtogs par byas she na /
T02D2628:21b-10: sngon du sangs rgyas pa'i rgyal bde rnams kyis so //
T02D2628:21b-11: gang du rtogs par byas na byang chub kyi snying por ro //
T02D2628:21b-12: de yang sngags kyis sgor spyod pa'i sems dpa' rnams
T02D2628:21b-13: ni sngags kyi don slob dpon la rag las pa
T02D2628:21b-14: yin gyis / rang gi thug thub tu spyad pa
T02D2628:21b-15: ni mi rung ba'i phyir don thams cad grub pa
T02D2628:21b-16: ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub ni sangs rgyas
T02D2628:21b-17: snga ma la rag las pa ltar snang ngo //
T02D2628:21b-18: de'i phyir rigs bzhi'i sangs rgyas de dag gis btul
T02D2628:21b-19: zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen mdzad pa las dgongs te
T02D2628:21b-20: / 'dir yang byang chub kyi sems de brtan par bya ba'i phyir gsungs zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:21b-21: pa'i zhes bya ba'i don yang sngon du song pa la snyegs pa'i don te /
T02D2628:21b-22: 'di yang sngon du dpal de kho na nyid bsdus
T02D2628:21b-23: pa'i rgyud du don thams cad grub pa'i byang chub
T02D2628:21b-24: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo stug po bkod pa'i
T02D2628:21b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing byang chub kyi snying po na
T02D2628:21b-26: bzhugs pa las sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyis mngon par
T02D2628:21b-27: byang chub pa lnga bsngags shing phul ba zhes bya'o
T02D2628:21b-28: // ye shes gang zhes bya ba ni ma log
T02D2628:21b-29: pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la sbyor
T02D2628:21b-30: // ba las / yul so sor rtog par rig
T02D2628:21b-31: pas rang gi sems rig pa stong pa chen po
T02D2628:21b-32: // ba las / dang / gnyis pa byang chub tu sems bskyed pa me long ye shes dang /
T02D2628:21b-33: gsum pa chos kyi skur gnas pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
T02D2628:21b-34: bzhi pa brtan par byas pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2628:21b-35: lnga pa skur gyur pa bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:21b-36: yang slob dpon la la dag gi bzhed lugs kyis
T02D2628:21b-37: byang chub kyi sems rnam pa lnga las rang gi
T02D2628:21b-38: sems so sor rig pa dang /
T02D2628:21b-39: byang chub kyi sems skyes pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis rgyu'i ye shes zhes bya ste /
T02D2628:21b-40: de la ci'i phyir rgyu'i ye shes zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2628:22a-0: byang chub kyi sems dang po ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba'i @22a * //
T02D2628:22a-2: mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2628:22a-3: de'i 'og ma byang chub kyi sems ni sa gnyis
T02D2628:22a-4: pa nas sa bcu pa'i bar gyi ye shes te
T02D2628:22a-6: de'i phyir de gnyis ni rgyu'i ye shes 'phags pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2628:22a-7: de ltar rgyu'i ye shes te zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:22a-8: gyi steng du 'bras bu'i ye shes rdo rje rtse
T02D2628:22a-10: ci'i phyir ye shes lnga la 'bras bu zhes bya zhe na /
T02D2628:22a-11: ye shes lnga ni chos kyi sku /
T02D2628:22a-12: chos kyi sku de yang rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don dang /
T02D2628:22a-13: sku gnyis 'byung ba la mthu yod par bya ba'i phyir brtag par bya'o //
T02D2628:22a-14: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bsgrub par bya
T02D2628:22a-15: ba'i phyir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku phyag rgya
T02D2628:22a-17: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams dang ye
T02D2628:22a-18: shes kyi tshogs ma lus pa thams cad ni yongs
T02D2628:22a-19: su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu dpag bsam gyi shing dang
T02D2628:22a-20: / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta
T02D2628:22a-21: bu'i ngo bo kun du bzang po byang chub kyi
T02D2628:22a-22: sems zhes bya ba byang chub kyi sems bla na
T02D2628:22a-23: me pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa /
T02D2628:22a-24: cis kyang mi shig cing 'jig rten dang 'jig rten
T02D2628:22a-25: las 'das pa thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyal po
T02D2628:22a-26: rang gi sems byin gyis brlabs nas brtan pa'i ye
T02D2628:22a-27: shes gang yin pa de ni sbyor ba'i rgyud kyi
T02D2628:22a-28: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi yang snying por de bzhin
T02D2628:22a-29: gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:22a-30: rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de'i don yang 'di lta snyegs te /
T02D2628:22a-31: dang por yon tan bcu dang ldan pas gnas yid du 'ong bar khrus la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2628:22a-32: stan bde ba la 'dug nas sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag byas nas /
T02D2628:22a-33: rdo rje sems dpa'i skur bdag nyid //
T02D2628:22a-34: chos rnams thams cad dngos med bar //
T02D2628:22a-35: sems kyi bsgom par byas pas ni //
T02D2628:22a-36: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2628:22a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa'i don gyis bsams la /
T02D2628:22a-38: de la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:22a-39: dbang dang mchod pa yan chad byas nas /
T02D2628:22a-40: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig mas bskyed nas
T02D2628:22a-41: ngan song nas drang zhing 'gugs pa la yan man
T02D2628:22a-42: gyi dbang gis rnam par grol ba'i lam la bzhag
T02D2628:22b-0: nas / des ngo @22b mtshar gyi stong pa nyid
T02D2628:22b-1: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa dang gdan bsams nas gong
T02D2628:22b-2: gi mngon par byang chub pa lngas bdag rnam par
T02D2628:22b-3: snang mdzad du 'og min du sangs rgyas pa'i tshul
T02D2628:22b-4: gyis sangs rgyas nas rin po che dbang bskur ba
T02D2628:22b-5: nas / dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi chos kyi
T02D2628:22b-6: ya shes bskyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las
T02D2628:22b-7: nas / dang / la bzhag ste / seng ge'i khri'i steng du 'dug ste /
T02D2628:22b-8: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ltar lha rnams sku bskyed pa dang /
T02D2628:22b-9: 'og nas 'byung ba'i las rgyal mchog ltar las rnam byas nas /
T02D2628:22b-10: de nas las la rjes su sbyor ba'i spyan drang ba dang /
T02D2628:22b-12: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab ba dang /
T02D2628:22b-14: byin gyis brlabs shing mchod pa dang /
T02D2628:22b-15: sngags kyi don la gnas pa yan chad byas nas rdo rje'i bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D2628:22b-16: bdag kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi skur gsal bar byas pa las /
T02D2628:22b-17: de'i thugs kar rnam par snang mdzad chen po bsams te /
T02D2628:22b-18: sangs rgyas de'i thugs kar shes rab kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya ste /
T02D2628:22b-20: rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don gsungs pa /
T02D2628:22b-21: rtsibs kyi lte ba yang dag 'dzin //
T02D2628:22b-22: rtsibs rnams lte ba la gnas pa //
T02D2628:22b-26: yi ge bhr'um las bskyed pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bcu
T02D2628:22b-27: drug pa mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu
T02D2628:22b-28: bkod pa'i lte ba de'i dkyil du yi ge h'um
T02D2628:22b-29: bsams te / bcom ldan 'das kun rig gi rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pa bsam par bya ste /
T02D2628:22b-30: yi ge'i kha dog ni dkar ba bsam mo //
T02D2628:22b-31: de la 'khor lo'i lte ba la re'u mig dgur
T02D2628:22b-32: byas pa la kun rig rnam par snang mdzad la
T02D2628:22b-34: yum gyi sngags rnams dgod do //
T02D2628:22b-35: de nas dang po'i mu khyud la aom sho dha
T02D2628:22b-36: ni sho dha ni sarba p'a pam bi sho dha
T02D2628:22b-37: ni shuddhe bi shuddhe sarba karma a'a ba ra na
T02D2628:22b-40: de'i phyir mi mu khyud gnyis pa la /
T02D2628:22b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis brjod pa sgra'i yi ge bcu gnyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:22b-42: de nas dang po lce nas brtsams nas ji tsam
T02D2628:22b-43: du bita bcu gnyis bkod pa ni rigs kyi mdog
T02D2628:23a-1: de'i phyi rim gyi mu khyud la rtsa ba'i sngags
T02D2628:23a-2: aom na mo bha ga ba ti sarba durga ti
T02D2628:23a-3: zhes bya ba'i sngags ring pos bskor ba'o //
T02D2628:23a-4: phyi rol gyi mu khyud gnyis pa la ka kha
T02D2628:23a-5: la sogs pa nas ha'i mthar thug pa'i yi ge
T02D2628:23a-6: dgod par bya'o // de ni 'khor lo'i sngags dgod pa'i rim pa'o ;
T02D2628:23a-7: /'khor lo'i dbus na gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las rdo rje /
T02D2628:23a-8: rdo rje'i lta ba la thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang
T02D2628:23a-9: bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rkyen
T02D2628:23a-10: / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad skyed
T02D2628:23a-11: pa'i dngos po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
T02D2628:23a-12: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi dngos po'o //
T02D2628:23a-13: don dam pa'i yig 'bru tshig 'bru thams cad kyi rkyen gyi dngos po yi ge h'um dgod do //
T02D2628:23a-14: de nas de las 'od byung bas nang gi sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal lo //
T02D2628:23a-15: de nas mi mdzes kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gsal lo /
T02D2628:23a-16: de nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab par
T02D2628:23a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams
T02D2628:23a-18: su song nas ma lus pa'i sems can gyi don
T02D2628:23a-19: byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2628:23a-20: byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor yang snang bar byas te /
T02D2628:23a-21: slar ye shes kyi rdo rje lan gsum bskor nas
T02D2628:23a-22: shes rab kyi ye shes de drangs te chos bdag
T02D2628:23a-23: med pa nyid kyis rang gi sgo nas btsud nas
T02D2628:23a-24: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil na gnas pa'i
T02D2628:23a-25: rdo rje dang h'um la thim nas gnas par bsgom
T02D2628:23a-26: par bya'o // de ltar rgyun du bsgoms pa la
T02D2628:23a-27: chags pa'i rnal 'byor pa sngags kyi sgo nas spyad
T02D2628:23a-28: pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das
T02D2628:23a-29: kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'i sgo nas
T02D2628:23a-31: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsam mo zhes pa dang /
T02D2628:23a-32: yi ge h'um gi gzugs kyi sgo nas de'i gzugs rjes su bsgom mo zhes so //
T02D2628:23a-33: de ltar rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis bsgoms pas
T02D2628:23a-34: de nyid sprul pa'i gzugs kyi skus dus ring mo
T02D2628:23a-35: ma yin pa kha nar 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar
T02D2628:23a-36: bzung ste mngon du byas so //
T02D2628:23a-37: nam mkha' bzhi la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2628:23a-38: chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D2628:23b-0: sku @23b dang lhan cig tu gnas pa yang mngon
T02D2628:23b-2: de ltar bsgom pa'i dbang de las tshe 'di kho
T02D2628:23b-3: na la sangs rgyas nyid kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D2628:23b-5: de ltar rim pa 'dis ngan song sbyong ba'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2628:23b-6: de nas sprul pa'i sku sh'akya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis byang chub kyi sems gsungs te /
T02D2628:23b-7: de la re zhig dang po'i sbyor ba kun sngon du byas nas /
T02D2628:23b-8: sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kar yi ge hr'i: las bskyed
T02D2628:23b-9: pa'i snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog dmar po ting
T02D2628:23b-10: nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang ldan pa bsgoms te
T02D2628:23b-11: de'i thugs kar lce brgyad pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyud
T02D2628:23b-12: bzhi dang ldan pa rtsa ba'i sngags la sogs pas
T02D2628:23b-13: yongs su bskor ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:23b-14: de nas lce brgyad pa la sa bon rnams ni
T02D2628:23b-15: aom sarba a'a ba ra na bi sho dha na
T02D2628:23b-16: badzra h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa bkod de
T02D2628:23b-17: / 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus na yi ge hr'i:las gyur pa'i padma rdo rjes mtshan ba bsam mo //
T02D2628:23b-18: de la yi ge hr'i:sa mtshan pa'o //
T02D2628:23b-19: spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma bzhin du rim pas byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:23b-20: de kho na bzhin dang po'i sbyor ba byas nas
T02D2628:23b-21: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' de'i
T02D2628:23b-22: thugs kar bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa sku mdog
T02D2628:23b-23: sngon po sa gnon gyi phyag rgya can bsgoms nas
T02D2628:23b-24: / de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa mu khyud bzhi dang ldan pa bsams la /
T02D2628:23b-25: mu khyud dang po la aom punye punye zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:23b-27: aom aa mi te aa mi ta aa mi tod bha be zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:23b-28: de'i lte bar rdo rje h'um gis mtshan pa'o//
T02D2628:23b-29: de kho na bzhin du spro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2628:23b-30: yang de kho na bzhin du yi ge bhr'um las
T02D2628:23b-31: bskyed pa'i rnam par snang mdzad de'i thugs kar rnam
T02D2628:23b-32: par snang mdzad chen po bsams te /
T02D2628:23b-33: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa cig bsams te /
T02D2628:23b-34: aom tr'am sv'a h'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2628:23b-35: bkod la de'i lte ba la bhr'um las 'khor lo
T02D2628:23b-36: bhr'um gyis mtshan pa bsam mo //
T02D2628:23b-37: de kho na nyid spro pa dang bsdu ba bya'o //
T02D2628:23b-38: de kho na bzhin du sngon du 'gro ba byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' 'am /
T02D2628:23b-40: bde ba chan po gang yang rung ba bsgoms pa'i thugs kar rigs kyi bdag po mi bskyod pa'am /
T02D2628:24a-1: rnam par snang mdzad gang yang rung ba bsgoms la /
T02D2628:24a-2: de'i thugs kar 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa bkod la /
T02D2628:24a-3: 'khor lo la badzra h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa bkod la /
T02D2628:24a-4: dbus su rigs kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa bsams la /
T02D2628:24a-5: de las 'od zer spro ba dang bsdu ba gong ma ltar ro //
T02D2628:24a-6: rdo rje nyi ma'i ni logs na'o //
T02D2628:24a-8: sangs rgyas kun gyis byang chub sems //
T02D2628:24a-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan to //
T02D2628:24a-10: da 'di yan chad ni slob dpon gyi las kyi rim pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad de ;
T02D2628:24a-11: de la yang dkyil 'khor bri ba dang /
T02D2628:24a-12: lha la sogs pa dgod pa dang /
T02D2628:24a-13: mchod pa gsum gyis bstan pa ste /
T02D2628:24a-14: de la yang dkyil 'khor bri ba ston te /
T02D2628:24a-15: de la yang tshon dgyes ba dang /
T02D2628:24a-17: de yang byin gyis brlabs pa ston te /
T02D2628:24a-18: de la yang sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag bsnyen pa bstan te /
T02D2628:24a-20: dbang bskur ba thob pas zla ba gcig gam lo
T02D2628:24a-21: gcig gi bar du rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad par
T02D2628:24a-22: bya'o // de la dang por khrus byas la de
T02D2628:24a-23: nas phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2628:24a-24: bas nyi ma re re zhing sngom pa bzung ba
T02D2628:24a-26: de nas sdig pa dral ba dang /
T02D2628:24a-27: phyag rgya thams cad 'grol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
T02D2628:24a-28: de nas snying gar dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:24a-29: yang na rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02D2628:24a-31: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms nas /
T02D2628:24a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phreng ba'i dbang
T02D2628:24a-36: bskur ba la sogs pa thams cad blangs la de
T02D2628:24a-37: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje lcags kyu la
T02D2628:24a-41: dbang du byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2628:24a-42: de nas chos dang las dang /
T02D2628:24a-43: phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab pa dang
T02D2628:24a-44: dbang bskur te las rnams la nges par sbyar bar
T02D2628:24a-45: bya'o // de la dang po re zhig kun rig
T02D2628:24b-0: rnam par snang mdzad kyi @24b phyag rgya chen po
T02D2628:24b-1: bcings la sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par
T02D2628:24b-2: mdzod cig ces rang gi las la nges par sbyar
T02D2628:24b-4: byams pa la sogs pa la dam pa'i chos kyi
T02D2628:24b-5: grong khyer yongs su skyongs shig ces bya ba yan
T02D2628:24b-6: chad kyis thams cad kyi thams cad du phyag rgya
T02D2628:24b-7: chen po bcings la rang gi las la mngon par
T02D2628:24b-8: sbyar ba yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:24b-9: de ltar las kyi mchog nges par bsgoms nas /
T02D2628:24b-10: yang rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor bas bsdu ba byas
T02D2628:24b-11: nas bstod pa dang dgug gzhug bcing ba la sogs
T02D2628:24b-13: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:24b-14: mchod yon sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2628:24b-15: phyi'i yo byad thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D2628:24b-16: sgeg mo la sogs pa dang /
T02D2628:24b-17: las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i mchod pa bcu drug dang /
T02D2628:24b-19: mchod pa'i khyad par thams cad kyis kyang legs par
T02D2628:24b-20: mchod la phyag bzhi byas nas sngags gsum gyi don
T02D2628:24b-21: gyis thams cad kyang bdag nyid do zhes bsgom mo
T02D2628:24b-22: // de nas mchod cing bstod de nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin la gnas te /
T02D2628:24b-23: yang mchod cing bstod la phyag rgya bkrol la dbang bskur te /
T02D2628:24b-24: go cha bgos nas mnyam pa'i thal mos mnyes par byas la /
T02D2628:24b-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas mchod yon phul te /
T02D2628:24b-26: slar byon pa'i phyir bskul te gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2628:24b-27: de nas rdo rje bsrung ba dang //
T02D2628:24b-29: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bdag nyid bsrung ba byas
T02D2628:24b-30: nas mchod rten gyi las la sogs pa'i bya ba
T02D2628:24b-31: bya'o // de ltar nyin re zhing thun bzhi'i sbyor bas rig pa'i brtul zhugs rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2628:24b-32: de ltar rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni gtsug lag khang ngam /
T02D2628:24b-38: grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi char yid dang rjes su mthun pa shin tu mnyam zhing snum pa /
T02D2628:24b-39: shar du gzhol ba shin tu tshad dang ldan pa /
T02D2628:24b-40: tsha sgo med pa'i sa'i cha der //
T02D2628:24b-41: ji bzhin pa yi cho ga yis //
T02D2628:24b-42: gnas ni byin gyis brlab pa brtsams //
T02D2628:25a-2: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D2628:25a-4: ji bzhin pa'i cho ga yis zhes bya bas ni rgyal pos khru gang lnga bcu'am brgya'o //
T02D2628:25a-5: blon po dang blon po chen pos ni khru gang lnga bcu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D2628:25a-6: tshong dpon nam sde dpon gyis khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'am de'i phyed do //
T02D2628:25a-7: sgrub pa pos ni bcu gnyis sam drug par bya'o //
T02D2628:25a-8: de la dang por re zhig mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D2628:25a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi rus kyi phye ma
T02D2628:25a-10: dang // brag dang dug dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2628:25a-11: mngon spyod kyi sbyin sreg gi cho gas dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:25a-12: gyi bgegs bzlog nas bdag dang slob ma dang sa
T02D2628:25a-13: bdag la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i zhi ba'i
T02D2628:25a-14: sbyin sreg bya'o // de nas sa sbyong ba byed du gzhug ste /
T02D2628:25a-18: pus mo nub pa tsam du brkos la gyo mo la sogs pa bsal la /
T02D2628:25a-19: spos chu dri zhim pas bran pa'i las bkang nas
T02D2628:25a-20: rdo rje rtse mo yongs su bzlas pa'i chag chag
T02D2628:25a-21: btab ste / 'thas par bcags la shin tu mnyam par byas la /
T02D2628:25a-22: khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud pa rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas la /
T02D2628:25a-23: sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D2628:25a-24: mtha' ma dril bus gtams pa'i rgyal mtshan dang bla
T02D2628:25a-25: re la sogs pa bres pas nye bar mdzes par
T02D2628:25a-26: byas la / sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris dang /
T02D2628:25a-27: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grva
T02D2628:25a-28: bzhi ra gzhag pa'i spos snod rnams legs par btul
T02D2628:25a-31: dgos pa'i yo byad rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i
T02D2628:25a-32: sa dris nye bar byugs nas rdo rje gnod sbyin
T02D2628:25a-33: yongs su bzlas pa'i spos chus yongs su bsangs la
T02D2628:25a-34: / sa la lag pa bzhag ste rdo rje sems
T02D2628:25a-35: dpa'i yi ge brgya pa lan bdun bzlas par bya'o
T02D2628:25a-36: / // sa sbyong pa dang yongs su bzung pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2628:25a-37: de nas rang nyid khrus byas shing lus dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D2628:25a-38: ji snyed pa'i gos dang rgyan gdags shing shin tu dmar ba'i gos bgo ba dang /
T02D2628:25a-39: me tog phreng ba gdags pa dang /
T02D2628:25b-0: shing thog dri zhim po bca' ba byas la yar gyi tshes brgyad nas @25b brtsams te /
T02D2628:25b-3: tshes bcu bzhi nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar du'am /
T02D2628:25b-4: tshes bco lnga'i thun mtshams nas brtsams te dkyil 'khor gyi las bya'o //
T02D2628:25b-5: de la smyung bar gnas pa'i sa'i char ni phyag dar dang skyong nul la sogs pa byas la /
T02D2628:25b-6: de bzhin du lag pas reg pa la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang /
T02D2628:25b-7: yi ge brgya pa bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2628:25b-8: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'jug la /
T02D2628:25b-10: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2628:25b-11: de nas 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la /
T02D2628:25b-12: phyag btsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2628:25b-13: sdom pa bzung la rnal 'byor chen po dang /
T02D2628:25b-14: gzhal yas khang gdan dang bcas pa yang bskyed la /
T02D2628:25b-15: sems dpa'i skyil krung du 'dug ste /
T02D2628:25b-16: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
T02D2628:25b-18: ding bdag 'dus pa mchog yin no //
T02D2628:25b-19: zhes bya ba'i bar gyis bdag nyid spro ba bskyed pa'i bya'o //
T02D2628:25b-20: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la spos snod lag tu thogs te /
T02D2628:25b-21: ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D2628:25b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sangs rgya thams cad spyan drang ngo //
T02D2628:25b-23: de nas yang dang po'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D2628:25b-24: dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog rnam par bsgoms la /
T02D2628:25b-25: rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas la dpal rdo rje sems
T02D2628:25b-26: dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas shing aom sarba bti
T02D2628:25b-27: badzra satva h'um zhes zlos pa brtson pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2628:25b-28: pa la kun rig rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil
T02D2628:25b-29: 'khor chen po bri pa'i phyir sgrub pa'i grogs mchog
T02D2628:25b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas mtshan
T02D2628:25b-31: brgya rtsa brgyad pas gsol ba gab po //
T02D2628:25b-32: de nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung 'dug pa las langs te /
T02D2628:25b-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha' gang bar bsams te /
T02D2628:25b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la 'di skad brjod par bya'o //
T02D2628:25b-35: bdag ni rang nyid rdo rje can //
T02D2628:25b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod la /
T02D2628:25b-37: dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bteg ste nam mkha' la bzhag la /
T02D2628:25b-38: bdag nyid yang byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2628:25b-39: aom sarba bidta drishta ma ta /
T02D2628:25b-40: zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /
T02D2628:26a-0: aa zhes bya ba las rkang pa gnyis su sna tshogs @26a * //
T02D2628:26a-2: g-yas brkyad [*brkyang?] la sogs pa dang /
T02D2628:26a-8: sa gzhi rdo rje rgya gram yan chad byas nas phur bu'i bsrung ba yang bya'o //
T02D2628:26a-9: yang dkyil 'khor cho ga las bshad pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2628:26a-10: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga rnams rjes su spyad
T02D2628:26a-11: par bya'o // de la ni gnas ni byin gyis brlabs pa tsam zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:26a-12: de nas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas der ni nang
T02D2628:26a-13: par nyi ma 'char ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2628:26a-14: dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis nam mkha'
T02D2628:26a-15: la btegs la thig gdab par bya'o ;
T02D2628:26a-17: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2628:26a-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:26a-19: dang po ras bal rin mi brtseg par nyos la /
T02D2628:26a-20: bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu tshon rtsi dri zhim po sngon po /
T02D2628:26a-21: dmar po ljang gu ser po /
T02D2628:26a-22: dkar pos so sor kha dog bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis gzhag pa la ;
T02D2628:26a-23: h'um tr'am hr'i: aom: aa zhes bya ba'i rang gi
T02D2628:26a-24: sa bon gyis mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad
T02D2628:26a-26: d'ipta drisht'am ku shi dza zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la //
T02D2628:26a-27: rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar pa'i mig / mig gi rdzi ma 'dren pa ni //
T02D2628:26a-28: zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i lta ba dang /
T02D2628:26a-29: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po thig gdab par
T02D2628:26a-30: bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i thig gdab pa bdag la
T02D2628:26a-31: stsol cig ces brjod pas mi bskyod pa la sogs
T02D2628:26a-32: pa yang dag par bskul bar bya'o //
T02D2628:26a-33: de nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas rang rang
T02D2628:26a-34: gi sa bon gyi 'od kyis srad pu btang ba
T02D2628:26a-35: 'bar ba'i lta bas bskul la rang gi lag na
T02D2628:26a-36: gnas pa'i srad bu bkal la /
T02D2628:26a-37: aom aa n+yo n+y'a nu zhes bya ba la sogs pas bsgril bar bya'o //
T02D2628:26a-38: ma dang ta gnyis kyi g-yas pa dang g-yon pa nyi ma dang zla bar bskyed la //
T02D2628:26a-39: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas
T02D2628:26a-40: nas thig skud de gser la sogs pa'i snod dris
T02D2628:26a-42: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2628:26a-43: rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la /
T02D2628:26a-44: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra
T02D2628:26a-45: ma h'um zhes bya ba lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
T02D2628:26a-46: par bya'o // de nas sarba bati bcu gnyis bzlas
T02D2628:26a-47: pa'i dris dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la me tog
T02D2628:26a-48: gis kun nas mdzes par byas la /
T02D2628:26b-0: bar @26b snang la bzhugs pa'i rigs thams cad la mchod pa byas te dkyil 'khor bteg par bya'o //
T02D2628:26b-1: de nas las kyi thig gdab par bya ste /
T02D2628:26b-2: de la re zhig tshon dkar po las thig sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2628:26b-3: de nas cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2628:26b-4: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2628:26b-6: gru bzhi pa ni shar dang nub dang byang dang lho'i thig gdab pa'o //
T02D2628:26b-7: de bzhin du kha khyer gyi thig dag kyang phyi dang nang gi dkyil 'khor kun gyis gdab pa'o //
T02D2628:26b-8: de la shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi'i thig la bya bas na /
T02D2628:26b-9: sgo bzhi pa zhes bya ste /
T02D2628:26b-10: nang gi sgo ni phyi'i dang 'dra ba la rta babs med pa'o//
T02D2628:26b-11: phyi'i ni rta babs dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2628:26b-12: rta babs bzhi dang bcas pa'o zhes pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2628:26b-13: them skas ni rta babs bzhi'o //
T02D2628:26b-14: seng ge ni mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2628:26b-15: stobs bcu rnam par dag pa'i glang po ches sgo'i glo gnyis su brgyan pa'o //
T02D2628:26b-16: rnams ni rdzu 'phrul bzhi rnam par dag pa dang /
T02D2628:26b-17: thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding ngo //
T02D2628:26b-18: rta babs 'debs pa'i ka ba rnams kyi mgul dang
T02D2628:26b-19: rta babs kyi steng du rdo rje rin chen gyi
T02D2628:26b-20: mgul du dar te ba dang dang do shal gyi
T02D2628:26b-21: phreng ba dang / dril bu dang rnga mas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2628:26b-22: rdo rje rin chen padma dang /
T02D2628:26b-23: rgya gram pa'i phyag rgyas bcings pa ni zla ba phyed pa la gnas pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2628:26b-26: rgya gram gyis brgyan pa'i rgyan gyis dkyil 'khor gyi grva dang //
T02D2628:26b-27: sgo dang sgo khyud rnams su brgyan par thig gdab bo //
T02D2628:26b-28: srad bu brgyad dang ldan pa la //
T02D2628:26b-29: zhes bya ba ni phyogs thig bzhi tshangs pa'i thig bzhi ste /
T02D2628:26b-30: brgyad dang ldan par byas so //
T02D2628:26b-31: phyi'i rta babs dang bcas pa'i sgo'o //
T02D2628:26b-32: la la dag sgo gsum pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2628:26b-33: bdag gis dkyus kyis kyang sgo gsum par ma mthong ste /
T02D2628:26b-35: dgu yi char ni bgos pa las //
T02D2628:26b-36: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor cha dgur bgos pa la
T02D2628:26b-37: phyi'i sgo khyud las sum cha gcig gtad ces 'byung
T02D2628:26b-38: ngo // de ltar rdo rje srad bus phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab ba bo zhes gsungs so //
T02D2628:26b-39: da ni dbus kyi rdo rje'i thig gis dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa ston te /
T02D2628:26b-40: dbus kyi dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa //
T02D2628:26b-41: zhes bya bas ni seng ldeng gi phur bu smad
T02D2628:26b-42: rdo rje rtse gcig pa lta bu stod rdo rje
T02D2628:27a-0: rtse @27a * // lnga pa lta bu byas la /
T02D2628:27a-1: rdo rje phur bu'i sngags yongs su bzlas la /
T02D2628:27a-2: rdo rjes brdungs pa de la brtod pa'i srad bus
T02D2628:27a-3: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du rdo rje
T02D2628:27a-4: phreng ba'i dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
T02D2628:27a-5: bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-6: de nas pho brang gi rim pa gsum du bskor phyogs su thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-7: chos kyi 'khor lo zlum por bskor ba la bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-8: lte ba ni rim pa dgur byas pa'o //
T02D2628:27a-9: bcas pa ni re'u mig dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2628:27a-10: rtsibs bcu drug 'khor lo rdo rje 'bebs pa la sogs pa'i gnas rtsibs bcu drug tu byas pa'o //
T02D2628:27a-11: rim pa gsum ni phyi rol gyi rdo rje ra ba dang /
T02D2628:27a-13: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la ni rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2628:27a-14: ngan song sbyong ba'i gnas kyi nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D2628:27a-15: de ltar thig gdab pa yang rdo rje rtse mo las /
T02D2628:27a-16: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D2628:27a-17: 'khor lo rim pa rtsibs bcu drug / rdo rje phreng bas yongs bskor bar //
T02D2628:27a-18: dkyil 'khor dbus ma bri bar bya //
T02D2628:27a-19: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2628:27a-20: de bas na 'di la the tshom mi bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-21: de yang 'khor lo ltar bskor ba kho na la yang mi bya ste /
T02D2628:27a-24: ces gsungs pa na spyir bshad kyi gcig tu ni nges pa med do //
T02D2628:27a-26: rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor ba //
T02D2628:27a-27: zhes gsungs pa 'dis kyang 'di tha dad par gyur pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-28: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba na gnas pa'i
T02D2628:27a-29: phur bu yi ge h'um bzhis bton la 'og nas
T02D2628:27a-30: bshad pa'i tshon sna lngas phur bu'i bu ga bkang
T02D2628:27a-31: la mnyam por byas nas hi zhes bya bas mig
T02D2628:27a-32: g-yas dang / g-yon nyi ma dang zla bar bskyed la /
T02D2628:27a-33: khro bo'i lta bas kun du bltas la sgo rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-35: thig le tshon gyis dgang ba dang /
T02D2628:27a-36: tshon gyi rim pa 'di ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:27a-37: aom badzra tsi tras ma ya h'um zhes pas phyag
T02D2628:27a-38: rgya dang ldan pas tshon thams cad la lan bdun
T02D2628:27a-39: bzlas na rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2628:27a-40: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
T02D2628:27a-41: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
T02D2628:27a-42: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis la ni //
T02D2628:27a-43: mdzub mo'i rtse mo mnyam sbyar bas //
T02D2628:27b-0: byas na tshon rtsi thams @27b cad ni //
T02D2628:27b-1: 'bar ba'i lta bas dgug par bya //
T02D2628:27b-2: hi zhes bya ba'i mthar khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la sbar bar bya'o //
T02D2628:27b-3: de la tshon rtsi dkar po ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:27b-4: pa dkar po'i rdul phra rab rnams gzhug par bya'o
T02D2628:27b-5: // ser po la ni ser po'o //
T02D2628:27b-6: sngon po la ni sngon po'o //
T02D2628:27b-7: ljang gu la ni ljang gu'o //
T02D2628:27b-8: dmar po la ni dmar po bcug nas ji skad
T02D2628:27b-9: du bshad pa'i 'bar ba'i lta bas mngon par sbyang
T02D2628:27b-10: ba'i dus su yang dang po'i rdo rje thog mar
T02D2628:27b-11: tshon dgye ba brtsams par byas la /
T02D2628:27b-12: tshon thams cad dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te /
T02D2628:27b-13: bskor phyogs su aom sarba bti kyi sngags zlos shing dgye la /
T02D2628:27b-14: de'i 'og tu ji ltar dga' bar tshon dgye bar bya'o //
T02D2628:27b-15: tshon dgye ba'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2628:27b-20: dkar po ni thams cad kyi nang du'o //
T02D2628:27b-21: dbus kyi sa'i cha gnyis ni dkar po'o //
T02D2628:27b-26: 'khor lo'i rtsibs ni rigs kyi kha dog go //
T02D2628:27b-27: sgo khyams ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang du dkar ba dang /
T02D2628:27b-32: des ni dkyil 'khor bri ba'i rim pa bstan to //
T02D2628:27b-33: da ni lha rnams dgod pa bstan te /
T02D2628:27b-34: dbus su mkhas pas kun rig ni //
T02D2628:27b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:27b-36: dbus su kun rig rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog
T02D2628:27b-37: dkar po dung dang kun da ltar dkar zhing snum
T02D2628:27b-38: pa zhal bzhi pa ni ye shes bzhi dang /
T02D2628:27b-39: sku bzhis brgyan pa'i rtags su bstan yang sku bzhi ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku dang /
T02D2628:27b-40: rnam par smin pa'i sku dang /
T02D2628:27b-41: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /
T02D2628:27b-43: de yang dus gsum du kun rdzob tu gzugs su
T02D2628:27b-44: bzhugs kyis don dam par yod pa ma yin no
T02D2628:27b-46: gang 'di rgya chen du ma yi //
T02D2628:27b-47: kha dog dbyibs dang gdan rnams dang //
T02D2628:27b-48: phyag mtshan brgyad sogs dbye ba ni //
T02D2628:27b-49: sku yi gsang bar 'di zhes bya //
T02D2628:27b-51: de la de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje'i rigs ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02D2628:27b-52: rin po che'i rigs ni rnam par smin pa'i sku'o //
T02D2628:27b-53: padma'i rigs thams cad ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2628:28a-0: las kyi rigs thams cad ni @28a * //
T02D2628:28a-1: sprul pa'i sku'i ngo bo nyid do //
T02D2628:28a-2: rgyu dang ye shes dang sku bzhir sbyar ba ni 'dir ma bris so //
T02D2628:28a-3: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T02D2628:28a-4: ngan song sbyong ba la sogs pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2628:28a-5: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rnam par smin pa'i sku'o //
T02D2628:28a-6: gzhan rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa thams cad ni sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2628:28a-7: de skad du tshogs mtho ba las /
T02D2628:28a-8: rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas //
T02D2628:28a-9: kun rig nyid ni ngo po'i sku //
T02D2628:28a-10: rdo rje rigs kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2628:28a-11: ngan song sbyong ba longs spyod rdzogs //
T02D2628:28a-12: rdo rje chos kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2628:28a-13: rdo rje sems sogs rnam par smin //
T02D2628:28a-14: rdo rje las kyi dbang bskur bas //
T02D2628:28a-15: sprul ba'i sku ni sku zhes ni //
T02D2628:28a-16: rdo rje rigs ni 'dod par grags //
T02D2628:28a-18: de thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni kun rig rnam par snang mdzad de rdo rje zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:28a-19: de la ni rgyal mchog skyes bus gang ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:28a-20: mi 'jigs ba seng ge'i gdan steng na ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2628:28a-21: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bzhugs so //
T02D2628:28a-22: de nas bar snang gi phyogs nas spyan drangs la gzugs dang gcig tu bsre bar bya'o //
T02D2628:28a-23: de bzhin du thams cad la shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:28a-24: shar phyogs su seng ge'i gdan la ngan song sbyong
T02D2628:28a-25: ba sku mdog zla ba rgyas pa dang 'dra zhing
T02D2628:28a-26: 'jam pa rgyan cha la sogs pas brgyan pa phyag
T02D2628:28a-27: gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya steng na rdo rje
T02D2628:28a-28: bsnams pa'o // rgyab tu sh'akya thub pa sku mdog
T02D2628:28a-29: gser btso ma lta bu la phyag rgya bsam gtan
T02D2628:28a-30: gyi phyag rgya padma rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams te
T02D2628:28a-31: bsnams pa'o // / gdan seng ge la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:28a-32: g-yas kyi re'u mig la rin chen dpal sku mdog
T02D2628:28a-33: sngon po bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya rin po che'i
T02D2628:28a-35: gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa bsam mo //
T02D2628:28a-36: byang phyogs su me tog cher rgyas sku mdog ljang
T02D2628:28a-37: gu phyag gnyis bsam gtan gyi phyag rgya'i steng du
T02D2628:28a-38: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D2628:28a-39: gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:28a-40: re'u mig gi grva rnams su lo tsa na dang
T02D2628:28a-41: m'a ma k'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la
T02D2628:28a-42: / sangs rgyas spyan la lo tsa na zhes bya ba ste /
T02D2628:28a-43: sku'i rnam par ram rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma zhes 'byung bas na /
T02D2628:28b-0: sna @28b tshogs rdo rje rnams bkod kyang rung ngo //
T02D2628:28b-2: mu stegs can la phan gdags phyir //
T02D2628:28b-3: sangs rgyas btsun mo rab tu gsang //
T02D2628:28b-5: da ni ye shes sems dpa' rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dgod pa ston te /
T02D2628:28b-6: rtsibs kyi nang ni thams cad du //
T02D2628:28b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:28b-8: rtsibs kyi nang ni 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug gi nang ngo //
T02D2628:28b-9: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog gi rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bcu drug ste /
T02D2628:28b-10: bti las bskyed pas na mchog go //
T02D2628:28b-11: mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad pas na rdzu 'phrul che ba'o //
T02D2628:28b-12: go rims bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D2628:28b-13: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2628:28b-14: pa nas bskal pa bzang po'i bar dag kyang padma
T02D2628:28b-15: dang zla ba'i dkyil na sems dpa'i skyil mo krung
T02D2628:28b-18: rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa'i mgon //
T02D2628:28b-19: rdo rje phyed pa'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02D2628:28b-21: de la rdo rje sems dpa' ni sku mdog dkar
T02D2628:28b-22: po g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur dril bu dang
T02D2628:28b-23: bcas pa'i bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis dkur brten pa phyag
T02D2628:28b-24: g-yas pas snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis bzhag pa'i
T02D2628:28b-25: gung mo la dang po'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa
T02D2628:28b-26: bstod pa'i tshul gyis bsnams pa shar gyi 'khor lo'i
T02D2628:28b-28: de nas rim pa bzhin du thams cad de ltar gnas so //
T02D2628:28b-29: rdo rje rgyal po ni gser gyi mdog can rdo
T02D2628:28b-30: rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sdud
T02D2628:28b-32: rdo rje chags pa ni sku mdog dmar po mda'
T02D2628:28b-33: dang gzhus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bigs pa'i
T02D2628:28b-35: rdo rje legs pa ni mar gad kyi mdog can
T02D2628:28b-36: phyag gnyis rdo rje khu tshur dang bcas pas legs
T02D2628:28b-37: so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin
T02D2628:28b-38: gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing bzhugs pa'o
T02D2628:28b-39: // rdo rje rin chen ni sku mdog ser po
T02D2628:28b-40: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis rin po che'i
T02D2628:28b-41: dril bu bsnams shing mnyes pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa
T02D2628:28b-42: g-yas pa khu tshur gyis yid bzhin gyi nor bu
T02D2628:28b-43: rin po che rtse mo rdo rje rtse lnga pas
T02D2628:28b-44: mtshan pa dpral ba'i steng na bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:28b-45: rdo rje nyi ma ni nyi ma'i mdog can phyag g-yas na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsnams te /
T02D2628:29a-2: phyag g-yon pa gdan la brten pas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-3: rdo rje rgya la mtshan nam mkha'i mdog can phyag
T02D2628:29a-4: g-yas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan phyag
T02D2628:29a-5: g-yon gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-6: rdo rje bzhad pa dung dang padma'i rtsa ba ltar
T02D2628:29a-7: dkar ba phyag g-yas kyis so'i phreng ba rtse mo
T02D2628:29a-8: na rdo rje yod pa bsnams te de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:29a-9: pa rnams 'dzum pa la nges par sbyor ba /
T02D2628:29a-10: phyag g-yon gdan la brten nas bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-11: rdo rje chos sku mdog dkar dmar phyag g-yon dkur brten nas rdo rje padma bzung ste /
T02D2628:29a-12: phyag g-yas pas de'i 'dab ma rang gis thugs kar 'byed pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-13: rdo rje rnon po nam mkha' ltar sngo bsangs phyag
T02D2628:29a-14: g-yon gyis rang gi thugs kar shes rab kyi pha
T02D2628:29a-15: rol tu phyin pa'i glegs bam bsnams pa /
T02D2628:29a-16: g-yas kyis ral gri bsnams te de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:29a-17: thams cad 'de bas pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par
T02D2628:29a-18: bzhugs pa'o // rdo rje rgyu gser gyi mdog can
T02D2628:29a-19: phyag g-yas kyi gung mo'i rtse mo na rdo rje
T02D2628:29a-20: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bskor bar mdzad pa /
T02D2628:29a-21: g-yon pa gdan la brten par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-22: rdo rje smra ba bzangs kyi mdog can phyag g-yas
T02D2628:29a-23: kyis rdo rje'i lce bsnams nas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:29a-24: rnams dang smra bar mdzad cing /
T02D2628:29a-25: g-yon stan la brten pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-26: rdo rje las zhal dkar po rked pa'i bar dang phyag gnyis sngo skya /
T02D2628:29a-28: zhal gyi 'og logs nas rked pa'i bar du dmar skya /
T02D2628:29a-30: lhag ma byin pa gnyis nas zhabs kyi bar du dkar po /
T02D2628:29a-31: phyag g-yon gyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis sna tshogs
T02D2628:29a-32: rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa bsnyems pa'i tshul
T02D2628:29a-33: gyis dkur 'jog pa phyag g-yas kyi gung mo la
T02D2628:29a-34: sna tshogs rdo rje rang gi thugs kar bstod pa'i
T02D2628:29a-36: rdo rje srung ba gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis rdo rje go cha bsnams te /
T02D2628:29a-37: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go bskon pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-38: rdo rje gnod sbyin lto ba yangs pa nag po zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa /
T02D2628:29a-39: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis zhal gyi mtha' gnyis su mche ba gnyis 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29a-40: rdo rje khu tshur sku mdog ser po rdo rje'i khu tshur gnyis kyi nang du /
T02D2628:29b-0: rdo rje chud pa dam tshig gi rdo rje @29b khu tshur gnyis kyis btsir zhing bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-1: mkhas pas l'a sye la sogs pa //
T02D2628:29b-2: grva bzhi'i phyogs su bri bar bya //
T02D2628:29b-3: zhes bya bas ni sgeg mo dkar ba'i sku mdog
T02D2628:29b-4: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2628:29b-6: rdo rje 'gying pa'i tshul gyis sgeg pa la g-yon du cud [*cung?] zad 'dud pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-7: phreng ba ma sku mdog ser po rin po che'i
T02D2628:29b-8: phreng bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbang bskur
T02D2628:29b-9: ba'o // glu ma sku mdog dmar skya pi wang brdung pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-10: gar ma sku mdog rdo rje las lta bu rdo
T02D2628:29b-11: rje rtse gsum pa bsnams te phyag gnyis kyis gar
T02D2628:29b-13: bdug pa ma sku mdog dkar mo rdo rje spos
T02D2628:29b-14: snod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par
T02D2628:29b-15: mdzad pa'o // me tog ma ser mo phyag g-yon
T02D2628:29b-16: gyis rdo rje me tog gi snod thogs te phyag
T02D2628:29b-17: g-yas kyi me tog gi char 'bebs pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-18: mar me ma sku mdog dmar skya mar me'i sdong
T02D2628:29b-19: bu bsnams te snang ba'i tshogs kyis mchod pa mdzad
T02D2628:29b-20: pa'o // byug pa ma gar ma ltar sna tshogs
T02D2628:29b-21: pa'i mdog can phyag g-yon na dri'i dung chos bsnams
T02D2628:29b-22: pa'o // pa / phyag g-yas kyis dri'i sprin gyis
T02D2628:29b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod cing bzhugs pa'o
T02D2628:29b-24: pa'o // pa / // sgo yi phyogs ni thams cad du //
T02D2628:29b-25: sgo ba bzhi po bri bar bya //
T02D2628:29b-26: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lcags kyu sku mdog
T02D2628:29b-27: dkar po rdo rje lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:29b-29: rdo rje lcags sgrog sku mdog dmar skya rdo rje
T02D2628:29b-30: lcags sgrog gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'ching bar
T02D2628:29b-31: mdzad pa'o // rdo rje 'bebs pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2628:29b-32: mdog ca na phyag g-yas kyi dril bu bsnams te
T02D2628:29b-33: mdzad pa'o // / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'bebs
T02D2628:29b-34: par mdzad pa phyag g-yon gdan la brten te bzhugs
T02D2628:29b-35: mdzad pa'o // / pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:29b-36: rnams ni zhi ba'i nyams dang ldan pa zhi ba'i
T02D2628:29b-37: gzigs stangs dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-38: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni rab tu dgyes pas spyan gdangs pa /
T02D2628:29b-39: sgeg pa'i nyams dang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pa na dang /
T02D2628:29b-40: dar dbyangs kyis dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2628:29b-41: rta babs khyams ni thams cad du //
T02D2628:29b-42: byams pa la sogs bri bar bya //
T02D2628:30a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la @30a * //
T02D2628:30a-1: rta babs khyams ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i khang pa dang /
T02D2628:30a-2: rta babs med pa'i nang gi sgo'i bar la ni khyams zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:30a-3: la la dag sgo gsum par 'dod de /
T02D2628:30a-4: bdag gis ni gsum par rig par dkyus kyis kyang ma mthong ngo //
T02D2628:30a-5: 'og nas kyang sgo yod par ma mthong ngo ;
T02D2628:30a-7: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02D2628:30a-9: khyams der byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dgod la /
T02D2628:30a-14: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02D2628:30a-15: mya ngan mun pa kun 'dzoms dang //
T02D2628:30a-23: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D2628:30a-26: de dag kyang zla ba dang /
T02D2628:30a-27: sna tshogs padma'i steng na sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs la /
T02D2628:30a-31: byang gi rnam pa rdo rje rgya gram mo //
T02D2628:30a-32: rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa ste /
T02D2628:30a-33: gong gi dang spel mar bri zhes 'byung ste /
T02D2628:30a-34: de la shar du thub mchog dpe med bzhi ste ;
T02D2628:30a-38: 'khor ba rgyun gcod de rnams ni lcags kyu'o //
T02D2628:30a-39: lho phyogs su ni yon tan dpe med bzhi ste rin chen mdzod dang /
T02D2628:30a-43: de rnams ni rin po che'i mchod sdong she dag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:30a-44: nub tu gsung mchog dpe med bzhi ste /
T02D2628:30a-45: de yang nga ro snyan pa dang /
T02D2628:30a-49: de dag gi phyag na me tog autpa la she dag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:30a-50: byang phyogs su las mchog dpe med bzhi ste ;
T02D2628:30a-55: de dag ni phyag na me tog she dag bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:30a-56: sku mdog ni dkar po dang /
T02D2628:30a-57: sngon po dang dmar po dang /
T02D2628:30a-58: ljang gu rim bzhin du shar dang lho la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:30b-0: nyan thos @30b ni ston pa'i zhabs 'bring sprul pa'i
T02D2628:30b-1: sku'i 'khor yin pas snam bu gnyis pa la shes
T02D2628:30b-2: rab can gyi mchog sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T02D2628:30b-3: rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog mod gal gyi bu dang /
T02D2628:30b-4: 'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog rab 'byor dang /
T02D2628:30b-5: rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog ma 'gags pa dang /
T02D2628:30b-6: khyim pa dad pa bskyed pa'i mchog nag po 'char ka dang /
T02D2628:30b-7: ston pa la dam pa'i chos thos pa lnga ba koo di n+ya dang /
T02D2628:30b-8: bdud kyi gtso bo dad pa bskyed pa snga bas na rta thul dang /
T02D2628:30b-9: 'dul ba 'dzin bar byed pas na nye ba 'khor dang /
T02D2628:30b-10: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pas na ba lang bdag dang /
T02D2628:30b-11: sras su gyur pa'i sgra gcan 'dzin dang /
T02D2628:30b-12: zham 'bring gnyug mar mdzad pa'i kun dga' bo dang /
T02D2628:30b-13: nyid kyi gcung pos na dga' bo dang /
T02D2628:30b-14: sh'akya rnams kyi skra 'dreg mkhan yin pas na ming chen dang /
T02D2628:30b-15: bslab pa la gus pa'i nor sbyin dang /
T02D2628:30b-16: sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas pa'i gang po dang /
T02D2628:30b-17: zhal ta ba sku bgres pa'i 'od srungs rnams ni
T02D2628:30b-18: sku mdog ser po chos gos dang ldan pa phyag
T02D2628:30b-19: na par pu dang bsil yab dang /
T02D2628:30b-21: mar me rim pa bzhin du shar la sogs pa nas bskor phyogs su bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:30b-22: nyan thos kyi snam bu la rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang spel mar bri bar bya'o ;
T02D2628:30b-24: de bzhin rang rgyal gtso bo rnams //
T02D2628:30b-39: de rnams ni bsil yab dang /
T02D2628:30b-43: de yang shar la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no //
T02D2628:30b-44: sgo de sgo khyams g-yas g-yon du /
T02D2628:30b-45: khro bo brgyad bri bar bya ste //
T02D2628:30b-47: khro bo mngag pa pho nya sogs //
T02D2628:30b-48: bri ba'am yang na ming yang rung //
T02D2628:30b-50: bcas bcos gnyis dang ldan pas sam khro ba'i tshul dgu dang ldan pas khro bo'o //
T02D2628:30b-51: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa pa'i las mdzad pas mngag pa'o //
T02D2628:31a-1: khro bo mang po 'byung bas pho nya ste /
T02D2628:31a-10: rta mgrin te de rnams ni shar la sogs pa'i sgo khyams g-yas g-yon du rim pa bzhin no //
T02D2628:31a-11: de rnams kyang yang na ming ngam ste /
T02D2628:31a-14: thig le ste gdan nam gang yang rung ba bri zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D2628:31a-15: de rnams ni rab mchog dang po yongs su dag pa'i 'khor te /
T02D2628:31a-18: // / da ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don te /
T02D2628:31a-19: phyi yi dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02D2628:31a-21: phyi'i dkyil 'khor ni rta babs dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor te sgo gnyis pa'o //
T02D2628:31a-22: de'i phyi rol du ni rdo rje ra ba'i nang logs kyi khor yug gi dkyil 'khor la bya'o //
T02D2628:31a-23: gling bzhi po ni bri bar bya ;
T02D2628:31a-25: gling bzhi pa ni khor yug gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D2628:31a-26: lhor 'dzam bu gling gi gzugs su bri ba dang
T02D2628:31a-27: / nub tu ba lang spyod kyi dbyibs su bri ba dang /
T02D2628:31a-28: byang du sgra mi snyan gyi dbyibs su bri ba dang /
T02D2628:31a-29: shar du lus 'phags po'i gling gi dbyibs bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:31a-30: 'dzam bu'i gling du tshangs pa bri //
T02D2628:31a-31: zhes pa ni gling de'i steng du tshangs pa'i gzugs phyag na gunddhe bsnams pa /
T02D2628:31a-32: btsun mo tshangs ma pi wang 'dzin pa /
T02D2628:31a-33: 'khor dang bcas te bri bar bya //
T02D2628:31a-34: zhes 'byung bas pho nya mngag pa ste /

T02D2628:34b-25: rdo rje sgo ni rnam bzhi'o //
T02D2628:34b-26: yid kyis su ni dbye bar bya //
T02D2628:34b-27: aom badzrod gha ta sa ma ya pra be sha
T02D2628:34b-28: ya h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas
T02D2628:34b-29: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo thams cad dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2628:34b-30: de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas nas /
T02D2628:34b-31: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ji skad bshad pa'i

T02D2628:34b-39: bum pa lhag ma rnams la ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:34b-40: pa la sogs pa'i sngags sho dha ni la sogs

T02D2628:34b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2628:34b-43: de'i rjes la bum pa gang ba la rnam par

T02D2628:34b-46: yang bum pa gcig la rdo rje sems dpa' brgya

T02D2628:35a-5: aom ratna mushti tam rin chen 'byung ldan kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02D2628:35a-6: aom badzra dharma mushti kham zhes bya ba ni sh'akya thub pa'i rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02D2628:35a-7: aom karma mushti ham zhes ba ni me tog cher rgyas kyi rigs kyi bum pa la'o //
T02D2628:35a-8: de rnams lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la rigs de la dbul bar bya'o //

T02D2628:35a-10: bcu las nyung ba mi bya'o //

T02D2628:35a-13: khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa

T02D2628:35a-29: dang por khrus la sogs pa byas nas /

T02D2628:35a-32: phyag rgya dgrol ba ji lta ba bzhin du byas la rnal 'byor chen po bya'o //
T02D2628:35a-33: de nas sbyor ba dang po dang dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog rnam par bsgoms nas /

T02D2628:35a-36: phyir phyung nas ched du brjod pa nas rang rang gi gnas su gnas par byas nas /

T02D2628:35a-38: gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pas de bzhin gshe pa thams
T02D2628:35a-39: cad las phreng ba la sogs pa'i dbang bskur ba

T02D2628:35b-18: dang las kyi phyag rgyar bshad pa gang yin pa

T02D2628:35b-41: gsungs la / zhes bya'o // lcags kyu la sogs rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2628:35b-42: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhi bzhag pa de bzhin du /

T02D2628:35b-44: por gyur pa rnams kyis bsgrub par bya zhing bdag
T02D2628:35b-46: ci zhig smra zhing dbang du byed ce na /
T02D2628:35b-47: dza: h'um bam ho:thugs rje'i bdag / ces bya ste /
T02D2628:35b-48: 'dis ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyi spyi'i
T02D2628:35b-49: yi ge bzhi po bsgrub pa'i snying por gsungs pa

T02D2628:36a-1: rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i sgo srung gi phyag rgya'i snying po yin par 'dod do //

T02D2628:36a-3: dgug pa la sogs pa'i don gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2628:36a-4: gzhan dag ni dza: h'um bam ho:zhes brjod la /
T02D2628:36a-5: legs pa'i cho gas yid kyis ni //
T02D2628:36a-6: lus la sangs rgyas kun gzhug go //
T02D2628:36a-7: zhes bya ba 'dir yang yin gyi /

T02D2628:36a-9: par khas blangs na ni aa zhes bya ba dbab
T02D2628:36a-10: pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2628:36a-11: ho:zhes bya ba rdo rje chags pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2628:36a-12: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi don 'di bshad par mdzad pa yin te //
T02D2628:36a-13: de nas kun mchog la sogs pa //
T02D2628:36a-14: mngon bris nas ni yang dag bsgrub //

T02D2628:36a-22: aom dza:h'um bam ho:sa ma ya zhes brjod cing /

T02D2628:36a-38: me tog cher rgyas kyi rigs ni byang sgo dang nye bar ro //
T02D2628:36a-39: de'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur las mkhrig ma mdud la mthe'u chung gnyis sbrel te /

T02D2628:36a-41: de nyid las mdzub mo ngos sbyor ba ni zhags pa'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2628:36b-0: des rang rang gi sgo nas rang @36b rang gi gnas su gzhug par bya'o //
T02D2628:36b-1: de nyid las mdzub mo bsdams pa ni lcags sgrog gi tshul lo //

T02D2628:36b-3: de nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bkug gnas

T02D2628:36b-10: rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod yon phul la /

T02D2628:41a-37: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //

T02D2628:41a-41: slob dpon chen po bdag la stsol //

T02D2628:41b-0: @41b bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam //

T02D2628:41b-2: de nas sdom pa dpog pa //

T02D2628:41b-4: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song //

T02D2628:41b-10: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //

T02D2628:41b-12: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2628:41b-13: byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa //
T02D2628:41b-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D2628:41b-16: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2628:41b-17: gang zhig sdom pa 'dzin par mi byed ba de

T02D2628:41b-20: slob dpon du rjes su gnang ba dang /
T02D2628:41b-21: dbang bskur bar mi bya'i 'jug pa tsam gyis byed du gzhug go //

T02D2628:41b-23: de yi snying gar snying pos ni //
T02D2628:41b-24: rdo rje rab tu gzhag par bya //
T02D2628:41b-25: su ra ta sa ma ya stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham /
T02D2628:41b-26: aom badzra sa tva sa ma ya h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02D2628:41b-27: rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas de rdo rje sems dpar bskyed la /
T02D2628:41b-29: aom badzra aa dhi tishtha h'um zhes pa dang /
T02D2628:41b-36: sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed de /
T02D2628:41b-37: dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod nas /
T02D2628:41b-39: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
T02D2628:41b-40: aom badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba 'dis
T02D2628:41b-41: sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya 'ching du bcug
T02D2628:41b-42: nas / gung mo gnyis kyis phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
T02D2628:41b-43: sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis gzhug par bya zhing /
T02D2628:41b-46: rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug par bya'o //
T02D2628:41b-47: yang de bzhin du lho nas bcug la badzra p'a sha h'um zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2628:41b-48: rdo rje zhags ba'i las kyi phyag rgyas gzhug par bya'o ;
T02D2628:41b-49: / yang de bzhin du nub kyi sgo nas bcug la badzra spho ta bam zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2628:41b-50: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2628:41b-51: de nas de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi sgo nas bcug la badzra a'a be sha aa:zhes pa dang /
T02D2628:41b-52: rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2628:41b-53: de nas yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas /
T02D2628:42a-2: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
T02D2628:42a-3: su zhugs kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod
T02D2628:42a-4: par bya'o // de nas sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas rang gi snying ga phye la /
T02D2628:42a-5: rang gi snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus
T02D2628:42a-6: na yi ge aa rdo rje dmar po'i 'od zer
T02D2628:42a-7: gyi phreng ba dang ldan pa bsams nas /
T02D2628:42a-8: de nas slob ma'i snying ga na gnas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su blos bcug la /
T02D2628:42a-9: de'i lus thams cad gang bar bsams shing /
T02D2628:42a-10: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
T02D2628:42a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos shig ces brjod
T02D2628:42a-12: do // de nas sems ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2628:42a-13: 'di ni rdo rje dam tshig ste /
T02D2628:42a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod du bcug la /
T02D2628:42a-15: badzra a'a be sha aa:zhes bya ba lan brgya'i bar du zlos shing dbab par bya'o //
T02D2628:42a-16: dbab pa'i cho ga de lta bu dang /
T02D2628:42a-17: gzhan dag kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:42a-18: de nas de la babs par shes pa dang /
T02D2628:42a-19: slob dpon gyis dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2628:42a-24: prittas tva bti badzra zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D2628:42a-25: gal te babs pa de dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2628:42a-26: slob dpon gyis rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
T02D2628:42a-27: gang gi tshe rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya 'ching
T02D2628:42a-28: na de'i tshe rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o
T02D2628:42a-29: // gang gi tshe rdo rje chags pa'i 'ching na /

T02D2628:42a-31: gang gi tshe rdo rje legs pa'i 'ching na de'i tshe rdo rje las kyi'o //
T02D2628:42a-32: gang gi tshe rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya

T02D2628:42a-34: // gang gi tshe rdo rje nyi ma'i 'ching ba de'i tshe rdo rje rgyu'o //
T02D2628:42a-35: gang gi tshe rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi 'ching pa de'i tshe rdo rje rnon po'i'o //

T02D2628:42a-37: pa de'i tshe slob dpon gyis rdo rje chos kyi
T02D2628:42a-39: de lta bu ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la

T02D2628:42a-41: 'gyur ro // de nas babs pa de'i lce la

T02D2628:42a-43: ba bsams la smros shig rdo rje zhes brjod par

T02D2628:42a-46: sangs rgyas dngos grub thob bya'i phyir //
T02D2628:42a-47: bdag la thugs brtser dgongs nas ni //

T02D2628:42b-0: sman bar dgongs te @42b bzhes su gsol //
T02D2628:42b-1: aom badzra pra ti grihna h'um zhes pa'o //

T02D2628:42b-11: slob ma rdo rje sems dpar bskyed nas byin gyis

T02D2628:42b-16: dpa'i bum pa las rdo rje khu tshur gyis chu
T02D2628:42b-18: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2628:42b-19: de nas dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang /

T02D2628:42b-32: slob dpon du dbang bskur bar 'os pa rnams kyis ni khyad par yod par bshad de /

T02D2628:42b-34: chen por bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na

T02D2628:42b-45: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o //

T02D2628:43a-0: rlung gis bskyod pa sna tshogs mchog / dar 'phan dril bu'i sgra @43a * //

T02D2628:43a-3: dra ba dra phyed rin chen mchog nyi ma zla ba yang dag ldan //
T02D2628:43a-4: kun grub mi zad bde ba ste //
T02D2628:43a-5: bde ba chen po zhes bshad do //
T02D2628:43a-6: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D2628:43a-7: 'di ni nang rim dag gi thig /
T02D2628:43a-9: 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad //
T02D2628:43a-10: dngos grub kun gyis bde ba ster //
T02D2628:43a-11: theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems //
T02D2628:43a-12: 'khor lo bcu drug bskor ba ni //
T02D2628:43a-13: sde snod 'khor lo bskor bas na'o //
T02D2628:43a-14: theg chen byang chub sems dang ni //
T02D2628:43a-15: ldan phyir rdo rje thig gis bskor //
T02D2628:43a-17: ngan song thams cad sbyong ba dang /
T02D2628:43a-20: me tog cher rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni thabs rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2628:43a-25: margad kyi mdog can lta bu ste /
T02D2628:43a-27: dbus ma shel lta bu'i mdog can ni bcom ldan 'das kun rig gi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2628:43a-28: byang chub sems dpa' rnams rnam par bstan pa yin no //
T02D2628:43a-29: gnyis pa bee d'urya'i mdog can ni ngan song thams cad sbyong pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2628:43a-30: bsdu ba'i dngos po ston pa yin no //
T02D2628:43a-31: gsum ba gser gyi mdog can ni rin chen dpal gyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2628:43a-32: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2628:43a-33: bzhi pa padma r'a ga'i mdog can ni sh'akya thub pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2628:43a-34: mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po dang /
T02D2628:43a-36: gzungs dang rnam par thar pa la sogs pa ston par byed pa yin no //
T02D2628:43a-37: lnga pa margad kyi mdog can ni me tog cher rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor te /
T02D2628:43a-38: sems can smin pa dang grol bar byed pa'i byang
T02D2628:43a-39: chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i thob
T02D2628:43a-40: pa las byung pa theg pa chen po gzhan gyi
T02D2628:43a-41: lta ba dang bral ba yin no zhes bya ba
T02D2628:43a-43: 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug par 'byung ba ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang /
T02D2628:43a-44: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang //
T02D2628:43a-45: stod pa bcu drug rnam par dag pa yin no //
T02D2628:43a-46: kha dog lnga po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2628:43b-0: sems can gyi @43b khams la pha rol tu phyin
T02D2628:43b-1: pa drug gis chags pa yin no zhes de ston
T02D2628:43b-2: par byed pa'o // bum pa ni gang gi tshe
T02D2628:43b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la

T02D2628:43b-6: bum pa gang ba ni byang chub thob par byed
T02D2628:43b-7: pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su

T02D2628:43b-11: gang phyir 'di ni yang dag bshad //
T02D2628:43b-12: grags pa'i dri ni bla na med //
T02D2628:43b-14: tshul khrims dri ni bla na med //
T02D2628:43b-15: bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs ni //
T02D2628:43b-16: chos kyi zas ni bla na med //
T02D2628:43b-17: lha yi gar bshad sna tshogs pa //
T02D2628:43b-18: rtog pa thams cad rnam 'phel ba'o //
T02D2628:43b-19: grong khyer du ni gang bshad pa //
T02D2628:43b-20: de nyid thar pa'i grong khyer bzang //
T02D2628:43b-21: dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa //
T02D2628:43b-22: chos kyi rang bzhin grong khyer yin //
T02D2628:43b-23: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D2628:43b-24: yang mi'u thung lta bu zhal bzhi pa gsus khyim
T02D2628:43b-25: che ba ral pa can dkyil 'khor kyi bdag po'i

T02D2628:43b-27: po de dkyil 'khor gyi sgor yongs su gyur /

T02D2628:43b-29: de rnams kyang sdig pa sel cing sangs rgyas kyi
T02D2628:43b-30: yon tan bskyed par mdzad pas bzhugs par gsang ba'i
T02D2628:43b-31: dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:43b-32: de rnams la lha rnams kyi de kho na nyid sum cu rtsa bdun te de brjod par bya'o /
T02D2628:43b-33: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbus na bzhugs ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
T02D2628:43b-34: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdus par gyur pa
T02D2628:43b-35: la sogs pa'i tshul mdzes par snang ba yin no

T02D2628:43b-37: chub kyi mtshan nyid can gyi thugs gang yin pa

T02D2628:43b-39: // // bcom ldan 'das ngan song sbyong ba de nyid rnam pa bzhir 'dod de /

T02D2628:43b-41: 'bras bur gyur pa'i thugs gang yin pa de ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //

T02D2628:44a-5: 'bras bu'i thugs gang yin pa de ni rdo rje legs ba'o //

T02D2628:44a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni

T02D2628:47b-1: dbang bskur ro // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2628:47b-21: byang phyogs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin bzhag la /

T02D2628:47b-25: yang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i chus kyang de bzhin du dbang bskur nas /

T02D2628:47b-27: tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas de bzhin du dbang bskur
T02D2628:47b-28: la / rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng ba'i cod pan dang /

T02D2628:47b-32: ba dang / bdag po'i dbang bskur ba dang /

T02D2628:47b-42: gsang ba'i dbang yang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-1: gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba'i dus su gsungs pa'i sngags kyi dbye bas phye la dbang bskur ba'am /
T02D2628:48a-2: rim gyis dbang bskur ba byas kyang 'gal ba med do //
T02D2628:48a-3: de nas gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dam tshig dang /
T02D2628:48a-4: brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste /
T02D2628:48a-5: de yang de kho na nyid bsdus ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2628:48a-6: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje zungs //
T02D2628:48a-7: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02D2628:48a-8: dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
T02D2628:48a-9: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas //
T02D2628:48a-10: zhes bya bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-11: de la shar gyi sgor ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang rdo rje rigs kyi'o //
T02D2628:48a-12: phyi ma ni rang rang gi sgor ro //
T02D2628:48a-13: de la 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i gzung ba'i de kho na nyid yin te /
T02D2628:48a-14: de nyid kyis ni bcom ldan 'das //
T02D2628:48a-15: byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2628:48a-16: lta ngan rnams la phan pa'i phyir //
T02D2628:48a-18: ma lus 'dul ba la brtson pa //
T02D2628:48a-19: brtan zhing nges pa'i go cha bgos //
T02D2628:48a-20: shin tu srid pa gnas kyi mchog / go cha la sogs bgos pas na //
T02D2628:48a-21: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs zhes pa'i //
T02D2628:48a-22: dkon mchog gsum bo nyid du 'gyur //
T02D2628:48a-23: srid pa shin tu yang dag 'grub //
T02D2628:48a-24: rnam dag dpal du byed pa'i mchog //
T02D2628:48a-25: ces bya ba'i de kho na nyid 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-26: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2628:48a-27: nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med //
T02D2628:48a-28: nam mkha' dang ni mnyam sbyor ba'i //
T02D2628:48a-29: kun mchog mnyam pa nyid du gsal //
T02D2628:48a-30: zhes bya ba 'dis ni chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-31: longs spyod thams cad nyer spyod pa //
T02D2628:48a-32: bdag nyid kho na rten byed cing //
T02D2628:48a-33: dkon mchog gsum mchod dam pa ni //
T02D2628:48a-34: bgyi'o zhes de brjod de mchod //
T02D2628:48a-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-37: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyang sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2628:48a-38: de la 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2628:48a-39: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rdo rje bzung
T02D2628:48a-40: ba'i de kho na nyid de /
T02D2628:48a-41: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D2628:48a-42: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02D2628:48a-43: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D2628:48b-0: rdo rje @48b bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag / bcom
T02D2628:48b-1: ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'i zhes bya
T02D2628:48b-2: ba ni / de kho na nyid 'dis rdo rje gzung ngo //
T02D2628:48b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa srid pa'i bdag
T02D2628:48b-4: po dam pa kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug nyid
T02D2628:48b-5: kyi dam pa de nyid kyi mchog gi bka' yang
T02D2628:48b-6: dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni /
T02D2628:48b-7: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid bral byas //
T02D2628:48b-8: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni byed pa yin //
T02D2628:48b-9: mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa'i dril bus
T02D2628:48b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas la
T02D2628:48b-11: / lha rnams yang dag par bsgrubs te dkrol la //

T02D2628:48b-13: rab tu rtogs pa 'bebs pas sgrib pa thams cad
T02D2628:48b-14: rnam par dag par byed do //
T02D2628:48b-15: rdo rje thams cad 'bebs pa rab tu bsgrubs pa
T02D2628:48b-16: dbang du byas pa yang rab tu sgrub par byed
T02D2628:48b-17: pa 'grub ste / chos nyid dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
T02D2628:48b-18: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung ;
T02D2628:48b-19: / sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02D2628:48b-20: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2628:48b-21: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02D2628:48b-22: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni //
T02D2628:48b-23: ci 'dod par ni bsten bzhin du //
T02D2628:48b-24: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2628:48b-25: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02D2628:48b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med
T02D2628:48b-27: pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i dam
T02D2628:48b-28: tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi dam
T02D2628:48b-29: tshig go / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2628:48b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
T02D2628:48b-32: 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas //
T02D2628:48b-33: phyag rgya dam tshig ces su grags //
T02D2628:48b-34: yid kyis gzugs ni brtan phyir ro //
T02D2628:48b-35: de la 'di skad ces kyang brjod par bya ste /
T02D2628:48b-36: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02D2628:48b-38: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02D2628:48b-39: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02D2628:48b-40: shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang //
T02D2628:48b-41: ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas na //
T02D2628:48b-42: chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
T02D2628:48b-44: zhes bya ba 'di'i dam tshig gis de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:48b-45: pa'i rigs kyi sku'i gsang ba byin gyis brlab par
T02D2628:48b-46: bya'o // de la 'di ni rin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D2628:49a-0: de'i rigs kyi rdo rje rin chen @49a * //
T02D2628:49a-1: gzung ba'i nga kho na nyid do //
T02D2628:49a-2: nyi ma 'di ni dam pa ste //

T02D2628:49a-6: zhes bya ba de kho na nyid 'dis rdo rje rin chen gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2628:49a-7: bsam pa thams cad grub rnams kyis //
T02D2628:49a-8: bsam pa 'grub pa dam pa yin //
T02D2628:49a-9: de yang 'dod pa rab bsgrub phyir //
T02D2628:49a-10: 'dod dang thar pa'i bde ba che //

T02D2628:49a-13: 'dod dang bde ba thams cad kyi //
T02D2628:49a-14: bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi //
T02D2628:49a-15: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par ba //
T02D2628:49a-16: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi mchog ste /

T02D2628:49a-30: bya ba gang dang gang gis ni //

T02D2628:49a-33: zhes bya ba ni dam tshig ste //

T02D2628:49a-35: de nas brtul zhugs sbyin par bya ste //
T02D2628:49a-36: aom padma ma h'a ha sta badzra dharma ham pa l'a ya /
T02D2628:49a-37: des kyang 'di skad du rdo rje chos nyid ji lta bu lags zhes dri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:49a-38: de nas de la 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste ;
T02D2628:49a-40: rigs kyi nyes pas mi gos bzhin //
T02D2628:49a-41: thams cad dag par bsgoms na ni //
T02D2628:49a-42: de bzhin sdig pa chags mi 'gyur //
T02D2628:49a-43: de la 'di'i skabs su chos nyid ni 'di yin no //
T02D2628:49a-44: rdo rje las kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2628:49b-0: dngos grub kyi rdo rje'i @49b brtul zhugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bshad pa yin no //
