T02D2628:75b-39: khyod kyi bzod pa ni gnod pas mi 'khrug cing sran tshugs pa'i don to //
T02D2628:76a-1: pa ni yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas khyod ces pa ste /
T02D2628:76a-2: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2628:76a-3: ko la ksha zhes pa ni khyod ni bden pa'i sprin yin te /
T02D2628:76a-4: khyod kyi bden pa'i stobs kyis pha rol tu phyin
T02D2628:76a-5: pa ni gzhan gyi zil gyis mi non pa'i rtags
T02D2628:76a-6: so // ko la ba zhes pa ni khyod ni gzugs sdug pa yid kyi rgyan zhes pa ste /
T02D2628:76a-7: khyod kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su mi nyams pa'i don to //
T02D2628:76a-8: ko la ko la zhes pa ni khyod ni me lce 'bar ba can zhes pa ste /
T02D2628:76a-9: khyod ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste ye shes pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2628:76a-10: ko la panytsa zhes pa ni khyod ni yid bzhin nor bu ste zhes pa ste /
T02D2628:76a-11: khyod kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyo dub med pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2628:76a-12: ka li sto tha zhes pa ni khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin zhes pa ste /
T02D2628:76a-13: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthun pa'i ye shes la dmigs pa'o //
T02D2628:76a-14: aa ti zhes bya ba ni yon tan bcus bstod pa rdzogs par bya ba'o //
T02D2628:76a-15: de nas gsol ba gdab pa dang rjes su gnang ba ni go sla'o //
T02D2628:76a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thams
T02D2628:76a-17: cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyad par 'byung
T02D2628:76a-18: ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
T02D2628:76a-19: snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba ni nang sems
T02D2628:76a-20: kyi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:76a-21: de yang ji ltar yin zhen thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pas khyab pas zhugs so //
T02D2628:76a-22: ji ltar zhugs snyam pa la sngags 'di rnams kyis
T02D2628:76a-23: nyid kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2628:76a-24: du nyid kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bskyed do //
T02D2628:76a-25: bskyed nas de la 'od 'phros pas sems can thams
T02D2628:76a-26: cad la phog pas sems can thams cad kyi sdug
T02D2628:76a-27: bsngal thams cad da bar du zhab [?] byas nas
T02D2628:76a-28: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
T02D2628:76a-29: 'og gi dbang rnams bskur bas bde 'gro lha'i 'jig rten la sogs par skyes so //
T02D2628:76a-30: sems can tshe zad pa rnams tshe 'phel bar byas so //
T02D2628:76a-31: de nas ma 'ongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pa la phan gdags pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2628:76a-32: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di'i cho 'phrul dang sngags kyi don yang ston to //
T02D2628:76a-33: de'i don yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:76a-34: dang por bdag gi gnas yid du 'ong bar bde
T02D2628:76a-35: ba'i stan la 'dug ste khrus byas la chos thams
T02D2628:76a-36: cad bdag med par bsgoms te /
T02D2628:76b-0: khro bo me ltar 'bar ba @76b yi ge h'um las bskyed de kha la byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02D2628:76b-1: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang blang ste /
T02D2628:76b-2: bgegs bskrad pa ni h'um bzhi pas bya ste /
T02D2628:76b-3: phyogs bcu'i bgegs bsrung ba la sogs pa khro bo rnams kyis bya'o //
T02D2628:76b-4: de nas sngags dang phyag rgya las khro bo'i sku byung ste /
T02D2628:76b-5: kun kyang nag por 'dug pa phyag gnyis pa rang
T02D2628:76b-6: gi phyag rgya bcing ba dang ldan par bsgom pa'am
T02D2628:76b-7: / yang na zhal gsum phyag drug pa rang rang phyogs kyi kha dog dang ldan pa /
T02D2628:76b-8: phyag dang po gnyis rang gi phyag rgya 'dzin pa
T02D2628:76b-9: phyag bzhin thod dbyug dang rdo rje dang dbyug pa
T02D2628:76b-10: dang / ba dan dang mche ba dang /
T02D2628:76b-11: rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa bsnams pa /
T02D2628:76b-12: phyag rgya thams cad 'chol bar bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:76b-13: sprul pa'i khro bo yin pas ma nges par ji lta ba bzhin bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:76b-14: tha ma gnyis na phur pa dang tho ba'o //
T02D2628:76b-15: de nas rdo rje dang dra ba dang ra ba yang bya'o //
T02D2628:76b-16: de nas sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag byas la
T02D2628:76b-17: sdig pa dral zhing ye shes dbab pa byas nas
T02D2628:76b-18: mngon par byang chub pa lngas dbus kyi gtso bo'i
T02D2628:76b-20: aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes
T02D2628:76b-21: brjod pas chos thams cad zag pa med pa'i gtan
T02D2628:76b-22: tshigs kyis stong pa nyid nam mkha' dang 'dra ba
T02D2628:76b-23: bsgoms la / sems kyi mtshan nyid zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu'i rnam par mos par bya'o //
T02D2628:76b-24: de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2628:76b-25: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod
T02D2628:76b-26: pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de nyid 'od 'phro ba
T02D2628:76b-28: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2628:76b-29: yon tan rnams kyi ji ltar las su byas pa
T02D2628:76b-30: bzhin bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su
T02D2628:76b-31: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mtshan ma ston ka'i zla
T02D2628:76b-32: ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa ltar
T02D2628:76b-33: dang zhing rnyog pa med par mos par bya ste
T02D2628:76b-34: / yun ring du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:76b-35: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
T02D2628:76b-36: aom punye punye ma h'a punye aa pa ri mi
T02D2628:76b-37: ta a'a yur punye dzny'a na sam bh'a ro pa
T02D2628:76b-38: tsi ta pra tsa ya ka ni sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:76b-39: zhes pa'i sngags kyi yi ge g-yas phyogs nas phreng ba'i tshul du bkod pa las /
T02D2628:76b-40: ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro ba dang /
T02D2628:76b-41: 'du ba'i tshul gyis tishtha badzra zhes brjod pa las
T02D2628:76b-42: ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur nas
T02D2628:76b-43: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsgom ste /
T02D2628:77a-0: de'i bum pa'i dkyil du yang yi ge h'um gis mtshan pa ste @77a * //
T02D2628:77a-1: de ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems bdag gis rtogs pa'o //
T02D2628:77a-2: de nas badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas rdo
T02D2628:77a-3: rje de las ye shes kyi rdo rje'i 'od zer
T02D2628:77a-4: lcags kyu lta bu mang po 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i
T02D2628:77a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang /
T02D2628:77a-9: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa rnams kyi sku dang /
T02D2628:77a-10: gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje thams cad bsdus te rdo rje la thim pas brtan par byas so //
T02D2628:77a-11: de nas aom ya th'a badzra satva ta th'a aa
T02D2628:77a-12: ham zhes brjod pas ye shes rdo rje de las
T02D2628:77a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra mo mang po 'phros
T02D2628:77a-14: bas phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus
T02D2628:77a-16: slar 'dus nas rdo rje la thim pas bcom ldan
T02D2628:77a-17: 'das phyag na rdo rje'i sku phyag rgya chen por
T02D2628:77a-18: gyur te / sku mdog dkar po zla ba rgyas
T02D2628:77a-19: pa lta bu'i zhal 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang ldan par
T02D2628:77a-20: gyur te / bsgom mo // de nas yang thugs kar zla ba'i steng du /
T02D2628:77a-21: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: bkod pa las rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlab po //
T02D2628:77a-22: de ltar bdag nyid bskyed nas nang sems kyi dkyil
T02D2628:77a-23: 'khor ni 'og gis sngags rnams las tshe dpag tu
T02D2628:77a-25: de rnams kyi thugs kar yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:77a-26: gyi steng du sngags kyi phreng ba rnams bsams te
T02D2628:77a-27: / 'od zer 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i tshul gyis
T02D2628:77a-28: sems can thams cad la phog pas sems can thams
T02D2628:77a-29: cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa dag par byas
T02D2628:77a-30: / te / khyad par du yang ngan song gsum
T02D2628:77a-31: gyi rtog sgrib sbyangs nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:77a-32: du bcug nas dbang bskur bas rnam par grol ba'i
T02D2628:77a-34: khyad par du yang sems can tshe thung ba rnams
T02D2628:77a-35: tshe bsrings nas rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la
T02D2628:77a-36: gnas par byas / de nas sems can thams cad
T02D2628:77a-37: dang lha dang klu la sogs pas kyang mchod cing
T02D2628:77a-38: bstod nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur /
T02D2628:77a-39: de nas lha de dag dang sngags kyi phreng ba
T02D2628:77a-40: de thugs ka'i rdo rje la 'dus pas brtan zhing
T02D2628:77a-42: de ni sbyor ba dang po dang sems kyi ting nge 'dzin no /
T02D2628:77a-44: // / da ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:77a-45: gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i thabs ni sh'akya thub pa'i dkyil 'khor las shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:77a-46: de yang khyad par ni nang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs
T02D2628:77b-0: bzhi ba rim pa gsum dang ldan @77b bar shes
T02D2628:77b-1: par bya'o // gdan ni seng ge dang glang po
T02D2628:77b-2: che la sogs pa de'i steng na padma dang zla
T02D2628:77b-4: de'i dbus su bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje thabs kyi bdag po bsam ste /
T02D2628:77b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i kun du bzang po
T02D2628:77b-6: byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2628:77b-7: du aom aa mi te aa mi ta aa mi
T02D2628:77b-8: tong bha be / aa mi ta sambha we /
T02D2628:77b-10: aa mi ta bi kr'anta ga mi ni /
T02D2628:77b-11: sarba karma kle sha ksha yam ka ri sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:77b-12: zhes pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams phreng ba'i tshul du bkod la /
T02D2628:77b-13: de las ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phro zhing 'du
T02D2628:77b-14: ba'i tshul gyis yi ge'i phreng ba la thim pa
T02D2628:77b-16: de nas yang 'od zer 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i
T02D2628:77b-17: tshul gyis rigs bzhi'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
T02D2628:77b-19: padma la thim pas padma brtan par byas so //
T02D2628:77b-20: de nas sku phra mo mang du 'phros pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas 'gro ba'i don byas te /
T02D2628:77b-21: slar 'dus pa las padma la thim pas bcom ldan
T02D2628:77b-22: 'das tshe dpag med kyi sku phyag rgya chen por
T02D2628:77b-23: gyur te thugs kar bzhugs par bsam /
T02D2628:77b-24: yang de'i thugs kar sngags kyi phreng ba snga ma bzhin du bkod pa las /
T02D2628:77b-25: sngags brjod pa tsam gyis bskul ba'i tshul du thugs
T02D2628:77b-26: ka nas spyan drangs te phyogs bcur 'phros pas mdzad
T02D2628:77b-27: pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul du 'gro ba'i don mdzad
T02D2628:77b-28: de lhar 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
T02D2628:77b-29: bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa la /
T02D2628:77b-30: cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs /
T02D2628:77b-31: ye shes kyi dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur te tshe dpag tu med pa zhes lan gsum bos te ;
T02D2628:77b-32: ming gi dbang bskur nas las la dgod pa ni 'khor lo'i nub phyogs kyi rtsibs la bzhugs so //
T02D2628:77b-33: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2628:77b-34: aom kam ka ni kam ka ni /
T02D2628:77b-35: ro tsa ni ro tsa ni /
T02D2628:77b-36: tro ta ni tro ta ni /
T02D2628:77b-37: t'a sa ni tr'a sa ni /
T02D2628:77b-40: sarba karma a'a pa ra na pa ri pa ra
T02D2628:77b-41: ni me sarba satv'a n'am sv'a h'a zhes pas sngags
T02D2628:77b-42: kyi phreng ba'i tshul du bkod pa las /
T02D2628:77b-43: ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pa las sems can
T02D2628:77b-44: thams cad kyi sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal sbyangs shing
T02D2628:78a-0: slar 'dus pa las yig 'bru rnams la thim pas rdo rje dmar po la h'um gis @78a * //
T02D2628:78a-2: de las 'phros shing 'dus pa'i tshul gyis tshe brtan par byas so //
T02D2628:78a-3: de las sku phra mo mang po 'phros shing 'dus
T02D2628:78a-4: pa'i tshul du thim pa las mgon po mi 'khrugs
T02D2628:78a-5: pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te thugs ka
T02D2628:78a-6: nas bzhugs so // yang de'i thugs kar zla ba
T02D2628:78a-7: la yi ge'i phreng ba snga ma bzhin du bkod
T02D2628:78a-8: nas bzhugs so // pa las / brjod pa tsam gyis bskul bar phyogs bcur 'phros te /
T02D2628:78a-9: slar 'dus pa las bdag gi mdun na bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas pa la /
T02D2628:78a-10: cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:78a-11: ye shes lnga'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:78a-12: mi 'khrugs pa zhes lan gsum pos te /
T02D2628:78a-13: ming gi dbang bskur nas nyid kyi las kyi bzhugs
T02D2628:78a-14: gnas dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi rtsibs steng du
T02D2628:78a-15: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan
T02D2628:78a-17: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la aom ratne ratne /
T02D2628:78a-20: ratna m'a l'a bi shuddhe shodha ya sarba p'a pam
T02D2628:78a-21: h'um tr'a ta ces pa'i sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng
T02D2628:78a-22: ba bkod pa las 'od 'phros pas sems can thams
T02D2628:78a-23: cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal thams
T02D2628:78a-24: cad sbyangs shing bsal nas slar 'dus pa las rin
T02D2628:78a-25: po che 'bar ba kha dog sngon por gnas par
T02D2628:78a-26: gyur te / de las 'od 'phros shing 'dus pa las brtan par gyur /
T02D2628:78a-27: de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra mo mang po 'phros pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad /
T02D2628:78a-28: bdud kyi gnas thams cad bcom nas slar 'dus pa
T02D2628:78a-29: las bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan kyi sku
T02D2628:78a-30: phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
T02D2628:78a-32: yang de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la sngags kyi phreng
T02D2628:78a-33: ba snga ma bzhin du bkod pa las brjod pa'i
T02D2628:78a-34: tshul gyis bskul bas phyogs bcur 'phros te /
T02D2628:78a-35: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2628:78a-36: bdag gi mdun na bka' nod pa'i tshul du gnas
T02D2628:78a-37: pa la cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs
T02D2628:78a-38: / dbu rgyan gyi dbang bskur rin po che 'bar ba lag tu byin te /
T02D2628:78a-39: rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bos nas ming gi dbang
T02D2628:78a-40: bskur nas nyid kyi bzhugs gnas 'khor lo'i lho phyogs
T02D2628:78a-41: kyi rtsibs la rta'i gdan steng na sna tshogs padma
T02D2628:78a-42: dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol lo//
T02D2628:78b-0: @78b yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2628:78b-1: aom aa mo gha aa pra ti ha ta sarba
T02D2628:78b-2: a'a ba ra na bi na sha ni ha ra
T02D2628:78b-3: ha ra h'um phat ces pas sngags kyi phreng ba'i
T02D2628:78b-4: tshul du bkod pa las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros
T02D2628:78b-5: pas phyi snod kyi 'jig rten g-yo ba dang /
T02D2628:78b-6: nang bcud kyi 'jig rten 'gul ba dang /
T02D2628:78b-7: las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byas te /
T02D2628:78b-8: rmad kyi ya mtshan du 'jig rten du snang bar
T02D2628:78b-9: byas nas slar 'dus pa yi ge la thim pa
T02D2628:78b-10: las rdo rje rgya gram du gyur te /
T02D2628:78b-11: de 'phro 'du las brtan par gyur to //
T02D2628:78b-12: de 'phro 'du las bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za
T02D2628:78b-13: ba'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te thugs ka
T02D2628:78b-15: yang de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du sngags kyi
T02D2628:78b-16: yi ge phreng ba rnams snga ma bzhin du bkod
T02D2628:78b-17: pa las brjod pa tsam gyis bskul pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2628:78b-18: spyan drangs nas thugs ka nas bton te /
T02D2628:78b-19: phyogs bcur 'phros pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de /
T02D2628:78b-20: slar byon nas bka' nod pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2628:78b-22: ming nas bos pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2628:78b-23: nyid kyi las kyi bzhugs gnas byang phyogs kyi 'khor
T02D2628:78b-24: lo'i rtsibs thog tu nam mkha' lding gi steng na
T02D2628:78b-25: sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan steng na bzhugs
T02D2628:78b-26: par bsam mo // de la kha cig na re
T02D2628:78b-27: rgyud dkrugs bas sngags kyi rim pa ltar mi bskyed
T02D2628:78b-28: par bsam mo // de / lha'i rim pa ltar bskyed par bya'o zhes kyang zer ro //
T02D2628:78b-29: 'o na 'dir phyag na rdo rje'i 'khor du rigs
T02D2628:78b-30: bzhi'i sangs rgyas bya ba mi 'gal lam zhe na
T02D2628:78b-31: / 'di'i skabs su phyag na rdo rje ni de
T02D2628:78b-32: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun du bzang po
T02D2628:78b-33: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs
T02D2628:78b-34: pa'i sa bcu gnyis su byin gyis brlabs shing dbang
T02D2628:78b-35: bskur bas bdud dang 'chi bdag thams cad 'joms par
T02D2628:78b-36: byed pa'i mthu dang ldan pa yin pas 'gal ba
T02D2628:78b-37: / med do // dkyil 'khor 'di'i dh'u pe la sogs pa ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:78b-38: de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog go /
T02D2628:78b-40: rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' che //
T02D2628:78b-41: rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni //
T02D2628:78b-42: se gol mang po gdab byas nas //
T02D2628:78b-43: sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya //
T02D2628:78b-44: aom badzra sa ma ya dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D2628:78b-45: de nas phyag na rdo rje yis //
T02D2628:78b-46: phyag rgya chen po sgom byed cing //
T02D2628:79a-2: lan cig rab tu brjod par bya //
T02D2628:79a-3: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
T02D2628:79a-6: dbang du byas shing rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bgegs bskrad pa dang rab dang dra ba byas te /
T02D2628:79a-7: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje khu tshur gyis
T02D2628:79a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bcad nas yi ge gnyis kyis
T02D2628:79a-9: bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung la mchod
T02D2628:79a-10: yon dbul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /
T02D2628:79a-11: dza: h'um bam ho: bha ga b'an badzra ae hye
T02D2628:79a-12: hi sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod par bya zhing
T02D2628:79a-13: rang rang gi sngags kyi mthar yang dag par bskul
T02D2628:79a-14: la dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang chos kyi phyag
T02D2628:79a-15: rgya rang rang gi lce la rdo rje bsam pa
T02D2628:79a-16: dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen pos kyang rgyas gdab bo //
T02D2628:79a-17: de nas mchod pas mchod pa dang /
T02D2628:79a-18: phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod do //
T02D2628:79a-19: de nas bzlas pa la sogs pa bya ste /
T02D2628:79a-20: de 'dra zla ba'am lo'i bar du ji srid gnang ba thob kyi bar du bya'o ;
T02D2628:79a-21: / de ni gnyen pa'i las so //
T02D2628:79a-22: da ni dkyil 'khor gyi las la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D2628:79a-23: sa sbyang zhing gzung ba dang /
T02D2628:79a-24: gnyis pa sta gon la gnas pa kun byas la /
T02D2628:79a-25: de yang thig gdab pa dang /
T02D2628:79a-26: tshon byin gyis brlabs pa kun gong ltar byas la /
T02D2628:79a-27: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbyibs ni /
T02D2628:79a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brtan te /
T02D2628:79a-31: de yi dbus su gtso bo ni //
T02D2628:79a-32: phyag na rdo rje stobs chen te //
T02D2628:79a-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ni lha dgod pa'i rim pa ston te dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:79a-34: de nas rnal 'byor can nyid zhugs //
T02D2628:79a-35: zhes pas ni rnal 'byor pa bdag nyid zhugs par byas te snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2628:79a-36: sngags kyi lha rnams spyan drangs te //
T02D2628:79a-37: zhes pa la sogs pa ni sngon du 'gro ba
T02D2628:79a-38: nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog yan chad byas nas
T02D2628:79a-39: spyan drangs pa'o // de nas gong ltar las la spyor ba bzhin du bzlas pa yan chad bya'o //
T02D2628:79a-40: 'di nas slob ma gzhug par bya ba ston te /
T02D2628:79a-42: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2628:79a-43: 'chi bdag ni gshin rje'i dbang du bya ba'o //
T02D2628:79a-47: des ni zin pa'i sems can rnams ni 'chi bdag
T02D2628:79b-0: la sogs pa gzhom par bya ba'i @79b phyir dkyil
T02D2628:79b-2: de nas slob ma khrus byas te /
T02D2628:79b-4: aom badzra sa ma ya h'um zhes pa dang rdo
T02D2628:79b-5: rje ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya sor mo rnams nang
T02D2628:79b-6: du bsnol la mthe bong gnyis gshibs te mnan pa'i
T02D2628:79b-7: phyag rgya des rin po che'i tog gam /
T02D2628:79b-8: me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa'i slob mas dang por slob dpon la phyag btsal te /
T02D2628:79b-10: de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang /
T02D2628:79b-11: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2628:79b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
T02D2628:79b-15: sdom pa gzung ba la sogs pa byas te /
T02D2628:79b-16: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma de rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bskyed de /
T02D2628:79b-17: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D2628:79b-18: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D2628:79b-19: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ni //
T02D2628:79b-21: aom badzra sa m'a ya h'um zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D2628:79b-23: de la yang slob dpon gyi dbab pa dang /
T02D2628:79b-25: de bzhin gshegs pas dbab pa dang /
T02D2628:79b-27: des kyang dbab par ma gyur na dbang bskur bar mi bya'o //
T02D2628:79b-28: de nas mig gi snang pa dris te /
T02D2628:79b-29: de nas 'dis gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya ste /
T02D2628:79b-30: sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
T02D2628:79b-31: zhes pa la sogs pa brjod la /
T02D2628:79b-32: aom badzra h'a syod gha ta ya h'um zhes so //
T02D2628:79b-35: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D2628:79b-36: aom badzra p'a shyaho zhes pas rdo rje lcags kyu nas phyag na rdo rje'i bar bstan to //
T02D2628:79b-40: // / de nas 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2628:79b-41: dang por slob dpon gyis slob ma de zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste /
T02D2628:79b-42: dang por ni bum pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D2628:79b-43: de nas dbu rgyan gyi dbang ngo //
T02D2628:79b-44: de nas cod pan dang phreng ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D2628:79b-45: de nas rdo rje'i dbang ngo //
T02D2628:79b-46: de nas dril bu'i dbang ngo //
T02D2628:79b-47: de nas ming gi dbang po//
T02D2628:79b-48: de rnams ni rig pa'i dbang ste /
T02D2628:79b-49: de nas phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D2628:79b-50: rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor las khru do dor bar dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir bya ba dang /
T02D2628:79b-51: dbang bskur ba la sogs pa ni rtsa ba'i dkyil
T02D2628:79b-52: 'khor du drangs pas 'dir smos dbang bskur ba'i cho
T02D2628:79b-53: ga'o // de nas sgrub pa sbyin te /
T02D2628:80a-1: kyi rim pa sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02D2628:80a-3: las rgyal po mchog ji ltar bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02D2628:80a-4: tshe bsring pa'i rim pa 'dir byin no //
T02D2628:80a-5: aom bhr'um badzra a'a yu she h'um aa zhes pas sbyin no //
T02D2628:80a-6: da ni 'di nas ras ris kyi sgrub pa bstan te /
T02D2628:80a-7: ras legs par byas pa la bcom ldan 'das rdo
T02D2628:80a-8: rje tshe dpag med zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i
T02D2628:80a-10: 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad can /
T02D2628:80a-11: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste /
T02D2628:80a-18: phyag gnyis pa g-yon mi 'jigs pa dang /
T02D2628:80a-19: g-yas mchog sbyin pa'i tshul las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bri //
T02D2628:80a-20: de'i 'og tu sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba gdong gyen du blta ba /
T02D2628:80a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gi bdud rtsi las dngos grub nod pa'o //
T02D2628:80a-22: de la rab tu gnas pa la sogs pa gong ltar byas nas mchod pa bya ste /
T02D2628:80a-23: bsnyen pa de'i spyan sngar 'bum bzlas la bzod pa bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2628:80a-24: sgrub pa ni gnas yid du 'ong bar dang po
T02D2628:80a-25: nya la mgo btsugs la sgrub pa po 'don pa
T02D2628:80a-26: yang phyi de nya'i bar du bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2628:80a-27: mchod pa chen po byas la zhes pa ni phyi nang gsang pa'i mchod pa byas pa'o //
T02D2628:80a-28: de nas rdzas ni ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma'am /
T02D2628:80a-37: klad pa la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2628:80a-38: de nas rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag pa g-yon
T02D2628:80a-39: pas mnan la bzlas pa mtshan ma byung byung du
T02D2628:80a-40: bzlas par bya'o // mtshan ma ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:80a-41: mtshan ma byung ba dang dngos grub brtag par bya ba'i phyir mtshan cig thog thag bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2628:80a-42: de nas dngos grub blang bar bya ste /
T02D2628:80a-43: nang par sngar bsrung pa la sogs pa byas na zhes pa ni /
T02D2628:80a-44: gzhan gyis dbrog par mi nus par bya ba'i ched
T02D2628:80a-45: du khro bo me ltar 'bar bas bsrung bar bya'o
T02D2628:80a-46: // de nas dngos grub blang bar bya ba ni bdag nyid lha'i skur gsal pa dang /
T02D2628:80a-48: de 'thungs sam zos na 'og gi yon tan rnams 'byung ngo //
T02D2628:80a-49: yon tan ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:80a-50: de ni tshe dpag med las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2628:80a-52: // / da ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug gi don bstan te /
T02D2628:80b-0: de la rgyal @80b po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2628:80b-4: gnod sbyin gyi 'khor zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs te /
T02D2628:80b-5: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis zhes pa ni
T02D2628:80b-6: de nas ni tshe dpag med kyi rting thogs su
T02D2628:80b-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi ni lha'i rgyal po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2628:80b-9: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal
T02D2628:80b-10: nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni zhu ba dang
T02D2628:80b-13: byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba ni phyag na rdo rje'i skabs su dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:80b-15: gnang ba ni phul cig pa'o //
T02D2628:80b-16: de nas snying po phul ba ni dkyus su gsal lo //
T02D2628:80b-17: da ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bskyed thabs ni 'dir 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:80b-18: de yang dang por sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag dang /
T02D2628:80b-20: rdo rje dral ba la sogs pa sngon du byas pa ltar byas la /
T02D2628:80b-21: mngon par byang chub pa lngas dbus kyi gtso bo bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:80b-22: aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes brjod de /
T02D2628:80b-23: gzung ba dang 'dzin par brtags pa'i phyi nang gi
T02D2628:80b-24: dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa phung po
T02D2628:80b-25: dang khams dang skye mched la ji lta bu'i dngos
T02D2628:80b-27: sems nyid 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo zla ba tshes gcig pa lta bu'i ngo bor bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:80b-28: de nas aom bodhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes
T02D2628:80b-29: brjod pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de 'phro ba dang
T02D2628:80b-30: 'du ba'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyi don la
T02D2628:80b-31: 'dris shing goms pa'i rtags zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya
T02D2628:80b-32: gang ba zhig rdzogs par bsgom mo //
T02D2628:80b-33: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su yi ge h'um bkod la /
T02D2628:80b-34: aom badzra tishtha zhes brjod pas h'um de las 'od
T02D2628:80b-35: 'phros pa dang 'du ba'i tshul gyis ye shes kyi
T02D2628:80b-36: rdo rje rtse lnga par gyur to //
T02D2628:80b-37: de'i 'phro 'du las rigs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2628:80b-38: rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs 'dus te
T02D2628:80b-39: / rdo rje de la thim par gyur pas brtan par byas so //
T02D2628:80b-40: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod de /
T02D2628:80b-41: de nas yang brtan par gyur pa'i rdo rje de
T02D2628:80b-42: las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra mo mang du
T02D2628:80b-43: 'phros shing 'dus pa las bcom ldan 'das phyag na
T02D2628:80b-44: rdo rje'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
T02D2628:80b-45: sku mdog dkar po phyag g-yas rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'gyed pa'i tshul gyis thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D2628:80b-46: g-yon dril bu dkur brten par gyur to //
T02D2628:81a-0: de nas de'i gnas bzhi po dag tu byin gyis brlabs @81a * //
T02D2628:81a-2: de nas rgyal bo chen po bzhi bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:81a-3: de yang dang por stong pa nyid du bsgoms nas /
T02D2628:81a-4: de nas gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2628:81a-6: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa bsams la de'i dbus su
T02D2628:81a-7: bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje'i thugs ka'i zla ba'i
T02D2628:81a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom bee zhes pa'o //
T02D2628:81a-9: de'i mtha' mar aom bee shra ba na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:81a-10: zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng ba bkod la /
T02D2628:81a-11: de las 'od zer 'phros pas tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T02D2628:81a-12: bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byas nas slar 'dus te /
T02D2628:81a-13: sngags kyi yi ge la thim pas rin po che'i be con du gyur to //
T02D2628:81a-14: de 'phro 'du las rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyi skur gyur te /
T02D2628:81a-17: g-yon na rin po ches gang ba'i ne'u le'i rkyal bu thogs pa /
T02D2628:81a-18: rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
T02D2628:81a-19: sku lus sbom zhing gsus pa che ba ste /
T02D2628:81a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su seng ge'i khri steng na padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2628:81a-21: g-yas g-yon na bum pa mdzes pa re yang bsam mo //
T02D2628:81a-22: de nas rin po che'i chu 'bab pa'o //
T02D2628:81a-23: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i steng du /
T02D2628:81a-24: aom dhi zhes pa'i mtha' ma na tshur aom dh'i
T02D2628:81a-25: ta r'ashta ye sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags kyi yi
T02D2628:81a-26: ge'i phreng bas bskor ba bsgoms la /
T02D2628:81a-27: de'i 'phro 'du las pi wang du gyur to //
T02D2628:81a-28: de las yul 'khor srung gi skur gyur te /
T02D2628:81a-29: lus ran zhing mdzes pa sku mdog ni ljang gu sta /
T02D2628:81a-30: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2628:81a-31: phyag na pi wang brdebs pa la brtson pa ste /
T02D2628:81a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du seng ge'i khri steng du bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02D2628:81a-33: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla ba'i steng
T02D2628:81a-34: du aom bi zhes pa'i mtha' ma na tshur aom
T02D2628:81a-35: bi ru dha ka ye sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags
T02D2628:81a-36: kyi phreng bas bskor bar bsgom mo //
T02D2628:81a-38: de las 'phags skyes po'i skur gyur te /
T02D2628:81a-39: sku mdog sngon po yid tsam khros pas phyag na
T02D2628:81a-40: ral gri thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs
T02D2628:81a-41: kyi seng ge'i khri steng du bsam mo //
T02D2628:81a-42: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka'i zla bar aom
T02D2628:81a-43: ksha: de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom bi ru p'a
T02D2628:81a-44: ksha ye sv'a h'a zhes pa'i sngags kyi phreng bas
T02D2628:81b-1: de'i 'phro 'du las zhags pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02D2628:81b-2: de las rgyal po mig mi bzang gi skur gyur te /
T02D2628:81b-3: sku mdog ni dmar skya la phyag na rdo rjes
T02D2628:81b-4: mtshan pa'i zhags pa bsnams pa sprul mgo bdun gyis
T02D2628:81b-5: dbu la thod thabs su brgyan pa'o //
T02D2628:81b-6: mig rtsa dmar zhing 'bur ba ste /
T02D2628:81b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi rgya ba [*rgyab] tu gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs par bsgom mo //
T02D2628:81b-8: de nas dh'u pe la sogs pa dang /
T02D2628:81b-9: sgo ba yang gong ltar bskyed la /
T02D2628:81b-10: de la la la dag 'jig rten pa'i 'khor du
T02D2628:81b-11: 'jig rten las 'das pa mi rigs so zhe na
T02D2628:81b-12: / de ni 'jig rten pa'i dbus kyi gtso bo
T02D2628:81b-13: 'jig rten las 'das pas mdzad pas 'di yang 'gal
T02D2628:81b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan drang ngo //
T02D2628:81b-16: spyan drang pa'i sngags ni aom ae hye hi bha
T02D2628:81b-17: ga b'an sa m'a dza dza: h'um bam ho: zhes
T02D2628:81b-18: pas so // de nas rgyal po bzhi spyan drang ngo //
T02D2628:81b-19: de ni rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D2628:81b-20: de nas 'og nas 'byung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan to //
T02D2628:81b-21: de nas mchod pa lnga la sogs pas mchod pa'i phyir /
T02D2628:81b-22: cho ga bzhin du mchod par bya //
T02D2628:81b-24: mchod pa'i sgras bstod pa dang bzlas pa yan chad bya'o //
T02D2628:81b-25: bzlas pa ni gtso bo'i dang po rang rang gi rtsa sngags so //
T02D2628:81b-28: de'i yon tan ni dkyus nyid gsal lo //
T02D2628:81b-29: 'on kyang dbang bskur ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D2628:81b-30: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ni phyag na rdo rje'i bum pa la sogs pas dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2628:81b-31: bum pa'i zlas drangs pas rig pa'i dbang dang /
T02D2628:81b-32: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang rnams so //
T02D2628:81b-33: 'jig rten pa'i dbang ni rgyal po'i bum pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2628:81b-34: bum pas sna drangs la rgyal po bzhi'i rdzas kyis kyang dbang rnams bskur ro //
T02D2628:81b-35: de ltar ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor drug ka la shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:81b-36: rgyal po bzhi'i sgrub pa bshad zin to //
T02D2628:81b-37: de nas 'di nas phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02D2628:81b-38: de nas phyogs bcu skyong ba rnams kyis zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:81b-39: de nas zhes pa ni rgyal po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa nas bar cis kyang mchod pa'o //
T02D2628:82a-1: kyang snying po phul zhing dkyil 'khor bshad do //
T02D2628:82a-2: bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
T02D2628:82a-3: gsol to zhes bya ba nas snying po phul cig
T02D2628:82a-4: ces bya ba'i bar ni gsol ba gdab pa dang
T02D2628:82a-6: snying po phul ba yang 'dir go sla'o //
T02D2628:82a-7: de'i don yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:82a-8: phyogs skyong bcu'i dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ste /
T02D2628:82a-9: gtso bo'i bskyed thabs sngon du 'gro ba'i cho ga dang sdig pa dral ba dang /
T02D2628:82a-11: mngon par byang chub pas dbus kyi gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i sku bskyed pa dang /
T02D2628:82a-14: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin las 'byung ba rim gyis bskyed de /
T02D2628:82a-15: de'i steng du yi ge bhr'um las gzhal yas khang
T02D2628:82a-16: bskyed pa ni gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
T02D2628:82a-17: nang re'u mig dgu ru byas la /
T02D2628:82a-18: lha'i snam bu dang ldan pa /
T02D2628:82a-19: rta babs bzhi sa brgyan pa bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2628:82a-20: de'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje nyid gnas par
T02D2628:82a-21: byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bskyed par bya'o
T02D2628:82a-22: // de la dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar zla
T02D2628:82a-23: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom a'i zhes pa'o
T02D2628:82a-24: // // de'i phyi rim du aom a'i shva na ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:82a-25: zhes pa'i sngags rnams phreng ba'i tshul du bskor bar bya'o //
T02D2628:82a-26: de nas spro ba dang bsdu ba'i sbyor bas tri sh'u la rtse gsum du gyur to //
T02D2628:82a-27: de spro ba dang bsdu bas brtan par bya'o //
T02D2628:82a-28: de 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul gyis skur gyur te /
T02D2628:82a-29: byang shar gyi re'u mig la gdan glang khyu ba'i steng du bzhugs so //
T02D2628:82a-30: de bzhin du aom ai: aom aa /
T02D2628:82a-37: aom bra zhes pa'i snying po la so so'i sngags
T02D2628:82a-38: kyis bskor ba de'i 'phro 'du las dam tshig gi
T02D2628:82a-39: phyag rgya rdo rje gdengs pa dang /
T02D2628:82a-48: de dag gi 'phro 'du las brtan par gyur to //
T02D2628:82a-49: de nyid kyi 'phro 'du las skur gyur te /
T02D2628:82a-50: shar phyogs su brgya byin mdog ser po glang po
T02D2628:82a-51: che'i gdan la bzhugs pa phyag na rdo rje gdengs
T02D2628:82a-52: pa bsnams pa'o // shar lhor me lha dmar se
T02D2628:82a-53: rang skyes kyi gdan la bzhugs pa phyag bzhin skyabs
T02D2628:82a-54: pa bsnams pa'o // sbyin dang / bgrang phreng dang /
T02D2628:82b-2: lhor gshin rje nag po ma he'i gdan la bzhugs pa phyag na thod dbyug bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:82b-3: lho nub tu bden bral dmar nag yi dags kyi gdan la bzhugs pa ral gri thogs pa'o //
T02D2628:82b-4: nub tu chu bdag mdog dmar sbrul gyi gdengs ka
T02D2628:82b-5: can sbrul zhags bsnams pa chu srin gyi gdan can
T02D2628:82b-6: no // nub byang du rlung lha thal ba'i mdog can sha ba'i gdan can ba dan bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:82b-7: byang du nor sbyin mdog ljang gu dbyug to bsnams pa rta'i gdan can no //
T02D2628:82b-8: gtso bo'i mdun du nyi ma mdog dmar rta bdun
T02D2628:82b-9: gyis 'dren pa'i khri la bzhugs pa phyag na padma
T02D2628:82b-10: bsnams pa'o // rgyab tu phag gi gzugs can mdog
T02D2628:82b-11: ser po byi ba'i khri la 'dug pa bum pa
T02D2628:82b-12: bsnams pa'o // bsnams pa'o // gzhan yang sgo ba la sogs pa rnams ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2628:82b-13: de nas spyan drangs te kun la zhes pa ni
T02D2628:82b-14: rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan
T02D2628:82b-15: drang ngo // mchod pa kun gyis mchod par bya //
T02D2628:82b-16: zhes pa ni mchod pa lnga la sogs pa ste /
T02D2628:82b-17: de nas bstod par bya zhing rang gi sngags kyang bzla bar bya'o //
T02D2628:82b-18: de nas dkyil 'khor yang ji ltar grags pa bzhin du bris la dbus su phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D2628:82b-19: dkyil 'khor der dbang bskur nas snying po byin na
T02D2628:82b-20: 'jig rten 'di'i dgos pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro
T02D2628:82b-23: de nas de dag mgu nas ni //
T02D2628:82b-24: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan te /
T02D2628:82b-26: phyogs skyong ba'i bshad pa'i 'grel pa'o //
T02D2628:82b-27: dkyil 'khor de ni gdon stong phrag brgyad cu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs so //
T02D2628:82b-28: da ni 'di nas gza' brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
T02D2628:82b-29: de yang gza' dang dus tshigs dang skar ma'i slung [?] zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bshad do //
T02D2628:82b-30: de nas gza' chen po brgyad dang 'khor rgyu skar
T02D2628:82b-31: du bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol
T02D2628:82b-32: to zhes bya ba ni de nas zhes bya ba
T02D2628:82b-33: ni phyogs skyong ba'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i rting thogs
T02D2628:82b-34: nas so // phyi ma dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:82b-35: byin gyis brlabs pa ni dbang bskur ba dang ming btags par ro //
T02D2628:82b-36: shod cig pa ni gnang ba'o //
T02D2628:82b-37: de nas snying po rnams phul lo //
T02D2628:82b-38: de'i don yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:83a-1: par bde ba'i stan nang tshangs can la 'dug ste /
T02D2628:83a-2: dang por bgegs bskrad pa dang //
T02D2628:83a-3: rdo rje sems dpa' 'am 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D2628:83a-4: par rgyal ba mdun du dmigs nas mchod pa dang
T02D2628:83a-8: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa byas nas /
T02D2628:83a-9: de nas sdig pa dral ba dang ye shes dbab pa byas te /
T02D2628:83a-10: de nas sems so sor rig pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2628:83a-11: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas phyag rgya
T02D2628:83a-12: sku mdog dang phyag mtshan gong du bstan pa lta
T02D2628:83a-13: bu 'am / yang na aom badzra satva kro dh'a
T02D2628:83a-14: na l'arka ma h'a badzra kro dha dra ba dra
T02D2628:83a-15: pa bi dra ba bi dra ba /
T02D2628:83a-16: sarba aa ba ya n'a sha ya n'a sha ya /

T02D2628:83a-19: te / sku mdog sngon po zhal bgrad cing mched pa gtsigs pa phyag na rdo rje dang /

T02D2628:83a-25: 'khor khro bo mang pos bskor ba /
T02D2628:83a-27: zhabs padma lta bus ro mnan nas /
T02D2628:83a-28: thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes ngan song sbyang bar mdzad pa bsam mo //
T02D2628:83a-29: de nas gzhal yas khang ni gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2628:83a-30: rta babs dang mu khyud du bcas pa nang dkyil
T02D2628:83a-31: 'khor dgu pa snam bu rim pa gnyis pa bsgom
T02D2628:83a-32: mo // de'i dbus su gnas par bya ste /
T02D2628:83a-33: 'khor gza' chen po rnams rim par bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2628:83a-34: de la dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba'i
T02D2628:83a-35: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom a'a zhes pas sngags
T02D2628:83a-36: bskyed par bya'o // de'i 'phro 'du las padmar gyur te /
T02D2628:83a-37: de'i 'phro 'du las gza' nyi ma'i skur bskyed de /
T02D2628:83a-38: sku mdog dmar ser la gser gyi ya lad dam 'thab ber gsol ba phyag na padma bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:83a-39: de'i snying gar aom a'a di tya sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83a-40: zhes bkod pa de brjod pa'i tshul gyis phyir phyung ste /
T02D2628:83a-41: rlung gi phyogs su rta'i steng du bya'o //
T02D2628:83a-42: yang dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom sva /
T02D2628:83a-49: zhes pas so so'i sngags rnams rim pa bzhin bkod la /
T02D2628:83a-50: de rnams 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul gyis rang rang
T02D2628:83a-51: gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya me tog kun mu
T02D2628:83b-0: shing thog dang @83b dbyug pa dang /
T02D2628:83b-1: sdigs mdzub bam zla ba rnams su gyur to //
T02D2628:83b-2: de rnams kyi 'phro 'du las so sor sku rnams su gyur to //
T02D2628:83b-3: de nas lha rnams kyi thugs kar aom sva mom sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83b-5: aom bri ha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83b-6: aom sh'u ram ga me sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83b-7: aom sa nee shtsa ra sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83b-8: aom r'a hu la sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:83b-10: rang rang gi sngags brjod pas so so'i gdan stengs su gzhag par bya ste /
T02D2628:83b-11: zla ba ni mdog dkar po phyag na ku mu da bsnams pa nub tu dang pa'i steng du'o //
T02D2628:83b-12: mig dmar ni mdog dmar po byis pa'i gzugs 'dra
T02D2628:83b-13: ba phyag na mgal me bsnams pa me'i phyogs su'o
T02D2628:83b-14: // gza' lag pa ni mdog ser po /
T02D2628:83b-16: g-yon autpa la bsnams pa byang du bsam mo //
T02D2628:83b-17: de yang stan nang tshangs can nam padma'i gdan la'o //
T02D2628:83b-18: phur bu ni mdog dkar ba g-yas pa po ti /
T02D2628:83b-21: ba ti ser po'i stod g-yogs mnabs pa /
T02D2628:83b-22: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bsams te lho na bzhugs so //
T02D2628:83b-23: pa ba sangs ni mdog dkar ba rgyan thams cad
T02D2628:83b-24: kyis brgyan pa phyag na shing thog bsnams pa ste
T02D2628:83b-25: / mdun du stan nang tshangs can gyi steng du'o //
T02D2628:83b-26: spen pa mdog gnag la rgyan med pa skra bshig pa /
T02D2628:83b-27: lag na dbyug pa bsnams pa /
T02D2628:83b-28: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su stan nang tshangs can la gnas pa'o //
T02D2628:83b-29: sgra gcan mdog dung kha mi'i mgo can yid tsam
T02D2628:83b-30: khros pa mche ba gtsigs pa skra ser po gyen
T02D2628:83b-31: du 'greng ba / mgrin pa man chad sprul gyis dkris pa 'am /
T02D2628:83b-32: rnam pa gcig tu na sprin gyi nang na 'dug pa sdigs mdzub bsgreng pa ste //
T02D2628:83b-33: srin po'i phyogs su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2628:83b-34: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rim gyi khor yug tu ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod do //
T02D2628:83b-35: dbang ldan gyi phyogs nas brtsams te shar du dgod
T02D2628:83b-36: par bya ba ni smin drug mdog dmar bum pa'i
T02D2628:83b-37: steng na 'dug pa me lce 'bar bas 'khor ba
T02D2628:83b-38: bri / snar ma ni mdog ljang gu glang khyu ba dkar po la zhon pa /
T02D2628:83b-39: mgon ni mdog ser po sha ba la zhon pa bri //
T02D2628:83b-40: lag pa mdog dmar sbrul 'khyil pa la zhon pa /
T02D2628:83b-41: nab so ni mdog ser po padma la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:83b-42: rgyal ni mdog ljang gu bum pa'i steng na'o //
T02D2628:83b-43: skag ni mdog ljang gu bya rog la 'dug pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-0: @84a * // lho phyogs su bri ba ni mchu mdog ser ma he la zhon pa /
T02D2628:84a-1: gre ni mdog dkar padma la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:84a-2: sbo ni ljang gu gser gyi khri la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:84a-3: me bzhi ni mdog ser po glang po che la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:84a-4: nag pa ni mdog ljang gu rma bya la zhon pa /
T02D2628:84a-5: sa ri ni mdog ljang gu spyang mo nyug pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-6: sa ga ni mdog ljang gur skyes la zhon pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-7: bden bral nas brtsams te nub tu bri ba lha
T02D2628:84a-8: mtshams ni mdog ser lag na 'bras bu thogs pa
T02D2628:84a-10: snron ni mdog dmar stan nang tshangs can la 'dug pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-11: snrubs ni mdog ljang gu rus sbal la zhon pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-12: chu stod ni mdog ser la phub kyi stan la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:84a-13: chu smad mdog ljang gu mi la zhon pa /
T02D2628:84a-14: byi bzhin ni mdog ser 'khor lo thogs nas nam mkha' lding la 'dug pa /
T02D2628:84a-15: gro bzhin ni mdog ser po kur ma la 'dug pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-16: rlung gi phyogs nas brtsams te byang du bri ba /
T02D2628:84a-17: mon gru ni mdog dmar stan nang tshangs can la 'dug pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-18: mon dre ni mdog ljang gu glang khyu ba la 'dug pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-19: khrums stod ni mdog ljang gu gser gyi khri la 'dug pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-20: khrums smad ni mdog dmar po gser khri la 'dug pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-21: nam gru ni mdog dmar po rta la zhon pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-22: tha skar ni mdog ljang gu mi la zhon pa bri /
T02D2628:84a-23: bra nye ni mdog sngo nag 'khor lo'i steng du 'dug pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84a-24: rgyu skar de dag kyang bud med kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2628:84a-25: sgo bzhir yang sgo ba bzhi bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84a-26: de nas ni spyan drang ba dang /
T02D2628:84a-28: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa dang /
T02D2628:84a-29: sngags bzlas pa la brtson pa thun bzhir bya'o //
T02D2628:84a-30: de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yang bya ste /
T02D2628:84a-31: dbus su phyag na rdo rje'am /
T02D2628:84a-34: de nas rnal 'byor pa bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag tu /
T02D2628:84a-35: me tog thogs la 'dug pa'i rim pas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2628:84a-38: de yang dang por slob ma byin gyis brlab pa
T02D2628:84a-39: ni aom badzra gra ha na h'um phat ces bya
T02D2628:84a-40: bas phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2628:84a-41: de nas sdig pa la sogs pa 'chags su gzhug go //
T02D2628:84a-42: de nas aom badzra gr'a h'a sa ma ye h'um zhes pas dkyil 'khor du drangs te /
T02D2628:84b-0: dbab pa dang snang ba @84b dris nas /
T02D2628:84b-1: aom badzra gra ha pra t'itstsha sa ma ye h'um zhes pas me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-2: de nas gza' brgyad kyi bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2628:84b-3: de nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang yang bskur ro //
T02D2628:84b-4: de nas gza' thams cad bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya
T02D2628:84b-5: ba ni zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad nas
T02D2628:84b-6: brtsams te / dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du bris la
T02D2628:84b-7: bdag nyid kyis gang dang gang bsgrubs pa'i rdzas kyis
T02D2628:84b-12: sgra gcan sgrub na ni me tog dmar po dang bu ram gyi chu la sogs pas mchod la /
T02D2628:84b-13: sngags rdzas de nyid la 'bum la sogs pa mtshan ma byung byung du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-14: de nas tsandan dmar po'i shing gi me sbar la 'bras thug dang /
T02D2628:84b-17: sbrang rtsi dang bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-21: lce pog gi bdug pas bdug go / las gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub blang ngo //
T02D2628:84b-24: phur bu bsgrub par 'dod pa des /
T02D2628:84b-25: dus dang skar ma gong ma dang 'dra ba la dkyil 'khor gong ma lta bu la /
T02D2628:84b-26: dbus dkar po tsandan dkar pos bris la me tog dkar po dang /
T02D2628:84b-27: rdzas dkar pos mchod la bzlas pa mtshan ma byung byung du bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-28: de nas mtshan ma byung ba dang sbyin sreg gi dngos grub blang bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-29: de yang tsandan dkar po'i shing la me sbar te
T02D2628:84b-30: 'bras thug dang til bsres la til des sbyin sreg
T02D2628:84b-32: gza' brgyad kyi mthun pa'i rdzas ni rin po che dang /
T02D2628:84b-39: gur gum bsres la sgrub pa'am yang na so sor bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-40: dam bca' ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:84b-42: yud tsam la sogs pa ni gnas skabs de la dbang byed pa'i gza' dang skar ma'o //
T02D2628:84b-44: skad cig ma brgyad rim gyis sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2628:84b-45: gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bshad pa'o /
T02D2628:84b-47: // / da ni klu gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir
T02D2628:84b-48: klu chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bya
T02D2628:85a-0: ste / de nas klu chen po brgyad kyis phut @85a * //
T02D2628:85a-1: ces bya ba'i sgras zhes pas ni de nas zhes
T02D2628:85a-2: bya ba ni gza' chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:85a-4: klu chen po brgyad ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i grangs so //
T02D2628:85a-5: phut ces bya ba'i sgras zhes pa ni klu chen po brgyad kyi snying po spyir dril ba ste /
T02D2628:85a-6: klu thams cad de las mi 'da' bas de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2628:85a-7: de yang gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2628:85a-9: snying po phul ba ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:85a-10: da ni de'i sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang /
T02D2628:85a-12: de yang sngon du 'gro ba nas mngon par byang
T02D2628:85a-13: chub pas phyag na rdo rje'i sku phyag rgya chen
T02D2628:85a-14: por yongs su rdzogs par bskyed de /
T02D2628:85a-15: sku mdog ljang gu yid tsam khros pa /
T02D2628:85a-16: zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa /
T02D2628:85a-17: phyag g-yas na rdo rje gsor ba /
T02D2628:85a-18: g-yon khro bo'i khu tshur snying gar bstan pa /
T02D2628:85a-19: dbu la sbrul mgo brgyad kyi gdengs kas 'od kyi phreng ba'i tshul du brgyan par bya ste /
T02D2628:85a-20: de la yang byin gyis brlabs pa dang dbang bskur ba byas nas /
T02D2628:85a-21: de nas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la /
T02D2628:85a-23: bhrum las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2628:85a-24: dbus padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa la /
T02D2628:85a-25: de'i dbus su bdag nyid gnas par bsam mo //
T02D2628:85a-28: kha dog dkar po bri bar bya //
T02D2628:85a-29: de yi dbus su gtso bo yi //
T02D2628:85a-30: phyag na rdo rje rab gnas pa //
T02D2628:85a-31: sbrul mgo mtha' yas gdengs pa yi //
T02D2628:85a-32: ltos 'gro chen po sdigs pa bri //
T02D2628:85a-33: zhes pas de ltar gsungs te /
T02D2628:85a-34: gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang de ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:85a-35: de nas dbus kyi gtso bo de'i thugs kar zla
T02D2628:85a-36: ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su rtsa ba'i sngags kyi
T02D2628:85a-37: yi ge aom phu de'i mtha' ma na phar aom
T02D2628:85a-38: aa nanda sv'a h'a zhes pas bskor ba bkod la
T02D2628:85a-39: de'i 'phro ba dang 'du bas rin po che 'bar

T02D2628:85a-41: po mtha' yas sku mdog ser po la phyag na

T02D2628:85a-44: yang de'i thugs kar zla ba'i steng du rin po

T02D2628:85b-11: aom karko t'a ya sv'a h'a /

T02D2628:88b-50: ci dga' bar ni sbyin par byed //
T02D2628:89a-0: @89a * // dngos grub de byin nas ji ltar 'gro na /
T02D2628:89a-1: byin nas dgod cing 'gro bar byed //
T02D2628:89a-3: gal te rnal 'byor pa skrag na ni de ma thag tu gsod par byed do //
T02D2628:89a-4: de bas na mi skrag par blang bar bya'o //
T02D2628:89a-7: // / da 'di nas lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor bshad de //
T02D2628:89a-8: de ni 'jig rten pa'i lha mi dga' ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs so //
T02D2628:89a-9: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha chen po
T02D2628:89a-10: rnams kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2628:89a-11: / de yang gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2628:89a-14: de nas tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang snying po phul lo //
T02D2628:89a-15: de'i don yang sbyor ba dang po dang /
T02D2628:89a-17: las rgyal po mchog gsum gyis bstan to //
T02D2628:89a-18: de yang dang por gnas yid du 'ong bar bde ba'i stan la 'dug ste /
T02D2628:89a-19: bdag med pas nang gi khrus byas te /
T02D2628:89a-21: de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje ra ba dang dra ba byas te //
T02D2628:89a-22: mdun gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha dmigs te /
T02D2628:89a-26: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2628:89a-28: byang chub kyi sems gzung ba dang /
T02D2628:89a-29: sdom pa la gnas par byas nas /
T02D2628:89a-30: de nas lag pa 'og nas 'byung bas byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2628:89a-33: de brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2628:89a-35: mngon par byang chub pa lngas khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar bskyed de /
T02D2628:89a-36: sku mdog dkar ljang zhal gsum pa la g-yas zhi ba ;
T02D2628:89a-39: phyag gnyis h'um gi phyag rgya bcings nas mdzub mo bsgrengs te g-yas rdo rje /
T02D2628:89a-41: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2628:89a-45: bti'i sham thabs kyis brgyan par bsgoms la /
T02D2628:89a-46: de'i thugs kyi sprul pa las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa rta babs bzhis brgyan pa /
T02D2628:89a-47: nang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa mu khyud dang bcas pa bsam par bya'o //
T02D2628:89a-48: de'i dbus dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs la sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D2628:89b-1: de'i dbus su bdag nyid bsams te //
T02D2628:89b-2: de nas bdag gi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:89b-3: gyi steng du aom aom zhes pa'i sngags bkod la
T02D2628:89b-4: / de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom prahm'a ya sv'a
T02D2628:89b-5: h'a zhes pas bskor ba de las 'od zer 'phro
T02D2628:89b-6: ba dang 'du ba'i tshul gyis padmar gyur /
T02D2628:89b-8: de'i 'phro 'dus tshangs pa chen po mdog ser po phyag na padma bsnams par gyur te /
T02D2628:89b-9: yang de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sngags
T02D2628:89b-10: gong ma bkod nas brjod pa tsam gyis bton te
T02D2628:89b-11: dbus kyi gtso bo'i rgya ba kyi rtsibs kyi steng
T02D2628:89b-12: du padma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs so //
T02D2628:89b-13: de nas yang dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du /
T02D2628:89b-20: aom k'a zhes pa'i sngags kyi mtha' ma na tshur /
T02D2628:89b-21: aom bishnu ra dz'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-22: aom bi ru dha k'a y'a sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-23: aom ai ndr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-24: aom ma h'a kam ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-25: aom ga na pa ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-26: aom bhrim gi ri ti sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:89b-28: zhes pas bskor ba de rnams kyi 'phro 'du las so so'i phyag mtshan 'khor lo dang /
T02D2628:89b-34: mdung thung rnams su gyur te de las 'phros shing 'dus pa las /
T02D2628:89b-35: lha chen rnams kyis so so'i skur gyur te /
T02D2628:89b-37: de dag so so'i thugs kar rang rang gi sngags
T02D2628:89b-38: bkod nas brjod pa tsam gyis thugs ka nas bton
T02D2628:89b-39: nas so so'i gnas su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad po
T02D2628:89b-40: rnams kyi rtsibs steng du rim par bzhugs su gsol
T02D2628:89b-41: lo // de la gtso bo'i g-yon te /
T02D2628:89b-42: byang du khyab 'jug mdog sngon po g-yon 'khor lo /
T02D2628:89b-43: g-yas dbyug pa dang bcas pa'i lag pa brkyang ba'o //
T02D2628:89b-44: gtso bo'i mdun shar du drag po ma h'a de ba khros pa ste /
T02D2628:89b-45: mdog nag po mdung rtse gsum thogs pa /
T02D2628:89b-46: stag lpags kyi smad g-yogs kyis brgyan pa mtshan ma bsgreng pa'o //
T02D2628:89b-47: gtso bo'i g-yas te lhor brgya byin mdog dkar ser rdo rje gdengs pa thogs pa mig gsum pa'o //
T02D2628:89b-48: byang shar du 'dod pa'i dbang po mdog dmar po mda' gzhu thogs pa'o //
T02D2628:89b-49: shar lho mtshams su ni tshogs kyi bdag po glang
T02D2628:89b-50: po che'i mgo can mdog dkar po dgra sta thogs
T02D2628:89b-51: pa'o // lho nub tu bhridgi ri ti rus pa'i
T02D2628:89b-52: mdog can la snyim pa bkan te (gong du ral
T02D2628:90a-2: / nub byang du gzhon nu smin drug byis pa'i
T02D2628:90a-3: mdog can mgo drug lag na mdung thogs pa ste
T02D2628:90a-5: gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhir lcags kyu dang /
T02D2628:90a-9: phyi rol gyi khor yug la shar du stobs bzangs mdog ljang gu lag na gshol bsnams pa /
T02D2628:90a-10: nub tu dga' ba'i dbang phyug mdog dmar po phyag na gshol thung bsnams pa'o //
T02D2628:90a-11: nag po chen po mdog gnag cing mi sdug pa
T02D2628:90a-12: phyag na mdung rtse gsum pa bsnams pa rgyan dang
T02D2628:90a-13: cha lugs kyis brgyan pa lhor bri'o //
T02D2628:90a-14: gshin rje ni mdog gnag cing seng ge'i thog tu
T02D2628:90a-15: phyag na thod pa khrag gis bkang ba thogs pa
T02D2628:90a-18: da ni spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D2628:90a-19: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes pa'i sngags kyis gtso bo
T02D2628:90a-20: dang lha chen po 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs
T02D2628:90a-21: te / de nas mdun du bsams nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas brtan par bya ba dang /
T02D2628:90a-23: byin gyis brlab pa yang bya'o //
T02D2628:90a-24: de nas mchod pas mchod de gtso bo'i sngags la
T02D2628:90a-25: sogs pa rgyud las gsungs pa'i grangs tshad tsam bzlas
T02D2628:90a-26: par bya'o // de nas dkyil 'khor la bdag nyid 'jug pa dang /
T02D2628:90a-27: slob ma dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2628:90a-28: bsgrub pa la sogs pa mchod rten nam ring bsrel gyi drung du bsgrub pa bya ba dang /
T02D2628:90a-29: 'grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas dngos grub blang ba dang /
T02D2628:90a-30: dam bca' ba tshang ba la sogs pa byas pa rnams dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:90a-31: la la dag lha chen po brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:90a-32: gyi rim pa la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i dkyil
T02D2628:90a-33: 'khor drug po 'di dag bzlas pa'i sngags kyi phreng
T02D2628:90a-34: ba mi dgod par rtsa ba'i sngags 'phro 'du las
T02D2628:90a-35: skur bskyed la bzlas pa'i sngags brjod pas ni phyir
T02D2628:90a-36: bton te rang rang gi gnas su dgod ces zer
T02D2628:90a-37: ro // kha cig ni sngags rnams thugs ka nas
T02D2628:90a-38: bton nas rang rang gi gnas su bkod pa las
T02D2628:90a-39: skur bskyed pa yod ces zer ro //
T02D2628:90a-40: la la na re 'jig rten pa'i lha 'di dag
T02D2628:90a-41: bskyed pa'i thabs yi ge k'a las khyab 'jug gi
T02D2628:90a-42: gzugs bskyed do // yi ge kha las lha gzhon nu'o //
T02D2628:90a-43: yi ge ga las ni brgya byin no //
T02D2628:90a-44: yi ge gha yis ni tshangs pa'o //
T02D2628:90a-45: yi ge ta yis nyi ma'o //
T02D2628:90b-0: @90b tha yis ni legs gnas so //
T02D2628:90b-3: pa yis ni nor sbyin no //
T02D2628:90b-6: bha yis ni ku be ra'o //
T02D2628:90b-7: ra yis ni phag mgo can no //
T02D2628:90b-8: zla tshes dang thig ler ldan pas ni gshin rje'o //
T02D2628:90b-10: kha yis ni tshogs bdag go ;
T02D2628:90b-11: sha dang tsa dang tsha dang /
T02D2628:90b-13: nya yis ni phyag brnyan lnga'o //
T02D2628:90b-14: ta tha da dha nas phyag brnyan ma lnga'o //
T02D2628:90b-16: ra yis ni bdud rtsi ma'o //
T02D2628:90b-18: rdo rje mchu'i chung ma yang nges so //
T02D2628:90b-19: yi ge ba yis ni pho nya mo nor lha'i chung ma'o //
T02D2628:90b-20: ksha yis ni phag mgo ma'o //
T02D2628:90b-21: pha yis ni rgyal bar byed ma /
T02D2628:90b-22: sha yis ni sbrang rtsir byed ma /
T02D2628:90b-23: sa yis don rnams thams cad grub par byed ma /
T02D2628:90b-26: zla tshes dang thig ler ldan pa rnams kyis bskyed do //
T02D2628:90b-27: de dag gi 'khor ni gtso bo'i yi ge 'bru las so zhes gleng ngo //
T02D2628:90b-28: lha chen po brgyad kyi khor yug la'ang de rnams bri ba 'am /
T02D2628:90b-30: lha chen po'i bshad pa nges pa'o /
T02D2628:90b-32: // / da ni 'di nas tshe dpag med 'chi bdag 'joms pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad de /
T02D2628:90b-33: de yang sems can dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gsungs te /
T02D2628:90b-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje nyid
T02D2628:90b-35: kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la kun du gzigs nas
T02D2628:90b-36: / 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang zhes pa ni thugs
T02D2628:90b-37: yang dag pa'i ye shes las skyes pa'i phyag na
T02D2628:90b-38: rdo rje nyid kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs
T02D2628:90b-39: / pa la / tshe dpag med kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D2628:90b-40: bshad par bzhed nas glang po che chen po'i sta
T02D2628:90b-41: stangs kyis kun du gzigs nas zhal 'dzum pa gser
T02D2628:90b-42: gyi kha dog lta bu mdzad pa'i 'od kyis 'jig
T02D2628:90b-43: rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad /
T02D2628:90b-44: snang bar mdzad pa de las ci byas snyam pa la /
T02D2628:90b-45: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag g-yos zhes gsungs te /
T02D2628:90b-46: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor lo /
T02D2628:90b-47: g-yos pa ni drod de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs g-yos pa'o //
T02D2628:90b-48: yang dag par g-yos zhes pa ni rtse mo ste
T02D2628:90b-49: dge ba rnam par 'phel ba'i rtse mor gyur pas
T02D2628:90b-50: / phyi gzung ba'i yul spangs pa de yang dag par g-yos pa'o //
T02D2628:90b-51: 'gul yang dag par 'gul zhes pa ni bzod pa ste /
T02D2628:91a-2: nang 'dzin par byed pa'i sems spong bar byed pa la yang dag par rab tu 'gul ba'o //
T02D2628:91a-3: 'bar rab tu 'bar ba zhes pa ni 'jig rten chos kyi mchog ste /
T02D2628:91a-4: nang 'dzin pa'i sems spangs pas ni 'bar ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:91a-5: sa dang po bden pa mthong bas ni rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:91a-6: yang dag par rab tu 'bar zhing zhes pa ni sa dang po mthong ba'i lam ste /
T02D2628:91a-7: 'jig rten pa'i mtshan ma rab tu bcom pas yang dag par rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya'o //
T02D2628:91a-8: dgong rab tu dgod yang dag par rab tu dgod
T02D2628:91a-9: ces pa ni ye shes kyi sa bsgom pa'i lam
T02D2628:91a-11: de'i grogs su gyur pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
T02D2628:91a-12: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi sa rab tu dgod par byed do //
T02D2628:91a-13: spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa bcus yang dag par rab tu dgod ces bya'o //
T02D2628:91a-14: rtse rab tu rtse yang dag par rab tu rtse
T02D2628:91a-15: zhes pa ni sa bcu pa chos kyi sprin rab
T02D2628:91a-16: tu thob pas na rtse zhing rab tu rtse ba'o
T02D2628:91a-17: // 'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa rab tu thob
T02D2628:91a-18: par byed pa'i mngon par byang chub pa la rab
T02D2628:91a-19: tu bzhag pas na yang dag par rab tu rtse
T02D2628:91a-20: // zhes bya'o // de ltar sangs rgyas bas stobs
T02D2628:91a-21: dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'bras bu'i chos
T02D2628:91a-22: mthar phyin pas na rmad kyi ya mtshan du ma
T02D2628:91a-23: 'jig rten du snang bar gyur to zhes pa ni
T02D2628:91a-24: dga' ldan gyi gnas nas mi'i yul du babs te
T02D2628:91a-25: // zhes bya'o // / mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi
T02D2628:91a-26: tshul mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tha tshig gis sems
T02D2628:91a-28: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:91a-31: de yang 'dzum pa'i rgyu'i zhu ba dang /
T02D2628:91a-32: sngags kyi yon tan gsungs pa dang /
T02D2628:91a-33: bshad par gsol ba gdab pa gsum ni dkyus gsal bsam bkrol lo //
T02D2628:91a-34: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje tshangs
T02D2628:91a-35: pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis gsol ba'i tshig
T02D2628:91a-36: gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
T02D2628:91a-37: po rig sngags 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo
T02D2628:91a-38: rje las phyung ngo zhes pa ni nang sems kyi
T02D2628:91a-39: dkyil 'khor bstan / de'i don yang phyag na rdo
T02D2628:91a-40: rje'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du
T02D2628:91a-41: dkyil 'khor bstan / rdo rje che / phyag na
T02D2628:91a-42: rdo rje'i g-yon du khro bo las sna tshogs pa
T02D2628:91a-43: dkyil 'khor bstan / rdo rje che / dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang /
T02D2628:91a-44: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la sogs pa'i skur gyur te /
T02D2628:91b-0: de rnams kyi thugs kar yang sngags punye zhes @91b pa la sogs pa'i rim pa bkod pa las /
T02D2628:91b-1: 'od zer spros pas 'gro ba sems can thams cad
T02D2628:91b-2: la phog pas sems can thams cad kyi las dang
T02D2628:91b-3: nyon mongs pa thams cad sbyangs /
T02D2628:91b-4: khyad par du yang sems can tshe zad pa thams cad tshe bsrings te /
T02D2628:91b-5: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dbang bskur
T02D2628:91b-6: bas tshogs kyi lam la sogs pa lam lnga rim
T02D2628:91b-7: gyis thob nas sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhag go
T02D2628:91b-8: // de nas ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi don du snying po dang sngags gsungs so //
T02D2628:91b-9: de'i don yang 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T02D2628:91b-10: dang por gnas yid du 'ong bar bde ba'i stan la khrus kyi yan lag dang /
T02D2628:91b-11: rnal 'byor gyis don du gnyer bar byas nas 'dug ste /
T02D2628:91b-12: sngon du 'gro ba'i yan lag byas nas gong du
T02D2628:91b-13: gsungs pa bzhin sdig pa dral ba la sogs pa
T02D2628:91b-14: byas la aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro
T02D2628:91b-16: chos rnams rdul phra mo bzhin bshig pa'am /
T02D2628:91b-17: thog ma nas ma byung ma skyes pas na /
T02D2628:91b-18: rang gi sems ji bzhin pa la brtags te /
T02D2628:91b-19: glo bur gyi bag chags rab tu bsal nas rang
T02D2628:91b-20: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo zla tshes gcig
T02D2628:91b-21: pa lta bur bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2628:91b-22: de las aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi
T02D2628:91b-23: zhes bzlas pas de las 'od zer 'phro ba dang
T02D2628:91b-24: 'du ba'i tshul gyis tshogs rnam pa gnyis rdzogs pa'i
T02D2628:91b-25: ngo bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang zhing yongs
T02D2628:91b-27: de'i steng aom bhr'um sv'a h'a /
T02D2628:91b-28: de'i phyi rim na tshur aom punye punye ma h'a punye /
T02D2628:91b-29: aa pa ri mi ta a'a yu punye /
T02D2628:91b-30: dzny'a na sam bh'a ro pa tsi te sv'a h'a
T02D2628:91b-31: zhes pa'i sngags kyi yi ge g-yas nas phreng pa'i
T02D2628:91b-33: aom tishtha badzra zhes brjod pas /
T02D2628:91b-34: de las 'od zer 'phro ba dang 'du ba'i tshul
T02D2628:91b-35: gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa cig
T02D2628:91b-36: tu gyur to// de nas aom badzra a'atma ko& ham
T02D2628:91b-37: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2628:91b-38: pa de las 'od zer lcags kyu lta bu 'phros
T02D2628:91b-39: pas rigs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs
T02D2628:91b-40: rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa thams cad bsdus te
T02D2628:91b-41: tu gyur to// / slar rdo rje nyid la thim pas mi g-yo bar gyur par bsgom mo //
T02D2628:91b-42: aom ya th'a badzra sarba ta th'a ga ta aa
T02D2628:91b-43: ham zhes brjod pas brtan par gyur pa'i rdo rje
T02D2628:91b-44: de las sku phra mo mang bo 'phros pas sangs
T02D2628:91b-45: rgyas kyi mdzad pa ma lus par mdzad nas lhar
T02D2628:91b-46: 'dus te rdo rje la thim pa las bcom ldan
T02D2628:91b-47: 'das tshe dang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T02D2628:91b-48: dang gzi brjid tshad med pa'i rgyal po'i sku phyag
T02D2628:92a-1: ba lta bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag
T02D2628:92a-2: g-yas pas chos 'chad pa'i tshul la g-yon skyabs sbyin
T02D2628:92a-3: mdzad pa'o // yang de'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2628:92a-4: 'khor la sngags kyi yi ge rnams phreng ba'i tshul
T02D2628:92a-6: rdo rje rtse lnga pa yi ge h'um gis bskyed
T02D2628:92a-7: pa 'phro ba dang 'du bas brtan par byas par
T02D2628:92a-8: gyur te / de'i 'phro 'du las rigs bzhi'i de
T02D2628:92a-9: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs 'dus nas rdo rje
T02D2628:92a-10: la bstims pas shin tu mi g-yo zhing brtan par
T02D2628:92a-11: gyur te / gyur to // de nas bcom ldan
T02D2628:92a-12: 'das de la dbang bskur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T02D2628:92a-14: yang nyid kyi thugs gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du lha rnams kyi snying po bhr'um dang /
T02D2628:92a-18: hr'i: rnams las rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /
T02D2628:92a-21: yang lha de dag gi thugs kar rig pa'i sngags rnams dang /
T02D2628:92a-22: rtsa ba'i snying po las 'od zer 'phros pas stong
T02D2628:92a-23: gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab

T02D2628:95b-5: de la 'di ni spyi'i dbang du byas pa ste
T02D2628:95b-6: de yang lha'i bu rnams zhes pa ni 'jig rten
T02D2628:95b-7: pa'i 'khor rnams la spyi'i ming nas pos pa'o //
T02D2628:95b-8: zhi ba zhes pa ni phrin las bzhi las dkar ba'o //
T02D2628:95b-9: thugs rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma 'joms shing mgo gnon pas ni zhi ba'o //
T02D2628:95b-10: de la zhi bar bya ba'i thabs ni phrin las 'dis so //
T02D2628:95b-11: de yang ji lta bu zhig snyam pa la /
T02D2628:95b-12: hom khung tha ma bar ma mchog / khru gang khru do khru bzhi pa //
T02D2628:95b-13: zlum po nyid du byas nas ni //
T02D2628:95b-14: zhes pa ni thab khung tha ma khru gang ba dang /
T02D2628:95b-17: gzung 'dzin gnyis spangs nas gnas pa'i phyir na khru gang pa'o //
T02D2628:95b-18: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshogs kyi lam dang
T02D2628:95b-19: sbyor ba'i lam la gnas pa'i rtags su khru do'o
T02D2628:95b-20: // sbyor ba'i lam gyi ye shes bzhi dang ldan pa'i rtags su khru bzhi'o //
T02D2628:95b-21: bden pa'i don de nyid mthong ba'i rtags su ni zlum por byas pa'o //
T02D2628:95b-22: de lta bu'i dbus su sbyin sreg ming ngam sha'am
T02D2628:95b-23: rus ba las byas na rnam par grol ba dbang
T02D2628:95b-24: du bya ba'i grangs ni dkyus gsal lo //
T02D2628:95b-25: thab khung gi dbus su phyag mtshan dgod pa ni
T02D2628:95b-26: de'i dbus su 'khor lo ni zhes pa la sogs
T02D2628:95b-27: pa ni thab de'i dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad
T02D2628:95b-29: thab kyi khor yug gi mu ran la kha khyer
T02D2628:95b-30: sor bzhi pa dang brgyad pa dang bcu drug pa
T02D2628:95b-31: bya'o // de la rdo rje'i ra ba rdo rje rtse lnga pa dkar po bri'o //
T02D2628:95b-32: 'khor lo'i dbus su yang rdo rje dkar po rtse lnga pa bri'o //
T02D2628:95b-33: 'khor lo'i rtsibs la shar la sogs pa'i rim par rdo rje dang /
T02D2628:95b-36: kha khyer gyi phyi rol gyi rim pa la padma
T02D2628:95b-37: 'dab ma bcu drug la sdig pa thams cad 'joms
T02D2628:95b-38: par byed pa'i ming bcu gnyis las sems dpa' bcu
T02D2628:95b-39: drug bskyed pa'i phyag rgya sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o
T02D2628:95b-40: // phyi yi rdo rje rigs rnams kyi //
T02D2628:96a-1: rgya rnams ni phyi rol bri //
T02D2628:96a-2: zhes pa ni phyi rol lha'i snam bu rim pa
T02D2628:96a-3: gnyis par byas pa la phyogs skyong ba rnams dang
T02D2628:96a-4: / lha chen po brgyad la sogs pa bri /
T02D2628:96a-5: de'i phyi rim gyi snam bu la gza' brgyad dang /
T02D2628:96a-6: rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ming ngam thig ler bri'o ;
T02D2628:96a-7: / de nas sgo dang rta babs la sogs pa bri'o //
T02D2628:96a-8: da ni mchod pa'i khyad par ston te /
T02D2628:96a-9: bya dang bum pa gang ba dang /
T02D2628:96a-10: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T02D2628:96a-11: sdig pa bkru ba'i bum pa khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2628:96a-12: dbang bskur ba'i bum pa dang /
T02D2628:96a-13: gzhan yang mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang /
T02D2628:96a-15: sems can shi ba'i ming gdags pa'i gzhi ste yungs kar dang /
T02D2628:96a-26: ku sha la sogs pa tsandan dkar pos kha dog bsgyur la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2628:96a-27: da ni chas gos bstan te /
T02D2628:96a-28: dkar po'i gos ni bgos nas kyang //
T02D2628:96a-29: zhes pas ni chas gos rnam pa lnga dkar por bya ba'o //
T02D2628:96a-30: sangs rgyas gzugs can mi 'jigs pas //
T02D2628:96a-31: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pa rnam par snang mdzad dam //
T02D2628:96a-32: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje cher bsgoms la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2628:96a-34: ngan song rgyud na gnas pa yi //
T02D2628:96a-36: cis bya ba ni mar dang /
T02D2628:96a-37: 'o mas zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T02D2628:96a-38: ci tsam du snyam pa la /
T02D2628:96a-39: de ni bde 'gror zhes pa'i bar du'o //
T02D2628:96a-40: de ni zhi ba'i las so //
T02D2628:96a-41: da ni rgyas pa'i las bya ste /
T02D2628:96a-42: tshe 'das pa ngan song las thar nas de'i bsod nams dang /
T02D2628:96a-43: ye shes spel ba'i phyir rgyas pa'i las bya'o //
T02D2628:96a-44: mkhas pas rgyas pa bya dgos te //
T02D2628:96a-45: zhes pas mkhas pa ni sgrub pa po las dang bya ba la mkhas pa'o //
T02D2628:96a-46: rgyas pa ni dpal dang 'byor pa 'phel bar ro //
T02D2628:96a-47: ji ltar 'phel bar bya ba bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2628:96a-48: khru do'am ni khru bzhi pa //
T02D2628:96a-49: de ltar mchog ni khru brgyad par /
T02D2628:96b-0: byas nas zhes pa ni me @96b thab kyi tshad do //
T02D2628:96b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi phyir tshad ni rab la khru sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o //
T02D2628:96b-2: gzhan gyis ni de las brtsams nas shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-3: dbyibs ji ltar snyam pa la /
T02D2628:96b-5: kun du mur na ldan par bya //
T02D2628:96b-6: zhes pa ni mu ran ni kha khyer te /
T02D2628:96b-7: tha mal sor brgyad phyir bskyed /
T02D2628:96b-8: sor brgyad kha khyer du lhag par brtsig / sor brgyad phyi'i kha khyer la'o //
T02D2628:96b-9: de'i phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la lha'i snam bu dang /
T02D2628:96b-11: rta babs dang bcas par bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-12: 'bring dang rab kyis nyis 'gyur du bskyed par bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-13: de dbus padma rin chen can //
T02D2628:96b-14: 'od zer ser po ldan par bri //
T02D2628:96b-15: zhes pa ni nang du padma'i steng du rin po che kha dog ser por bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-16: nang gi kha khyer la rin po che /
T02D2628:96b-17: steng gi kha khyer la padma bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-18: phyi rol du ni rigs lnga so so'i phyag mtshan
T02D2628:96b-19: bri bar bya zhes pa ni dbus kyi rin po
T02D2628:96b-20: che'i phyi rol padma'i steng du rigs lnga'i phyag rgya
T02D2628:96b-24: rgya gram rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-25: de ltar phyi yi lha rnams dang //
T02D2628:96b-26: lcags kyu la sogs bri bar bya //
T02D2628:96b-27: zhes pa ni gong gi zhi ba ltar shes par bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-28: gos rnams ser por bsgyur nas kyang //
T02D2628:96b-29: zhes pa la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D2628:96b-31: da ni mtho ris thob pa de'i dbang du thams
T02D2628:96b-32: cad bsdu zhing dga' bar bya ba'i phyir dbang gi
T02D2628:96b-33: las bstan te / hom khung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la //
T02D2628:96b-34: khru gang ba'am khru do pa //
T02D2628:96b-35: khru bzhir byas pa de yi dbus //
T02D2628:96b-36: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2628:96b-37: hom khung zla ba kham pa lta bur bya ste /
T02D2628:96b-38: chung ba ni khru gang ba'o //
T02D2628:96b-41: de'i dbus su padma dmar po de'i dbus su mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu bri'o //
T02D2628:96b-42: khor yug la ni mda' dang bcas pa'i gzhu kha dog dmar po bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-43: sngags rdzogs pa ni brtan par yang //
T02D2628:96b-44: phyi rol de dang 'dra bar bya //
T02D2628:96b-45: zhes pa ni phyi rol la sogs pa dang /
T02D2628:96b-46: lha dgod pa ni zhi ba ltar bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-47: dmar por bsgyur ba'i gos bgos la //
T02D2628:96b-48: zhes pa ni chas gos dmar por bya'o //
T02D2628:96b-49: me tog dmar po'am padma zhes pa la sogs pa ni rdzas te go sla'o //
T02D2628:97a-0: // / @97a * // da ni tshar gcod pa'i drag po'i las bstan te /
T02D2628:97a-1: de la gdon rnams gzhom pa'i phyir /
T02D2628:97a-2: drag po'i las ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2628:97a-3: zhes pa ni bar chad kyi bgegs tshar bcad pa'i phyir zhes pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-4: phyed dam gsum mam khru gsum mam //
T02D2628:97a-5: de ltar dam pa khru dgu bya //
T02D2628:97a-6: zhes pa ni rab 'bring gi tshad do ;
T02D2628:97a-7: zur gsum dang ni ldan pa la //
T02D2628:97a-8: zhes pa ni dbyibs te gru gsum du bya'o //
T02D2628:97a-9: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa //
T02D2628:97a-10: rtse gsum pa dang rgya gram pa'i //
T02D2628:97a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa la /
T02D2628:97a-12: dbus su rdo rje rtse dgu pa de'i phyogs bzhir rdo rje rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D2628:97a-16: tri sh'u la'i mgul du mi mgos mtshan pa rdo rje dang ldan par byas pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-17: mu khyud la ni dgra sta dang /
T02D2628:97a-18: rdo rje rtse gcig pas bskor ba'o //
T02D2628:97a-19: gzhan yang zhi ba ltar thams cad bri bar bya'o //
T02D2628:97a-21: gos nag bgos shing khros nas kyang //
T02D2628:97a-22: zhes pa ni chas gos bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-23: 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgyur ba zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-24: de nas de yi sdig bcom lus //
T02D2628:97a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2628:97a-27: mchod ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rim pa ni
T02D2628:97a-28: 'og nas 'byung ba nyi ma me'i las shes par
T02D2628:97a-29: bya'o // de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa //
T02D2628:97a-31: smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes pa'i bar gyis ni 'khor bsrung bar dam bcas pa ston /
T02D2628:97a-32: gang gis brtag pa'i rgyal po zhes pa nas /
T02D2628:97a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o zhes
T02D2628:97a-34: pa ni rgyud kyi don 'di gdan spyod par bkur
T02D2628:97a-35: bar bstan par bgyi'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa nas /
T02D2628:97a-37: legs par sgrubs shig ces pa'i bar gyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gtad nas bsgrub par bstan to //
T02D2628:97a-38: de ni rgyud kyi phan yon bstan pa'o //
T02D2628:97a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
T02D2628:97a-40: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs su
T02D2628:97a-41: sbyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi rgyal po sku gsum gyi
T02D2628:97a-42: gtsug tor gyi rgyud las rgyud phyi ma'i bshad pa
T02D2628:97a-43: gsal ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba slob dpon kun
T02D2628:97a-44: dga' snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2628:97a-46: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku m'a ra ka la sha dang /
